['Modeling and analyzing performance of various systems (e.g. sensors, aircraft, communication networks)System/Architecture design and algorithm development to achieve customer’s mission requirementsDesign and perform research experiments that test a valid hypothesis, involving both simulation and testing with actual hardwareDevelop research methodologies that can be used to effectively evaluate the reliability and validity of research experiments and their resultsDevelop mathematical models of experimental results that can be applied toward developing new insights or research directionsPresent technical and operational issues to senior managersProduce rapid software prototypes to test experimental hypotheses and/or analyze experimental resultsLearn new technologies or develop fundamentally new approaches as neededPropose innovative solutions and/or compare tradeoffs between multiple approachesClearly communicate research impediments/ongoing challenges to program managers', 'Design and perform research experiments that test a valid hypothesis, involving both simulation and testing with actual hardware', 'Apogee Research is building tools for designing and implementing distributed, heterogeneous systems to accelerate the DoD’s adaptability. We develop novel concepts and then transition them into operational use, demonstrating the capabilities on real hardware along the way. Founded in 2012, Apogee Research brings together cross-discipline teams to be handle problems in a variety of DoD domains, including Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance (ISR), Electronic Warfare (EW), Data Fusion, Networking, Cyber Analysis, and more. At Apogee Research we work hard, we get things done, and we do it together.', 'Clearly communicate research impediments/ongoing challenges to program managers', 'All candidates must be eligible to obtain and maintain a US Government Security Clearance; therefore, any applicant MUST BE A US CITIZENStrong analytical and problem solving and organizational skillsEffective communication skills, both verbal and writtenFamiliarity with/Interest in DoD relevant phenomenology (relevant areas include tracking and estimation, radar physics, aircraft performance, system integration, mission conops, etc.)Relevant experience using standard analysis tools (e.g. Matlab, Ansys), domain specific tools, or writing software in Java, Python, or C/C++Demonstrated ability to be flexible and remain well organized in a fast-paced environment', '\xa0', 'We currently have openings for Senior System Engineer (full-time), with a focus on system design and analysis. The position is located in our Arlington, VA office. Our ideal candidate is experienced in collaborating with teams to experiment, analyze, and develop practical solutions for impactful problems. All candidates must have or be eligible to obtain a DoD Top Secret Clearance, therefore all candidates must be a US Citizen to apply.', 'Minimum Qualifications: ', 'Learn new technologies or develop fundamentally new approaches as needed', 'Bachelor’s degree in a relevant technical field (e.g. Engineering, Applied Math/Physics, Computer Science/Engineering, etc.)', 'Apogee Research focuses on bringing cutting-edge research into practice for the Intelligence and DoD communities. We have an active and dynamic research and development environment that provides opportunities to work on cutting edge projects for customers such as DARPA, primarily in the domains of cyber network operations and complexity management for mission capabilities.\xa0We take on high impact problems that require deep fundamental research coupled with disciplined engineering to solve, develop early prototypes to demonstrate feasibility, and work with our customers and end users to transition capabilities for operational use.', 'Apogee Research, LLC is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy and gender identity), national origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, genetic information, age, membership in an employee organization, parental status, military service, or other non-merit factors.', 'Minimum Education: ', 'Propose innovative solutions and/or compare tradeoffs between multiple approaches', 'All candidates must be eligible to obtain and maintain a US Government Security Clearance; therefore, any applicant MUST BE A US CITIZEN', 'Relevant experience using standard analysis tools (e.g. Matlab, Ansys), domain specific tools, or writing software in Java, Python, or C/C++', 'System/Architecture design and algorithm development to achieve customer’s mission requirements', 'Develop mathematical models of experimental results that can be applied toward developing new insights or research directions', 'Demonstrated ability to be flexible and remain well organized in a fast-paced environment', 'Strong analytical and problem solving and organizational skills', '\xa0\xa0', 'B.S. plus 7 or more years of experience; or M.S. plus 5 years of experience; or PhD and 2 years of experience', 'Effective communication skills, both verbal and written', 'Position Responsibilities:', 'Modeling and analyzing performance of various systems (e.g. sensors, aircraft, communication networks)', 'Bachelor’s degree in a relevant technical field (e.g. Engineering, Applied Math/Physics, Computer Science/Engineering, etc.)B.S. plus 7 or more years of experience; or M.S. plus 5 years of experience; or PhD and 2 years of experience', 'Develop research methodologies that can be used to effectively evaluate the reliability and validity of research experiments and their results', 'Familiarity with/Interest in DoD relevant phenomenology (relevant areas include tracking and estimation, radar physics, aircraft performance, system integration, mission conops, etc.)', 'Apogee Research offers flexible work schedules and a comprehensive benefits package that includes health, dental, vision, life, and disability insurance, FSAs, paid vacation, sick leave, paternal leave, and paid holidays. Conveniently located in Arlington, VA, we are a short walking distance from the Ballston Metro station. We offer the choice of paid garage parking or a contribution towards a transit account.', 'Produce rapid software prototypes to test experimental hypotheses and/or analyze experimental results', 'Led by Evan Fortunato Ph.D., we have grown steadily, receiving awards from organizations including SECAF and Arlington Economic and Development. While we appreciate these awards recognizing our financial stability and growth, our core mission is to create an environment where we can focus on solving hard and interesting problems with people we enjoy working with on a daily basis.', 'candidates must be a US Citizen to apply', 'About Apogee Research', 'Present technical and operational issues to senior managers']

['', 'As a Senior Data Platform Engineer, you will be responsible for ensuring data are flowing through our systems and delivering value via our Business Intelligence (BI) tools company wide. You will be instrumental in defining and implementing our core infrastructure and help us realize our data driven mission of Remaking Medicine.', 'EQRx is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'You have architected multi-source data ingestion solutions in the healthcare domain leveraging technologies such as Stitch and dbt.', 'You have a strong interest and experience in exploring new technologies.', 'You have worked extensively with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP) and are strong with SQL and scripting languages.', 'The Impact You Will Have', 'Your Superpowers', 'You are a leader. Teams love working with you and you are someone who takes pride in mentoring and supporting the careers of others.', 'You can thrive in a smaller company environment and love the pace of a true startup.', 'You’re a team player who is willing to roll-up your sleeves and get the job done.', 'You bring 5+ years of data engineering experience with a thorough understanding of data lake/warehouse architectures (BigQuery, Snowflake, RedShift).You have worked extensively with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP) and are strong with SQL and scripting languages.You have architected multi-source data ingestion solutions in the healthcare domain leveraging technologies such as Stitch and dbt.If you have experience with HIPAA compliance, this is a plus.You thrive in a collaborative environment and can effectively communicate with internal teams, strategic partners, and vendors.You have a strong interest and experience in exploring new technologies.You are a leader. Teams love working with you and you are someone who takes pride in mentoring and supporting the careers of others.You can thrive in a smaller company environment and love the pace of a true startup.You’re a team player who is willing to roll-up your sleeves and get the job done.', 'You thrive in a collaborative environment and can effectively communicate with internal teams, strategic partners, and vendors.', 'If you have experience with HIPAA compliance, this is a plus.', 'You bring 5+ years of data engineering experience with a thorough understanding of data lake/warehouse architectures (BigQuery, Snowflake, RedShift).']

['', 'Results-driven.', 'The OneStream Platform contains complex OLAP, multi-dimensional, multi-server, multi-threading, web, and SQL technologies and is specifically designed to solve problems for the Office of the CFO at large corporations.\xa0Your primary responsibilities will be to design, develop & maintain our OneStream platform and to coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure.', 'Excellent Medical Plan.Dental & Vision Insurance.Life Insurance.Short- & Long-Term Disability.Vacation Time.Paid Holidays.Professional Development.Retirement Plan.', 'Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.', 'Ethical.Credible.Professional.\xa0Results-driven.Detail-oriented.Able to multi-task.Flexible and adaptable.Team player.Legally authorized to work for any company in the United States without sponsorship.', 'OneStream employees are passionate, hardworking individuals who go above and beyond to keep our customers happy and follow through on our mission statement. They consistently deliver the best and in turn, we make every effort to keep them cared for and happy. A sample of the benefits we provide are:', 'Excellent Medical Plan.', '5+ years programming experience.', 'Professional Development.', 'Paid Holidays.', 'Ability to analyze and communicate technical issues, lead discussions, and influence decisions.', 'Personal Attributes', 'Able to multi-task.', 'Data Modelling Skills.', 'Transparency around corporate structure, salary, and benefits.Core value of customer success.Variety of project work (not industry specific).\xa0Strong culture and\xa0camaraderie.Multiple training opportunities.', 'Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.', '5+ years programming experience.Recent Microsoft technology focus.Experience with the following technologies:VB .Net, C#, Visual Basic and SQL Server.Visual Studio, TFS, and GIT.Strong understanding of object-oriented programming.Data Modelling Skills.Skill for writing reusable libraries.Familiar with various design and architectural patterns.Experience with Agile/Scrum Development Methodologies.Ability to analyze and communicate technical issues, lead discussions, and influence decisions.Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal skills.', 'Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal skills.', 'Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.', 'QUALITIES OF A SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE', 'We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our OneStream XF Platform Development team. Our company provides Corporate Performance Management (CPM) software for large corporations. Our product is designed for high-end deployments at customer facilities or in the Microsoft Azure cloud. The core engine contains complex OLAP, multi-dimensional, multi-server, multi-threading, web, and SQL technologies and is specifically designed to solve problems for the Office of Finance at extremely large corporations.', 'Skill for writing reusable libraries.', 'Core value of customer success.', 'The successful candidate will have a Bachelor of Science degree plus 5-7 years programming experience using Microsoft Visual Studio and the .NET Framework. Specific technologies include C#, Visual Basic, SQL Server, Web Services, WCF, WPF, Silverlight, XAML, XML, MVC, HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS. The candidate will be expected to work well in a focused group of engineers. He or she will report to the Director of Software Engineering and interact with the CTO and other senior team members to design and implement new features and maintain existing software.', 'Knowledge and Experience', 'Multiple training opportunities.', 'Fort Lauderdale, Florida - OneStream Software LLC', 'Retirement Plan.', 'Experience with Agile/Scrum Development Methodologies.', 'Detail-oriented.', 'DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', "College diploma or bachelor's degree in a technology-related field.", 'Team player.', 'Full-Time', 'Software Engineer', 'Transparency around corporate structure, salary, and benefits.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Strong culture and\xa0camaraderie.', 'Visual Studio, TFS, and GIT.', 'Professional.\xa0', 'We are equally fanatical about our OneStream family members (formally known as employees).\xa0We are a team in every sense of the word.\xa0Everyone here is approachable and excited to pitch in and help.\xa0We work hard and play hard.\xa0The right candidate is easy to get along with, always willing to lend a hand, excited about coming to work, and happy to contribute to the team.\xa0We also offer a casual dress environment and modern office spaces.', 'Benefits at OneStream Software', 'Employment Type -\xa0Full-Time', 'Recent Microsoft technology focus.', 'Legally authorized to work for any company in the United States without sponsorship.', 'VB .Net, C#, Visual Basic and SQL Server.', 'Familiar with various design and architectural patterns.', 'Experience with the following technologies:', 'Flexible and adaptable.', 'Formal Education and Certification', 'WHO WE ARE', 'Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to mitigate and address these issues.', 'WHY JOIN THE ONESTREAM TEAM', 'Variety of project work (not industry specific).\xa0', 'Life Insurance.', 'Strong understanding of object-oriented programming.', 'Short- & Long-Term Disability.', 'Vacation Time.', 'OneStream Software is a privately held software company created by the same team that invented the leading financial solutions of the last decade. We provide a unified Corporate Performance Management (CPM) platform which enables the enterprise to simplify financial consolidation, reporting, budgeting and forecasting for complex organizations. Our powerful extensibility enables the enterprise to deliver additional analytic solutions without adding any technical complexity. By delivering multiple solutions in one application, we offer increased capabilities for financial reporting and analysis while reducing the risk, complexity and total cost of ownership for our customers. We are driven by our mission statement that every customer must be a reference and success.', 'Integrate data storage solutions.', 'Credible.', 'Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.Integrate data storage solutions.Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to mitigate and address these issues.Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.', 'ABOUT THE JOB', 'OneStream Software is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\xa0', 'Ethical.', 'Dental & Vision Insurance.']

['', 'You belong here.', 'A background like this helps:\xa0', 'You have successfully developed cloud-native data ingestion and aggregation processes that handle gigabytes of data per day.', 'The Engineers working at Chainalysis work on systems that are the highest fidelity of risk data within a crypto business. Our job is to bring transparency to the cryptocurrency ecosystem and build trust on blockchains. To do that, we build systems that detect fraud in real-time.', 'Although you enjoy making technical decisions, you take great joy in helping others make great decisions on their own.', 'Although not necessary, experience with Bitcoin or other digital currencies is a plus!', 'We encourage applicants across any race, ethnicity, gender/gender expression, age, religion, ability, experience, and more. We can’t wait to meet you.\xa0', 'You appreciate the importance of team culture and have been an active contributor to a culture that thrives on giving first and the respect and diversity of opinions', 'At Chainalysis, we believe that diversity of experience and thought makes us stronger. With both customers and employees around the world, we are committed to ensuring our team reflects the unique communities around us. Some of the ways we’re ensuring we keep learning are an internal Diversity Committee, Days of Reflection throughout the year including International Women’s Day, Juneteenth, Harvey Milk Day, and International Migrant’s Day, and a commitment to continue revisiting and reevaluating our diversity culture.\xa0', 'You have been both a successful mentor and mentee.\xa0', 'The team has clear production service level objectives (SLOs) and solutions to meet and monitor them.', 'A Senior Engineer on the\xa0KYT (Know Your Transaction) team will not only thrive on designing and implementing complex systems, but also operating and scaling them in production. They are a mentor who grows the skills of their teammates and rejoices in the ripple effects across the company.\xa0We measure our success by how well we enable our customers to fight crime and meet compliance regulations.', 'At Chainalysis, we help government agencies, cryptocurrency businesses, and financial institutions track and investigate illicit activity on the blockchain, allowing them to engage confidently with cryptocurrency. We take care of our people with great benefits, professional development opportunities, and fun.', 'Previously designed and implemented cloud-native micro services based distributed systems.', "You've built a scalable API service on AWS that handles thousands of requests per second.", 'Have a strong bias to ship.', "You have successfully developed cloud-native data ingestion and aggregation processes that handle gigabytes of data per day.You've built a scalable API service on AWS that handles thousands of requests per second.Our product suite has cutting-edge features that detect market manipulation, fraud, anomalous activity, and more.\xa0The team has clear production service level objectives (SLOs) and solutions to meet and monitor them.We’ve modernized our stack and moved to a streaming architecture.The other members of the team eagerly seek out your opinion on problems they are trying to solve.\xa0", 'Built solutions for real world customer problems.', 'Have experience with Terraform and Kubernetes.', 'Experience in scaling/sharding of databases', 'Previously designed and implemented cloud-native micro services based distributed systems.Experience building data pipelines and implementing event-driven architectures.Built and managed production applications using JVM stack and PostgresExperience in scaling/sharding of databasesBuilt solutions for real world customer problems.Have a strong bias to ship.Although you enjoy making technical decisions, you take great joy in helping others make great decisions on their own.You have been both a successful mentor and mentee.\xa0JVM expertise. We mostly use Java but also appreciate other languages.Have experience with Terraform and Kubernetes.You appreciate the importance of team culture and have been an active contributor to a culture that thrives on giving first and the respect and diversity of opinionsAlthough not necessary, experience with Bitcoin or other digital currencies is a plus!', 'In one year you’ll know you were successful if…', 'We’ve modernized our stack and moved to a streaming architecture.', 'JVM expertise. We mostly use Java but also appreciate other languages.', 'The other members of the team eagerly seek out your opinion on problems they are trying to solve.\xa0', 'Experience building data pipelines and implementing event-driven architectures.', 'Built and managed production applications using JVM stack and Postgres', 'Our product suite has cutting-edge features that detect market manipulation, fraud, anomalous activity, and more.\xa0', 'A background like this helps:']

job_title: Data Engineer - All Levels with Security Clearance
job_text: ['', ' #datasynctech on Instagram', ' Hadoop, cloud, and other technologies associated with data storage, processing, management, and use.', ' Analyze the requirements and evaluate technologies for data science capabilities including one or more of the following: Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, predictive modeling, statistical analysis and hypothesis testing.', ' Develop and use advanced software programs, algorithms, query techniques, model complex business problems, and automated processes to cleanse, integrate, and evaluate datasets.', ' Indexing: SOLR and Lucine', ' Develop information tools, algorithms, dashboards, and queries to monitor and improve business performance. Maintain awareness of emerging analytics and big-data technologies. * Designs, implement, and maintain standard data interfaces for data ingest including Extract/Transform/Load (ETL) methodology and implementation, APIs, RESTful Web Services, data quality, and data cleansing.', ' Provide data services, data administration, data management, and "Big Data" support in client/server, virtual machine, Hadoop, and cloud infrastructure environment and/or migrations between these environments.', ' Frameworks: Hadoop, Rails, JavaScript Frameworks, SOA/WebServices, JSP', ' Database installation, configuration, and the upgrading of database server software and related products, backup and recovery policies and procedures, database implementation, security, optimization, multi-domain operation, and performance management.', ' www.twitter.com/datasynctech', ' Interested in Joining Our Team? - Check out this YouTube video! #CJ', ' Development/Scripting Languages: JAVA (J2EE), Python, Ruby, JavaScript, MapReduce, Pig, XML, SQL, JAQL, HTML, CSS, XML, BASH, ANT, and Perl What makes DataSync Technologies different? Leadership Training: We provide employees with a variety of learning opportunities, including access to exclusive classes, professional growth training and more. Feedback & Mentoring: We believe in talking-often. So we have one-on-one feedback sessions for every employee. Community Service: We believe in helping the community where we work. DataSync and its employees donate time and services on a regular basis to local military charities. We believe in helping, both inside and outside of the office. Social Events: We plan social events on a regular basis to help our employees relax and socialize so we get to know one another outside of our job titles. Equal Employment Opportunity', ' www.twitter.com/Jobs at DataSync (@DatasyncJobs)', ' The migration/transition of database capability into cloud based technologies and/or creation of interfaces between classic relational databases and key indexes to cloud based columnar databases and map reduce index capabilities.', ' www.facebook.com/DatasyncTechnologies']

", 'New office space with free downtown parkting and onsite fitness center!', "You'll be developing high performance backend systems in .NET Core and flexible, beautiful, and accessible frontend applications in VueJS. ['', 'Experience building RESTful APIs within a microservice architecture.', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field", 'Software Engineer', 'If you are great at what you do and love doing it, keep up on latest technologies, have self-discipline for doing things right, understand standards and best practices and why they are important,\xa0please reach out to join the Software Engineering team @ Kount!', 'As a Software Engineer at Kount, you will solve challenging technology problems and build architecturally sound, high-quality software. You will achieve success through communicating, collaborating, and developing creative and performant solutions to help Kount protect the digital innovation of our customers.\xa0You should be a creative, driven, motivated engineer that can think outside the box, has ability to learn quickly, and can deliver high-quality working solutions that are both maintainable and scalable.', 'Maturity and expertise in software engineering concepts (i.e. architecture, data structures, algorithms, etc.) and maintain a focus on quality.', 'Qualifications', 'great at what you do', '4+ years software engineering and software architecture background in languages such as Java, C/C++, or Go.', ' love', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related fieldMaturity and expertise in software engineering concepts (i.e. architecture, data structures, algorithms, etc.) and maintain a focus on quality.Database query optimization and performance improvement experience preferred.4+ years software engineering and software architecture background in languages such as Java, C/C++, or Go.Experience building RESTful APIs within a microservice architecture.Excellent communication skills and desire to work in a collaborative team environment.", 'Excellent communication skills and desire to work in a collaborative team environment.', 'Database query optimization and performance improvement experience preferred.']

We achieve this through innovative routing, mileage, mapping and mobile navigation solutions. From trusted industry standard data to seamless integration, Trimble Maps solutions are used by a broad range of industries, workforce, and everyday drivers on the road. For over 35 years, its suite of powerful solutions, which includes PC*MILER, DirectRoute, CoPilot, and Trimble Maps, have set the foundation for safe and efficient journeys worldwide – one mile, one driver, one vehicle at a time.Why Trimble Maps:Our technology platform generates 20 Million routes per day. We are able to handle 50,000 locations/minute to compute routes in real time. There are 20 million locations mapped in our database and it’s growing every day. ['', 'We are excited to have you join our team because you:', "Can work on both frontend and backend components (if you're stronger in frontend or backend, we'd still like to hear from you)\xa0", "CSC Generation Engineering needs the best software engineers to support our team’s mission of improving the tech stack of our portfolio companies. [' Bachelor’ s degree in Computer Engineering/Computer Science or related field. 5-10 years experience in software development Proven experience building complex web systems Considered an expert in Python/Django Experience with React Experience developing in a containerized environment (Docker/Rancher) Experience in developing using Scrum and understanding of Kanban, Theory of Constraints Experience in Java and Spring is a plus Experience in Machine Learning is a plus', 'Experience in Java and Spring is a plus', 'Develop best practices to ensure software functionality, usability, reliability and availability.', 'Design and develop software projects based on customer specifications and agreed to business strategies.', 'Experience with React', 'Mentor other software engineers when required to ensure quality and productivity.', ' Designing, coding, and debugging software. Improving the performance of existing software. Maintaining and upgrading existing software. Recommending new technologies that can help increase productivity. Investigating software-related complaints and making necessary adjustments to ensure optimal software performance. Regularly attending team meetings to discuss projects, brainstorm ideas, and put forward solutions to any issues. Design and develop software projects based on customer specifications and agreed to business strategies. Provide support in developing new product lines and upgrading existing products. Coordinate with product management teams in defining project scope and approaches. Mentor other software engineers when required to ensure quality and productivity. Work with project team to design prototypes to validate application functionality. Participate in design, code and test plan reviews as needed and provide appropriate recommendations. job_title: Software Engineer C++ Low Latency - Hedge Fund
job_text: ['', 'The Low Latency Platform build-out we are looking for an exceptional developer with a strong academic background to work directly on several components across crucial parts of the realtime investment platform.', 'The primary focus of the role is on the build-out of liquid assets trading strategies in\xa0a highly distributed trading platform covering equities, fx, commodities, mid and intraday, components in the realtime investment platform.', 'Strong commercial acumen, how technology affects a PnL and understanding of one or two assets.', 'Proven ability to develop high-quality software at varying levels of experience.\xa0', 'The Low Latency Platform build-out we are looking for an exceptional developer with a strong academic background to work directly on several components across crucial parts of the realtime investment platform.Develops components in C++and python.The primary focus of the role is on the build-out of liquid assets trading strategies in\xa0a highly distributed trading platform covering equities, fx, commodities, mid and intraday, components in the realtime investment platform.Designing and building new components in the investment pipeline.Improving, optimizing, and extending the capabilities of existing systems.Collaborating with trading and quants daily, the team operates in a fast-paced and continually changing environment. Technology is at the heart of what they do.', 'A global systematic hedge fund based in Chicago is recruiting a software Engineering that is core to the business and systematic trading team. By designing and implementing real-time systems, the engineers are solving some of the world’s most complex financial problems. ['', 'Education/Skills/Experience Requirements:', 'Demonstrated ability to write production code (readable, maintainable, tested, and documented)', 'Establish robust CI/CD practices for our code, data, and results to minimize technical debt', '(preferred: Computer Science, Applied Math/Statistics, Physics, Chem/Bio Engineering)', 'Experience with wrapping & deploying models from ML frameworks (we mainly use: TensorFlow)', 'Familiarity with user-facing web services and applications (we use: Spotfire, Jupyter, R/Shiny, Dash)', 'Manage project timelines and schedules of projects with internal personnel and external vendors', 'BS/MS in a technical field or related background with at least 3 years of practical experience(preferred: Computer Science, Applied Math/Statistics, Physics, Chem/Bio Engineering)Expertise in one or more general-purpose programming languages (we use: Python, R, Perl, Julia)Demonstrated ability to write production code (readable, maintainable, tested, and documented)Demonstrated experience in building cloud-based data infrastructure (we use: GCP and AWS)Experience with wrapping & deploying models from ML frameworks (we mainly use: TensorFlow)Familiarity with user-facing web services and applications (we use: Spotfire, Jupyter, R/Shiny, Dash)Proficiency in Linux (including shell scripting), experience with database languages (SQL or No-SQL)and experience with code/data/workflow version control practices and tools (we use: git/dvc/cml)Experience with biochemical and genomic data is a plus (we use: RNA sequences, chemoinformatics)Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and manage priorities flexibly.Excellent written and verbal communication skills; organizational and documentation skills.Relaxed and fun attitude that helps good culture building. Passion for improving people’s health!', 'Demonstrated experience in building cloud-based data infrastructure (we use: GCP and AWS)', 'and experience with code/data/workflow version control practices and tools (we use: git/dvc/cml)', 'BS/MS in a technical field or related background with at least 3 years of practical experience', 'Position Overview\xa0', 'Design, implement, and maintain ETL workflows from multiple internal & external data sources', 'Continuously deploy predictive models and insights curated from them to interactive dashboards', 'Collaborate widely across the entire R&D team to codify their insights and meet their use cases', 'To Apply: Please send resume and cover letter to platform.jobs@skyhawktx.com', 'Experience with biochemical and genomic data is a plus (we use: RNA sequences, chemoinformatics)', 'Proficiency in Linux (including shell scripting), experience with database languages (SQL or No-SQL)', 'Responsibilities:', 'Utilize cloud APIs to support the prototyping, training, and deployment of predictive models', 'Expertise in one or more general-purpose programming languages (we use: Python, R, Perl, Julia)', 'Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and manage priorities flexibly.', 'Deploy and maintain a data warehouse that cleans and fuses data for our cloud ML workflows', 'Record usage analytics and gather expert feedback on predictors to improve our ML workflows', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills; organizational and documentation skills.', 'Design, implement, and maintain ETL workflows from multiple internal & external data sourcesDeploy and maintain a data warehouse that cleans and fuses data for our cloud ML workflowsUtilize cloud APIs to support the prototyping, training, and deployment of predictive modelsContinuously deploy predictive models and insights curated from them to interactive dashboardsRecord usage analytics and gather expert feedback on predictors to improve our ML workflowsEstablish robust CI/CD practices for our code, data, and results to minimize technical debtCollaborate widely across the entire R&D team to codify their insights and meet their use casesManage project timelines and schedules of projects with internal personnel and external vendors', 'Relaxed and fun attitude that helps good culture building. Passion for improving people’s health!', 'Skyhawk Therapeutics seeks a Data+DevOps Engineer to join our growing Platform team in Waltham, MA.\xa0Skyhawk is committed to discovering, developing and commercializing small molecule therapeutics that correct RNA splicing. We use our novel SkySTARTM platform to develop drug candidates for some of the world’s most intractable diseases including cancer, neurological conditions, and other therapeutic areas/targets previously considered “undruggable.”\xa0', 'Platform Engineer (Data+DevOps)\xa0', 'A cover letter is required. Please explain why and detail how this job fits your interests well.', 'To Apply:', 'Skyhawk is looking for a multi-talented Data and DevOps engineer to join our Platform team. In this role, you will work closely with a diverse team of world-class scientists and engineers.\xa0You will help us accelerate Skyhawk’s novel drug discovery and development platform, SkySTARTM. Your primary responsibilities will be to design, implement, deploy, and maintain data-processing and -modeling toolbox that powers collaborative interactions between scientists on our platform and makes optimal use of our rich in-house data.\xa0This is a key technical role providing many opportunities for significant impact and growth. You will learn from a cross-functional team of experts in Machine Learning, Bioinformatics, Genomics, Structural Biology, Chemistry, and Drug Discovery. You will manage unique scientific data, help grow Skyhawk’s collaborative data science culture, and ultimately enable better health for our patients!\xa0']

job_title: Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up
job_text: ['', 'Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.', 'Professional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)', 'You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.", "Orama are proud to announce their exclusive partnership with an AI Marketing Software Start-up who are tipped to be one of the biggest success stories of 2021. Their unique value proposition allows enterprise companies to understand and predict their customers' buying habits/patterns combining data gained from omnichannel marketing tech with the latest machine learning advances. Following their recent addtion of $40m+ round of funding, they are looking to hire a Data Science specialist who can help create value within their largest customers by deriving insights from data. This is a unique opportunity to play a pivotal role in their growth - GET IN TOUCH NOW!", 'A self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value Creation', 'Experience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)', 'Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0', 'Desired Skills and Experience', 'Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniquesProfessional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and mungingProfessional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQueryExperience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modelingA self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value CreationExperience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.", 'Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling', 'Basic $100K-150K + bonus + Stock + Benefits', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniques', 'Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQuery', 'In order to apply for this role you will have the following experience:', '.', 'Professional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and munging', 'Experience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential']

['', 'Ability to adapt to fast moving environments with evolving deadlines and communicate technical concepts clearly and effectively.', 'Intellisense Systems, Inc., is a Southern California high tech company specializing in advanced military defense, homeland security, and energy solutions. We are seeking a\xa0System Engineer\xa0for our Intelligent Displays and Sensors Systems (D29) Department.\xa0The successful candidate will bring significant expertise in military electronics and avionics systems to our growing team.', 'U.S. Citizenship is required.\xa0Must be willing and able to obtain a Security Clearance or have an active Secret Security Clearance.', 'Develop and maintain system requirement specifications and system interface design documents, i.e.. ICDs, Test Plans, Test Procedures, Test Reports and support the development of SRS and HRS documents.', 'B.S. Degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field with 5+ years of experience or Masters with 3+ years experience in a systems engineering role.', '\xa0', 'Support development for the system, hardware, and software requirements and design to assure system requirements are met.', 'Provide system architecture definition based on the required functionality.', 'B.S. Degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field with 5+ years of experience or Masters with 3+ years experience in a systems engineering role.Experience with Model Based Systems Engineering for Systems Engineering & Integration. Developed understanding of MBSE for lifecycle beginning-to-end System of Systems Engineering and Integration.Fundamental understanding of the systems engineering processes, embedded system development, COTS incorporation, with hands-on experience in development of procedures for integration, Requirements Based Tests and execution.\xa0Experience in analyzing use cases and requirements for validity and feasibility and creating corresponding test scenarios and test cases.Work independently to formulate systems engineering work products and integrating complex avionics (preferably).Hands-on experience with Qualification testing per MIL Standards (MIL-STD-704, 810, 461, 464) and or RTCA (DO-160) that covers the expected military customer use environment and operational conditions.Outstanding analytical, problem solving, planning, and abstract thinking skillsAbility to adapt to fast moving environments with evolving deadlines and communicate technical concepts clearly and effectively.Experience using DOORS is a plus.U.S. Citizenship is required.\xa0Must be willing and able to obtain a Security Clearance or have an active Secret Security Clearance.', 'Support DO-254 / DO-178 efforts to achieve project certification goals.', 'Develop and maintain system requirement specifications and system interface design documents, i.e.. ICDs, Test Plans, Test Procedures, Test Reports and support the development of SRS and HRS documents.Participate hands-on in all system and subsystem hardware and hardware/software integration and acceptance testing.Provide system architecture definition based on the required functionality.Support development for the system, hardware, and software requirements and design to assure system requirements are met.Perform/coordinate various analyses in support of the detailed design of components, major assemblies, software, and systems.Support DO-254 / DO-178 efforts to achieve project certification goals.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Experience in analyzing use cases and requirements for validity and feasibility and creating corresponding test scenarios and test cases.', 'Outstanding analytical, problem solving, planning, and abstract thinking skills', 'Participate hands-on in all system and subsystem hardware and hardware/software integration and acceptance testing.', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'Unless otherwise stated in the requirements section of an individual job listing, our positions require U.S. Citizenship, U.S. Permanent Residency, or other status as a U.S. Person as defined by 8 USC 1324b(a)(3). We are proud to be an EEO/AA employer M/F/D/V. Intellisense Systems, Inc is an Equal\xa0Employment Opportunity (EEO) employer and welcomes all qualified applicants. Applicants will receive fair and impartial consideration without regard to race, sex, color, religion, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, genetic data, or religion or other legally protected status.', 'Experience using DOORS is a plus.', 'Perform/coordinate various analyses in support of the detailed design of components, major assemblies, software, and systems.', 'REQUIREMENTS\xa0:', 'Experience with Model Based Systems Engineering for Systems Engineering & Integration. Developed understanding of MBSE for lifecycle beginning-to-end System of Systems Engineering and Integration.', 'This role will be responsible for participating in system, hardware, and software design activities of new development projects for products being developed for use in DoD environments. The candidate will participate and/or take ownership in requirements analysis activities to include requirements generation, allocation and tracking throughout the development life-cycle. They will also contribute to and support organization-wide efforts across multi-disciplined team in electrical, mechanical, and software technical areas.', 'Hands-on experience with Qualification testing per MIL Standards (MIL-STD-704, 810, 461, 464) and or RTCA (DO-160) that covers the expected military customer use environment and operational conditions.', 'Fundamental understanding of the systems engineering processes, embedded system development, COTS incorporation, with hands-on experience in development of procedures for integration, Requirements Based Tests and execution.\xa0', 'Work independently to formulate systems engineering work products and integrating complex avionics (preferably).']

', 'Work with QA / Support team to add replicated bugs to regression. ', 'Troubleshoot and resolve computer software issues, including embedded software control systems ', '\xa0', 'Ability to understand the systems "big picture" and how new functionality fits into that system ', 'Excellent communication skills to discuss with engineering groups to determine the true software requirements and to work well within global teams ', 'Responsible to manage escalation calls with field support engineers and customers ', 'We’re not like most.  We don’t just overcome obstacles – we don’t see them.  Instead, we see the potential in every person, and every situation.  We don’t wait for the opportunity to appear – we create it.  Meet ASM.  A company that has been searching for people like you. ', 'Ability to quickly read code and understand the functionality implemented and the ability to translate the functionality into another piece of software ', '\xa0 ', 'As part of the global R&D Software team, you will be developing the next generation software for machine control combining the latest design principles and robotics. \xa0 As part of our team in Phoenix, partnering with the local R&D engineering team as well as with the global software team in Korea and Japan. ', 'Senior Software Development Engineer', 'Who is ASM? ', 'Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software. ', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience working with two or more from the following: software for machine control,  Semiconductor Factory Automation (SEMI SECS/GEM),  Equipment Data Acquisition (SEMI EDA / Interface A), Multi-threaded applications, real-time software, device drivers or other interrupt driven software preferred ', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar technical field of study with at least 7-9 years of related experience OR Master's degree in Computer Science or similar technical field of study with with 4-5 years of related experience. Software development experience in one or more general purpose programming language must have strong C / C++,\xa0C#, Delphi (Pascal) Related experience to include architecting software and control system Experience working with two or more from the following: software for machine control,  Semiconductor Factory Automation (SEMI SECS/GEM),  Equipment Data Acquisition (SEMI EDA / Interface A), Multi-threaded applications, real-time software, device drivers or other interrupt driven software preferred ", 'We at ASM are a truly global organization that works diligently with an open-mind in all areas of our business. Our goal is to remain an industry leader by being ahead of what’s next. We accomplish this by focusing on finding collaborative solutions to make integrated circuits, or chips, smaller, faster and even more powerful. ['', 'Credera is a management consulting, user experience, and technology solutions firm with offices in Dallas, Denver, Houston, Chicago, and New York. We work with clients ranging from Fortune 500 companies to emerging industry leaders, and provide expert, objective advice to help solve complex business and technology challenges. Our deep capabilities in strategy, organization, process, analytics, technology and user experience help our clients improve their performance. Clients depend on our ability to anticipate, recognize, and address their specific needs. Credera’s consultants work with some of the world’s best known brands in a variety of industries, including one of the top five fast food chains, leading energy organizations, retailers, airlines.\xa0More information is available at\xa0www.credera.com.\xa0We are part of the OPMG Group of Companies, a division of Omnicom Group Inc.', 'An on-boarding peer will help you walk through all aspects of the Credera work-life and be your guide as you get yourself ready for your first project with us. You will also be treated to lunch by your Practice Leader and Mentor whose jobs are to help you navigate your career at Credera, act as your advocates, make helpful recommendations that align with your strengths, and set you up for success by providing clarity and vision.', 'Like what you hear but worried about high travel?\xa0Know that our goal is to keep travel to a minimum and most projects do not require travel.\xa0An average would be 0% up to 10%.\xa0', 'Check out our Glassdoor reviews to read what our employees have to say!', 'At the end of your first two years, you will have worked on multiple projects and been exposed to different sets of technologies and business domains. At this point in your career with us, you will be looking to move to the next level and your efforts will be supported by Credera’s professional development program to help you build the depth and breadth required to advance your career.\xa0This includes a roadmap laying out recommended training and development specific to your level, on-the-job training and exposure, internal Credera University classes, and external certifications, conferences, or seminars that align with your personal development and the needs of the firm.', 'Your first six months with us', "Fortune's\xa0100 Best Workplace for Millennials\xa0", '\xa0', 'WHO YOU ARE:', 'You will collaborate with a team of highly qualified and smart individuals to write efficient code, make code modifications, practice test-driven-development, and identify, troubleshoot and solve software defects. Our typical project length is about 6 months and typical team size is 6-8 engineers. We follow an agile methodology on all our projects.', 'We do not currently commence "sponsor" immigration cases in order to employ candidates.', '100 Best Companies to Work for in Texas by Texas Monthly Magazine', "7-time awardee on\xa0Inc. Magazine's\xa0annual Inc. 500 list", 'Programming languages we frequently use include Java, Python, Scala and Ruby', "Fortune's\xa0Best Workplaces in Consulting & Professional Services\xa0", 'How we work', 'You look for opportunities to mentor, lead and develop others', 'Check out what our teams have done for some of our clients by visiting our Client Stories!', "You will create amazing, custom software solutions that solve our clients' most challenging problems using a combination of industry standard and cutting-edge technologies. You will work on complex, high-volume software solutions that use open source frameworks and client-side technologies. A typical client engagement includes developing a rich UI in AngularJS or React and backed by a REST API powered by the Spring Framework.", 'You have a degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or MIS', 'Open Technology Solutions is Credera’s largest practice and focuses on building custom software solutions and integrations for our clients leveraging open source technologies', 'Our foundational competitive advantage is simply doing what we say we will do. To deliver on that advantage, we employ proven product strategy, beautiful visual design and agile software delivery using cross-functional teams. Most teams are a mix of strategy, design and technology consultants working closely with clients to solve their toughest challenges. Inter-discipline collaboration is encouraged among different technology platforms or programming languages because silos don’t build speed.', "Fortune's\xa0Best Small & Medium Workplaces\xa0", 'Your first two years with us', 'On a typical day, you might expect to implement new services, automate infrastructure as code, or collect and analyze data for cloud readiness and security assessments. You will be expected to mentor junior team members and lead small teams in the execution of different work streams. You will also work directly with clients to assist, or lead, your team in demos and other presentations and develop your leadership skills.', 'A talented and driven software engineer that wants to work on challenging and complex technology problems with a smart and highly effective teamYou have a passion for open source technologies and the art of software engineeringYou look for opportunities to mentor, lead and develop othersYou have strong communication and interpersonal skillsYou have a degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or MIS', 'You have strong communication and interpersonal skills', 'Technologies we frequently work with include the Spring Framework, AngularJS, React, Elastic Search, Redis, Spark, Kafka, AWS and Azure', 'We want you to start your career with Credera simply by spending your first week getting to know the talented individuals that work here. You will learn about our service offerings, focus areas and how we execute projects through informal conversations with leaders from across the firm.', 'Your first week with us ', 'Learn More', "Credera is a full-service management consulting, user experience, and technology solutions firm, with clients ranging from Fortune 500 companies to emerging industry leadersCredera has received a number of state and national awards, including:Fortune's\xa0Best Small & Medium Workplaces\xa0Fortune's\xa0Best Workplaces in Consulting & Professional Services\xa0Fortune's\xa0100 Best Workplace for Millennials\xa0Fortune's\xa0Best Workplaces in Texas100 Best Companies to Work for in Texas by Texas Monthly Magazine7-time awardee on\xa0Inc. Magazine's\xa0annual Inc. 500 listOpen Technology Solutions is Credera’s largest practice and focuses on building custom software solutions and integrations for our clients leveraging open source technologiesTechnologies we frequently work with include the Spring Framework, AngularJS, React, Elastic Search, Redis, Spark, Kafka, AWS and AzureProgramming languages we frequently use include Java, Python, Scala and Ruby", 'Client Stories!', "Fortune's\xa0Best Workplaces in Texas", 'As a Senior Software Engineer at Credera, you will own your daily delivery tasks as part of a technology implementation team to implement technology solutions for clients. You will also be responsible for helping the team design and estimate implementation tasks, leading implementation work streams, and mentoring team members. Team projects range from cloud enablement, to DevOps transformation, to IT assessments and strategy. In addition, you will be expected to support practice and company development through research and development, peer training, and reusable solution accelerator development.', 'Credera has received a number of state and national awards, including:', 'A talented and driven software engineer that wants to work on challenging and complex technology problems with a smart and highly effective team', 'Along with a great company culture, Credera provides an outstanding compensation package including a competitive salary and a comprehensive benefit plan (e.g., medical, dental, disability, matching 401k, PTO, etc.).\xa0This position is an exempt position.\xa0', 'Glassdoor reviews ', 'You have a passion for open source technologies and the art of software engineering', 'Credera is a full-service management consulting, user experience, and technology solutions firm, with clients ranging from Fortune 500 companies to emerging industry leaders', 'WHO WE ARE:']

reactive programming (Combine, Rx, ReactiveSwift, or the like).Have experience with GraphQL and ApolloHave experience with continuous build systems.', "FanDuel is an equal opportunities employer. Diversity and inclusion in FanDuel means that we respect and value everyone as individuals. We don't tolerate bias, judgment or harassment. Our focus is on developing employees so that they reach their full potential.", 'Working in a full stack product delivery team, you will work on a range of exciting customer facing projects utilizing languages, technologies and platforms that include: iOS: Objective-C, Swift', "There's more, but we don't want to go on and on.", 'Beyond working with such a great team?', 'FanDuel Group is a world-class team of brands and products all built with one goal in mind —\xa0to give fans new and innovative ways to interact with their favorite games, sports, teams, and leagues. That’s no easy task, which is why we’re so dedicated to building a winning team. And make no mistake, we are here to win, but we believe in winning right. That means we’ll never compromise when it comes to looking out for our teammates. From our many opportunities for professional development to our generous insurance and paid leave policies, we’re committed to making sure our employees get as much out of FanDuel as we ask them to give.', 'FanDuel Group is based in New York, with offices in California, New Jersey, Florida, Oregon and Scotland. Our brands include:', 'Personal learning and development opportunities', 'Understanding of modern architecture patterns like Model-View-View Model (MVVM).', "Working at FanDuel provides the opportunity to impact the lives of millions of sports fans through the code you write and where you'll work with and learn from multi-award winning highly entrepreneurial and ambitious teams."]

job_title: Ground Software Engineer (Project Lead, Senior, & Mid-level)
job_text: ['Highly motivated, self-starting, and able to perform duties autonomously without supervision', "Experience with C/C++, Python, or other high-level object-oriented programming language (s)High competency with JavaScript (React, Angular, or similar framework)Experience with system-level architecture and big data designCloud development using Amazon Web Services (AWS)Highly motivated, self-starting, and able to perform duties autonomously without supervisionDon't meet them all? Not a problem. Please apply even if you do not meet all these criteria.", '\xa0', 'Experience with C/C++, Python, or other high-level object-oriented programming language (s)', 'Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to define software requirements, architectures, and designs', 'Experience in satellite operations', 'U.S. CITIZENSHIP OR GREEN CARD REQUIRED', 'High competency with JavaScript (React, Angular, or similar framework)', "Don't meet them all? Not a problem. Please apply even if you do not meet all these criteria.", 'Design, build and implement our ground software system for GEOSat-1', 'Design high-performance, reliable, mission-critical software that sends commands to space!', 'Experience with system-level architecture and big data design', 'Experience with tools such as JIRA, Jenkins, and Docker', 'Experience developing proprietary/commercial or open-source satellite operations software (COSMOS, Major Tom, etc.)Experience in satellite operationsExperience with tools such as JIRA, Jenkins, and Docker', 'Requirements', 'We’re a well-funded team of over 100 world-class engineers that move fast. We raised our Series B ($90M) from Andreessen Horowitz and Venrock, launched our first satellite in 2018, secured our first major customer deal in 2019, and we’ll triple the satellite internet capacity of Alaska in 2021.\xa0', 'Our mission and our products are meant to connect the world and everyone in it, regardless of gender, race, creed, or any other distinction. We believe in a diverse and inclusive workplace, and we encourage all people to join our team and bring their unique perspective to help make us stronger.', '(Note: This is due to U.S. export regulations, and we are unable to make exceptions.)', 'Design, build and implement our ground software system for GEOSat-1Work closely with our operations and satellite teams to build command interfaces and telemetry screens that enable safe, efficient, and elegant command and control of our satellite throughout its missionDesign high-performance, reliable, mission-critical software that sends commands to space!Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to define software requirements, architectures, and designs', 'Bonus', 'Four billion people do not have access to the internet. Astranis is going to change that. We are building the next generation of smaller, lower-cost telecommunications satellites to bring the world online.\xa0', 'Role', 'Come work with incredibly smart people who have flown things in space before. You just need to enjoy getting your hands dirty with real hardware and be okay with struggling to do things that seem impossibly hard.', 'Cloud development using Amazon Web Services (AWS)', 'Work closely with our operations and satellite teams to build command interfaces and telemetry screens that enable safe, efficient, and elegant command and control of our satellite throughout its mission', 'Experience developing proprietary/commercial or open-source satellite operations software (COSMOS, Major Tom, etc.)']

['', ' Design and build systems to ingest, track, monitor, and expose data about the entirety of our storage ecosystem Build automation around all phases of the storage lifecycle, eliminating toil, automating responses to failures, and generally eliminating as much operational work as possible Design stable and performant systems through writing maintainable, extensible code Keep up with the best ideas and practices in the industry, as well as contribute new ideas', ' Hands-on software development experience in Python Proficiency in software engineering principles with an interest in infrastructure Familiarity with web services and REST APIs', ' Build automation around all phases of the storage lifecycle, eliminating toil, automating responses to failures, and generally eliminating as much operational work as possible', ' Keep up with the best ideas and practices in the industry, as well as contribute new ideas', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', "Data is at the heart of Bloomberg's technologies, which produce and distribute some of the most critical and valuable data in global business. The Storage API team provides the software layer that sits on top of Bloomberg's storage technologies, providing a unified set of APIs and data tools to automate, monitor, and provide visibility into Bloomberg's entire storage ecosystem. We use modern technologies and frameworks such as Flask, Apache Airflow, React, and more. We are always looking to bring in new technologies that would fit our use cases and improve our products and systems.", "This is a unique opportunity to help build the future of Bloomberg's automated storage infrastructure. We work on a diverse set of projects and technologies, and will trust you to help design and build an entirely new set of systems from the ground up.", ' Experience with workflow automation frameworks such as Apache Airflow', ' Experience with Flask, React, or node.js Experience with workflow automation frameworks such as Apache Airflow Domain knowledge of networked and/or cloud storage Contributions to open source projects', ' Contributions to open source projects', ' Design stable and performant systems through writing maintainable, extensible code', ' Design and build systems to ingest, track, monitor, and expose data about the entirety of our storage ecosystem', ' Domain knowledge of networked and/or cloud storage', ' Experience with Flask, React, or node.js', ' Familiarity with web services and REST APIs', ' Proficiency in software engineering principles with an interest in infrastructure', "We're looking for strong software engineers with great coding, problem solving, and communication skills. Domain knowledge in storage is a plus but absolutely not required.", ' Hands-on software development experience in Python']

['', 'This is a hands-on engineering position and includes traveling to support field tests. This position supports product development, integration and testing to verify requirements on tracked and wheeled military vehicle platforms including M2 BFV, M7 BFIST, M270 MLRS, ACV 1.1 and others. The broad variety of responsibilities and skills include: test requirements analysis, decomposition and test plan development; test environment design and set-up (including control systems and instrumentation); test execution; and test reporting. Vehicle (system) level testing includes software/hardware verification testing in a lab environment and field testing for vehicle performance, durability, navigation, targeting and weapon system testing. Component level testing includes engineering, development and qualification tests for thermal, shock, vibration, hydraulic, airflow, electrical, loading and cyclic tests. ', 'System or component level integration and testing experience including instrumentation and data acquisition setup, and data analysis. ? Experience with CAN Bus and/or MIL-STD-1553 Bus, and familiarity with monitoring and analysis tools. ? Test fixture design using CREO/Pro Engineer and/or other physical based modeling skills. ? Advanced data processing, analysis, and presentation (MATLAB, VBA, etc). ? Experience with Vibration, Shock, ESS and HALT testing skills. ? Training in spectral analysis relative to vibration testing, mechatronics skills, automotive design, or related test experience are preferred. ? Ability to obtain a security clearance. ? Veterans with applicable training/experience are highly encouraged to apply.', "Typically a bachelor's degree in engineering and 6+ years relevant experience. We may consider additional experience in lieu of a degree. ? Core engineering background in Mechanical, Electrical, Mechatronics, or Aerospace. ?  Mechanical aptitude with hands-on abilities and strong troubleshooting skills. Ability to travel for a month at a time.", 'MUST BE A US CITIZEN (DOD RELATED).  Support a Forune 500 Aero-Defense Company as a Test Engineer.   Note:  this is not an IT or Web Test role. ', 'Advanced skills to be developed include custom instrumentation setup, lab and on vehicle operational testing, data analysis and reporting. Designs, develops, and implements testing methods and equipment. Plans and arranges the labor, schedules, and equipment required for testing and evaluating standard and special devices. Provides test area with parameters for sample testing and specifies tests to be performed. Compiles data and defines changes required in testing equipment, testing procedures, manufacturing processes, or new testing requirements.', '6 years of relevant experience.', 'Employee will be eligible for applicable per diem during travel. Travel is expected locally to a location approximately 2.5 hours South of San Jose for up to a month at a time.']

job_title: Lead Test Automation Engineer (NYC or Remote)
job_text: ['', 'Plan for the future: 401k with up to 4% match', 'Continued Learning: $1,000 yearly continuing education stipend', 'Help us make a great product better.', 'Thorough familiarity with front-end and back-end testing practices (we use React/JavaScript and microservices built in Python and Go)', 'An experienced engineer who is passionate about automated testing and who has learned through several years of experience in the field', 'A desire to constantly improve your skills and the software system', 'Define and set our expectations around good and bad software tests', 'Amazing culture that emphasizes Hard Work, High Standards, Hunger, Helpfulness, and Humility. Learn more here', 'Proven ability to guide and influence the testing practices of an organization', 'Lead the engineering testing practice to', 'What’s CB Insights All About', 'An analytical and detail-oriented mindset with strong communication skills', 'All of the work for this position will be performed in the U.S. As such, in compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.', 'Your Main Tasks', 'Equal', 'Guide and evangelize our overall software testing process', ' Guide and evangelize our overall software testing process Coordinate the implementation of our testing infrastructure across various languages and software disciplines Define and set our expectations around good and bad software tests ', 'Strong programming skills obtained through any means (self-thought, code academy, university degree or any other way)', 'Experience with, and a desire to, follow an Agile and Lean approach to software development (we follow a variant of Scrum and use Jira)', 'Rest and Relax: Competitive vacation and holiday plans ', 'We know that diversity makes for the best problem-solving and creative thinking. We are dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team and encourage everyone to apply if your experience is close to what we are looking for. ', 'Comfortable working with engineers that are remote as well as from the local office', 'What You Bring To The Table', 'Provide technical guidance to our Test Engineers on the various software teams', 'Refuel: In office daily lunch stipend, unlimited snacks/coffee', 'Be Healthy: Health with HSA and FSA options, dental, and vision insurance along with unlimited/take what you need sick day policy', 'Employer:', ' An experienced engineer who is passionate about automated testing and who has learned through several years of experience in the field Strong programming skills obtained through any means (self-thought, code academy, university degree or any other way) Thorough familiarity with front-end and back-end testing practices (we use React/JavaScript and microservices built in Python and Go) Proven ability to guide and influence the testing practices of an organization A desire to constantly improve your skills and the software system An analytical and detail-oriented mindset with strong communication skills Comfortable working with engineers that are remote as well as from the local office Experience with, and a desire to, follow an Agile and Lean approach to software development (we follow a variant of Scrum and use Jira) ', ' Lead the engineering testing practice to', 'Work with test engineers and product managers to create detailed testing plans for projects', 'The Perks', 'A newsletter that 650k+ people follow: Sign up here.', ' Amazing culture that emphasizes Hard Work, High Standards, Hunger, Helpfulness, and Humility. Learn more here A newsletter that 650k+ people follow: Sign up here. Be Healthy: Health with HSA and FSA options, dental, and vision insurance along with unlimited/take what you need sick day policy Plan for the future: 401k with up to 4% match Continued Learning: $1,000 yearly continuing education stipend Rest and Relax: Competitive vacation and holiday plans  Refuel: In office daily lunch stipend, unlimited snacks/coffee ', 'Coordinate the implementation of our testing infrastructure across various languages and software disciplines', 'Opportunity']

['', 'About Arteza:', 'Write high quality, advanced-level code to implement strategic capabilities for Arteza\xa0', 'Produce detailed designs for software systems to be built by yourself and a team of junior to mid-level engineers that you will lead.', '10+ years experience in server-side development languages like GoLang, Java, and Python', 'Familiarity with software designs that run in a cloud environment (AWS / GCP) and with devops tools used to manage SDLC.\xa0', 'Provide technical feedback to teammates through code reviews and specific mentorship', 'Arteza\xa0is revolutionizing the Art Supply industry as one of the fastest growing brands and e-commerce retailers in the country. Recognized as the #1 fastest growing private company in South Florida, and ranked #32 on the Inc. 5000 list for 2020, we offer a convenient way to shop for art supplies coupled with a highly innovative product offering. Headquartered next to the beaches of Miami, we are quickly expanding the team. If you are interested in working in a fast paced, start-up environment with highly motivated entrepreneurs, this is the place for you.', '\xa0', 'Requirements:', 'Write high quality, advanced-level code to implement strategic capabilities for Arteza\xa0Produce detailed designs for software systems to be built by yourself and a team of junior to mid-level engineers that you will lead.Interact with business stakeholders to understand their functional requirements and drive feature development to meet business objectivesMentor and coach developers and business teams on best practices in software engineeringProvide ecommerce, marketing, sales, content, website, and other domain expertise that steers business decision-making toward the best technical and functional solutions\xa0Provide technical feedback to teammates through code reviews and specific mentorship', '10+ experience building back-end solutions in which a frontend website, mobile app, and other clients are decoupled from backend services', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills', 'Arteza\xa0is seeking a motivated, goal oriented, results driven Senior\xa0GoLang Software Engineer.\xa0This role is located in North Miami Beach, FL. Our team is growing and if you are passionate about e-commerce and career growth, an opportunity at Arteza may be a great match!', 'Provide ecommerce, marketing, sales, content, website, and other domain expertise that steers business decision-making toward the best technical and functional solutions\xa0', 'Interact with business stakeholders to understand their functional requirements and drive feature development to meet business objectives', 'GoLang Software Engineer.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Mentor and coach developers and business teams on best practices in software engineering', '\ufeffOur opportunity:', 'Experience planning, documenting, and implementing relational databases', 'Arteza', '10+ experience building back-end solutions in which a frontend website, mobile app, and other clients are decoupled from backend services10+ years experience in server-side development languages like GoLang, Java, and PythonExperience building backend software solutions in a microservices environment utilizing Kubernetes, gRPC / REST, envoy / IsTio / AppMesh, and other similar technologiesFamiliarity with software designs that run in a cloud environment (AWS / GCP) and with devops tools used to manage SDLC.\xa0Experience planning, documenting, and implementing relational databasesExcellent verbal and written communication skills', 'Experience building backend software solutions in a microservices environment utilizing Kubernetes, gRPC / REST, envoy / IsTio / AppMesh, and other similar technologies']

['', 'The main function of a software engineer is to apply the principles of computer science and mathematical analysis to the design, development, testing, and evaluation of the software and systems that make computers work. This role has 60% development and 40% of Ops responsibilities. ['', '\xa0collaborative and inclusive', "*Open to remote work location within Fulton Bank's 5 state footprint of PA, NJ, MD, DE, VA*", '5 or more years Database Administrator, Database developer, Data Engineer . (Required)', '\xa0', 'work-life balance', 'Design, develop, test and implement database solutions related to optimal data pipeline architecture and infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL, SSIS, Oracle and Big Data technologies, in accordance with established standards. Develop and implement controls to ensure data integrity and regulatory compliance. Participate in peer reviews of solution designs and related code. Package and support deployment of releases. Work with business requestors, BAs and Business Relationship Manager to refine the business requirements and ensure that sufficient detail is provided to guide design, development and testing.', 'Fulton Bank (“Fulton”) is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to providing equal employment opportunity for all qualified persons. Fulton will recruit, hire, train and promote persons in all job titles, and ensure that all other personnel actions are administered, without regard to race, color, religion, creed, sexual orientation, national origin, citizenship, gender, gender identity, age, genetic information, marital status, disability, covered veteran status, or any other legally protected status.', "Collaborates within the business and operations units of the Corporation to design, develop, test, deliver and maintain data engineering solutions that support the Corporation's business. Mentor and guide fellow data engineers.", 'Experience:', 'EEO Statement', 'This role may perform other job duties as assigned by the manager.
