This includes but is not limited to, understanding and identifying compliance risks impacting their department(s), ensuring compliance with applicable laws or regulations, and escalating compliance risks to the appropriate level of management.', 'Responsible for maintaining the integrity and performance of company databases and guarantee that data is stored securely and optimally. Monitor the production schedule and provide support to remediate job failures. Leverage technology to automate routine processes. Monitor and tune databases for which we are responsible and direct the work of vendors where they are responsible for the Database Administrator function. Support enterprise wide compliance with enterprise standards, processes and policies.', 'Overview:', 'Our values define us and our culture inspires us to\xa0change lives for the better.\xa0Our employees are the heart and soul of our company and every success we experience begins with them. We hire team members who raise the bar, who are\xa0collaborative and inclusive, who build relationships, and who are looking for a long-term career with Fulton Bank. We strive to promote a culture of\xa0work-life balance, to unplug and recharge to be your best self, at work and at home.', 'As a condition of employment, individuals must be authorized to work in the United States without sponsorship for a work visa by Fulton Bank currently or in the future.', 'Bachelor Degree or the Equivalent Experience. ['', 'Work from home & Home office reimbursements', 'We have an open floor plan for easy collaboration and plenty of free drinks and snacks to keep you nourished throughout the day. Additionally, Point provides catered lunch every Monday and Wednesday.', 'PERKS AT POINT', 'Championed by the best', 'Collaborate with the design team and product managers to create an engaging and transparent customer experience', 'ABOUT US', '\xa0', 'Point participates in the Caltrain GoPass program which provides an unlimited train pass for work and personal travel. Alternatively, team members commuting by car will receive a free parking permit.', 'Equity range: 0.02% – 0.035%', 'Generous vacation & Flexibility', 'Innovative -- You take the initiative to find new ways to solve problems. You help the team understand your point of view and advocate for great solutions.', 'YOU ARE', 'Build analytics tools to capture and use data to drive risk and pricing algorithms and inform marketing spend', 'Here at Point, we’re helping homeowners unlock the equity in their homes without taking on further debt. With an investment from Point, homeowners can de-leverage and diversify their wealth, freeing them up to invest in their business, renovate and maintain their home, eliminate debt, and tackle all of life’s expenses from college tuition to medical bills. Our equity investment product is an advantageous alternative for homeowners and investors alike. When partnering with Point, investors now have access to a brand new asset class - homeowner-occupied residential real estate. Point is the first fintech product that is truly aligned with consumers’ interests - when the homeowner does well, Point and its investors do well.', 'If you love engineering and are passionate about creating software that makes a meaningful difference to our customers’ financial health, you belong at Point.', 'As a consumer fintech company, we embed integrity, transparency, and trust into everything we do at Point, including how we work. Whether you’re a homeowner, investor, employee, or candidate, it’s people who power our business. We keep the human experience top of mind.', 'Streamline the underwriting process to improve efficiency and accuracy while delivering cash to homeowners faster', 'Continued Learning', 'Bright office with amenities\xa0', 'Quality driven -- You are able to work fast and deliver fast, check your work and take pride in shipping quality.', 'Point will top off California PFL earnings to full salary for up to six weeks, as well as two weeks of fully paid leave to be available after exhaustion of CA PFL. An employee can take reasonable vacation time in addition to the California PFL leave.', 'In 2019, Point closed a $22M Series B led by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), Prudential Financial, and DAG Ventures. We’ve received funding from Ribbit Capital, Greylock, SV Angel, and Bloomberg Beta as well.', 'Our Product', "\xa0**Please note: Point's Engineering Team will work remotely through June 2021**", 'Point provides platinum-rated plans for medical (Anthem Blue Cross or Kaiser Permanente), dental and vision (The Standard). We cover 99% of employee premiums and 75% of dependent premiums.', 'Family Friendly', 'Experts at work', 'Our tech stack is anchored by Ruby on Rails, React, and PostgreSQL.', 'We encourage all team members to attend events hosted by our investors, external workshops and conferences. We believe in continuous improvement and want to support employees on their professional journeys.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Health Insurance', 'Staying fit', 'Design and engineer the marketplace tech to make shared equity financing a great option for homeowners and investorsCollaborate with the design team and product managers to create an engaging and transparent customer experienceBuild analytics tools to capture and use data to drive risk and pricing algorithms and inform marketing spendAutomate data collection from multiple vendors and data sources and organize and index that dataStreamline the underwriting process to improve efficiency and accuracy while delivering cash to homeowners faster', 'Quality driven -- You are able to work fast and deliver fast, check your work and take pride in shipping quality.Innovative -- You take the initiative to find new ways to solve problems. You help the team understand your point of view and advocate for great solutions.Expert -- You know a couple of languages cold and learning new technologies is standard fare.\xa0Specialization at one level of the stack (front-end, back-end, etc.) is great, but expect to work on everything from front-end to the database to the deployment as the need arises.Experienced -- We don’t count years, but you should have some solid work experience under your belt. Expect to hit the ground running.', 'Take time for yourself and your family when you want - Point has an unlimited vacation policy. Also, enjoy a flexible work schedule so you can be at your best. We care about productivity and accountability, not face time.', 'Annual salary range: $150,000 – $180,000', 'We’re on a mission to help the 23 million equity-rich, but cash-constrained Americans tap into their home’s wealth. To do so, we have experience and expertise in all areas of the business, especially at the helm. Point’s leadership have previously founded TrialPay (acquired by Visa), Yub (acquired by Coupons.com), Metails (acquired by Buy.com), SiteAdvisor (acquired by McAfee), Affirm, SendGrid (acquired by Twilio), and TXN (acquired by Envestnet).', "Our employee's health and safety are top of mind for us! Due to COVID-19, all of our employees are working from home until June 2021. Additionally, we provide our employees with a home internet allowance and home office expense reimbursement to help ease the transition to remote working.", 'People first', 'Design and engineer the marketplace tech to make shared equity financing a great option for homeowners and investors', 'Expert -- You know a couple of languages cold and learning new technologies is standard fare.\xa0Specialization at one level of the stack (front-end, back-end, etc.) is great, but expect to work on everything from front-end to the database to the deployment as the need arises.', 'ROLE OVERVIEW', 'Our Team', 'COMPENSATION', 'Automate data collection from multiple vendors and data sources and organize and index that data', 'Transportation', 'Point provides a monthly stipend to cover a 45 credit ClassPass membership - see you at Barry’s Bootcamp!', 'You will be an integral part of a tight-knit engineering team working to design and implement new features, improve our architecture and take the lead to launch new products.', '“Point provides the opportunity to stabilize your financial situation without adding costly monthly payments.” - Homeowner in Burlingame, CA', 'Experienced -- We don’t count years, but you should have some solid work experience under your belt. Expect to hit the ground running.']

As Systems Engineer your responsibilities will be, but are not limited to: - Work closely with team of Architects, analysts and in-vehicle systems engineers of cross-functional teams to gain in-depth understanding of EC business strategies, Connectivity Products landscape and functionality - Develop technical specifications including Architecture, Functional and Non-Functional for both system level and sub-system level - Support in developing the Vehicle Communication platform strategies to align with EC priorities, product and vehicle program launches - Develop precise and audience focused documentation/specification by applying industry standard technologies, modeling methodologies and concepts - Play Product owner role for Vehicle Communications and Data platform product teams to develop user stories, manage the backlog and prioritization - Participate and support all phases of product development activities to launch the products globally', 'Project Management : RFP, proposal, product roadmap, project charter, project initiation, project, program planning / control / monitoring, requirement management, cross-functional stakeholder management, process adherence, project execution, change request, issue management, Scrum, product backlog, Design, APIs design, risk management, configuration management, release / delivery management, customer communication, Continuous Integration / Delivery, Project / Program closure.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Skills Required:', 'Driving system solution architecture, adept at overseeing all facets of project / product development (Requirement, Architecture, Design, Coding, Testing),product long-term strategy to drive the product / project roadmap. ', 'Leadership in technology management, dive deep new technology area, product roadmap and technical / feature specifications\xa0', 'Data Wireless Communication, Cloud, IoT, Connected Vehicle Telematics / Automotive. ']

['', 'You can trust us to...', 'TypeScript, Python, GraphQL, and AWS LambdaAWS EMR and AWS LambdaApache Spark for ETL developmentC#, Java, and Scala chops are nice to have :)', 'be the best friend of progress', 'We are growing our tribe and looking for a diverse slate of individuals to help us democratize access to the financial data that reduces perceived risk in Africa and beyond. We love our product, but we love our people more, recognizing that without them, none of this would be possible. We know there is so much talent out there, with so much to offer, but who feel lost or unappreciated in their current position. We want to invite those folks to join Pngme. In case you missed it, we’re an API first data platform. As it so happens, we are in need of a Lead Backend Engineer to scale our API and data infrastructure to process millions of data points a day to our growing list of customers.', 'trust you', 'allow you to move fast and make mistakes', 'communicate our expectations and keep you updated as plans change', 'Some of the technologies you like and what you’ll be working with', 'As the Lead Backend Engineer you will work directly with the founding team to lead the backend engineering team as we scale up. You will architect and go hands on to build the infrastructure needed to process our data and serve it up strcutured to our customers through our Unified Data API. Success in this role will only come from a relationship based in trust, leadership, and teamwork.', 'At Pngme, we are building a data platform to change the way individuals, entrepreneurs, and businesses access finance in sub-Saharan Africa. Financial institutions use our data to make mission critical decisions that drive access to finance in sub-Saharan Africa. While capital is plentiful, it does not flow equally. Why? Without access to the right data, financial institutions cannot properly measure risk or develop financial products tailored to their customers! Africa is the fastest growing developer ecosystem in the world, but there is still a high barrier to entry for developers to access holistic financial data on their customers. It is Pngme’s mission to democratize developers’ access to data and close the finance gap for millions of individuals, entrepreneurs, and businesses in sub-Saharan Africa.', 'We see value in providing equal access to capital so people can increase their wealth and opportunity, despite their limited resources. By providing access to data, we enable financial institutions to deploy their capital and make data-driven decisions to drive the growth of their business. It isn’t just access to data, it’s also a matter of putting data ownership back into the hands of people. With equal access and ownership of data, we give people financial choice and freedom.', 'thoughtfully architect platforms and systems that will scale to millions of users and billions of data points', 'We will trust you to...', 'C#, Java, and Scala chops are nice to have :)', 'have the experience to manage a passionate and smart team of engineers while going hands on to deliver your own code', 'AWS EMR and AWS Lambda', 'provide a playground of opportunity, and the people you need to be sucessful', 'feel comfortable taking risks', 'treat you as the expert you are', 'have the experience to manage a passionate and smart team of engineers while going hands on to deliver your own codethoughtfully architect platforms and systems that will scale to millions of users and billions of data pointsbe someone who can come through the firefeel comfortable taking risksbe the best friend of progresstrust us', 'You know Kiva (Oakland) as a mission-driven platform focused on expanding access to finance to help underserved entrepreneurs and communities thrive. We provide the data layer that enables financial institutions like Kiva to operate successfully.', 'be someone who can come through the fire', 'trust us', 'TypeScript, Python, GraphQL, and AWS Lambda', 'Apache Spark for ETL development', 'give you a leadership roleprovide a playground of opportunity, and the people you need to be sucessfultreat you as the expert you areallow you to move fast and make mistakescommunicate our expectations and keep you updated as plans changetrust you', 'give you a leadership role']

job_title: Principal IT Data Engineer, Advanced Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Advanced Analytics Team', 'At Raytheon, we work together as one global team creating trusted, innovative solutions to make the world a safer place. Our innovation spans all domains: from land and sea to air, space and cyberspace. We’re inspired by a noble mission that’s shared by Raytheon employees around the globe and an inclusive culture that empowers employees and celebrates their contributions.', 'Date posted\xa010/05/2020', 'Ability to obtain a US Government Clearance when necessary to support specific programs in the future. Except in rare cases, only US Citizens are eligible to obtain US Security Clearances', 'Process complex, large-scale data sets used for modeling, data mining, and research', 'Job ID\xa0169636BR', 'State\xa0MA', 'Experience as a Software Engineer, Infrastructure Engineer, Software Developer, DevOps Engineer or Data Engineer', 'Businesses', 'Relocation eligible', 'Stand-up, maintain, and update data processing infrastructures in partnership with data architects and infrastructure engineers', '8+ years total professional experience with Bachelor’s Degree. Over 10 years of directly applicable experience will be considered in lieu of degree.', 'City', 'Demonstrable experience working with stakeholders and analysts to gather requirements for deployment of artificial intelligence applications at scale.', 'Identify and create new derivatives and/or aggregations of data to be used across multiple functions, products, and markets', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred.', 'Clearance type\xa0None / Not Required', 'The selected applicant is required to obtain a US Government Clearance when necessary to support specific programs in the future. Except in rare cases, only US Citizens are eligible to obtain US Security Clearances.', 'Relocation support is available at a capped budget to be discussed with the applicant of choice at the proper time, if the person is eligible per company policy.', 'Principal Data Engineer', 'Background in all aspects of software engineering with strong skills in parallel data processing, data flows, REST APIs, JSON, XML and microservice architecture', 'Raytheon Missiles & Defense Digital Technology (RMD DT)', 'Clearance type', 'Design and development experience on Hadoop ecosystem (Hadoop, Hbase, PIG, Hive, and MapReduce) including two or more of the following related technologies – Scala, SPARK, Sqoop, Flume, Kafka, and Python', 'Relocation eligible\xa0Yes', 'Required Education (including Major):', 'Work with product teams and data scientists to improve the efficiency and speed of computational modelsStand-up, maintain, and update data processing infrastructures in partnership with data architects and infrastructure engineersIdentify and create new derivatives and/or aggregations of data to be used across multiple functions, products, and marketsProcess complex, large-scale data sets used for modeling, data mining, and researchValidate advanced models in support of advanced analytical applications through data quality profiling and leveraging tools for programmatically monitoring and refining production machine learning applicationsProvide consulting and investigative expertise to partners and customers on data problems or questions about the scope and potential uses of data to achieve business valueLeverage diversity of technical skills to lead design and sustainment of data pipelines and data warehousing for data ingested/integrated from legacy enterprise systems, streaming sources, web scraped sources, purchased data feeds, APIs, etc.', 'If you’re a team player passionate about data and emerging technologies—and you possess a relentless drive to improve how business is done—take a look at this Data Engineer opportunity on our Advanced Analytics team.', 'Businesses\xa0Raytheon Missiles & Defense', 'Raytheon Technologies is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.', 'Are you passionate about data', 'Expert designing data warehousing and best practices around implementing processes for loading data', 'envision, build and help sustain analytics data environments and pipelines for the Raytheon internal business users', 'City\xa0Andover', '5+ years of development experience with Python', '5+ years of advanced experience with SQL scripting and database management systems such as Microsoft SQL DB or Oracle DB', 'Country', 'Responsibilities of Role:', 'Experience as a Software Engineer, Infrastructure Engineer, Software Developer, DevOps Engineer or Data Engineer5+ years of development experience with PythonDemonstrable experience working with complex distributed systems5+ years of advanced experience with SQL scripting and database management systems such as Microsoft SQL DB or Oracle DBExpert designing data warehousing and best practices around implementing processes for loading dataExtensive Linux server management background', 'Validate advanced models in support of advanced analytical applications through data quality profiling and leveraging tools for programmatically monitoring and refining production machine learning applications', 'Leverage diversity of technical skills to lead design and sustainment of data pipelines and data warehousing for data ingested/integrated from legacy enterprise systems, streaming sources, web scraped sources, purchased data feeds, APIs, etc.', 'Country\xa0United States', 'Demonstrable experience working with stakeholders and analysts to gather requirements for deployment of artificial intelligence applications at scale.Ability to obtain a US Government Clearance when necessary to support specific programs in the future. Except in rare cases, only US Citizens are eligible to obtain US Security ClearancesStrong understanding and hands-on programming/scripting experience skills—UNIX shell, Perl, and JavaScriptDesign and development experience on Hadoop ecosystem (Hadoop, Hbase, PIG, Hive, and MapReduce) including two or more of the following related technologies – Scala, SPARK, Sqoop, Flume, Kafka, and PythonWorking knowledge of container technologies like Docker and KubernetesBackground in all aspects of software engineering with strong skills in parallel data processing, data flows, REST APIs, JSON, XML and microservice architectureAdvanced Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred', '169636', 'Working knowledge of container technologies like Docker and Kubernetes', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred.8+ years total professional experience with Bachelor’s Degree. Over 10 years of directly applicable experience will be considered in lieu of degree.', 'Date posted', 'Advanced Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Science, Mathematics or a Technical Discipline strongly preferred', 'Desired Skills:', 'Job ID', 'Are you passionate about data, software engineering, and enabling the promise of Artificial Intelligence through the optimized deployment of Machine Learning systems at scale? Our team at Raytheon seeks a production focused data engineer who enjoys contributing to the realization of business value rather than pure research. The candidate will execute their mission through working across functional and business areas to research, develop, architect and execute leading-edge IT solutions focused on data integration, information management and advanced analytics. The candidate will be relied upon to\xa0envision, build and help sustain analytics data environments and pipelines for the Raytheon internal business users. Solutions and applications will span our manufacturing, engineering, supply chain, and quality control functions. There will also be opportunities to contribute to developing external customer research and solutions.', 'Work with product teams and data scientists to improve the efficiency and speed of computational models', 'Extensive Linux server management background', 'Provide consulting and investigative expertise to partners and customers on data problems or questions about the scope and potential uses of data to achieve business value', 'Strong understanding and hands-on programming/scripting experience skills—UNIX shell, Perl, and JavaScript', 'Demonstrable experience working with complex distributed systems', 'Required Skills:', 'State']

proactive and willing to take ownership.', 'Knowledge of operational support tool technologies: ELK, Splunk, Prometheus, InfluxDB, Grafana', 'The Next Generation Access Networks organization is a highly agile, fast paced and dedicated group responsible for the network serving our customers representing over 400,000 miles of fiber-coax plant and the delivery of 115+ Tbps of edge capacity to our customers. We lead and oversees the delivery of every service and every bit that is delivered to the home. The group also owns the design, development, construction and incubation of next-gen access architectures for residential, multi-family, and commercial networks. This includes the delivery of DOCSIS 3.1 powered gig Internet services, The transition to NFV/SDN on the Access network by virtualizing the CMTS core and transition to new digital nodes. The software applications we are building is a containerized, microservice-based, cloud-deployed services.We are working to bring X1 innovation and the power of network virtualization and software defined networks to the data delivery world. ['', 'Role Description', 'Form Energy is a small team of passionate people committed to helping the world transition to renewable energy with technology. We are developing a new class of ultra-low cost, long duration energy storage systems to make renewable energy available even when the sun sets, or the wind stops blowing. Form’s technology has the potential to transform the electric grid by making renewable energy dispatchable year-round. The company’s core technology was invented at MIT and is supported by category leading investors including Breakthrough Energy Ventures, The Engine, and Prelude Ventures. Our team members are active learners who like working on tough technology problems that can only be solved with a combination of technical innovation and hard work. We are looking for world-class people to help us change the way the world uses energy! ', 'Has a flexible working style: Can “wear many hats” and step into individual contributor roles, when necessary. ', 'Has excellent organizational, communication, and presentation skills. ', 'About Us ', 'Drives projects to completion. ', 'Proven track record of architecting and delivering scalable and elegant production software solutions. ', 'Help establish best software engineering practices and tools. ', 'Sets own scope and follows through. ', '5+ years of professional experience in a software engineering leadership role. ', '5+ years of professional experience in a software engineering leadership role. Proven track record of architecting and delivering scalable and elegant production software solutions. Current software design and coding proficiency in a variety of software languages. Python is a must. An experienced manager and mentor. A generous team player. Passionate about contributing own knowledge and expertise to enrich the team; curious and excited about learning from other team members’ areas of expertise. Work closely and collaboratively with other leaders in the organization. Passion about hard but meaningful challenges, in particular energy systems’ decarbonization. ', 'Recruit and manage a core team of talented, diverse and passionate software development, dev-ops and quality assurance engineers. ', 'Be responsible for Form Energy production software and software operations. ', 'Champion a positive, collaborative, blameless, open and generous culture. ', 'We are looking for a software engineering leader who will define the architecture and manage the back-end, front-end, dev-ops and quality assurance engineering to deliver scalable and elegant solutions for Form Energy three main software products catering to external and internal stakeholders: 1. Formware Fundamentals, a next generation suite of capacity expansion planning and decision support tools designed for planners envisioning deeply decarbonized grids; 2. Formware Q-Ops, a next generation real-time dispatch intelligence for advanced renewables and storage projects; and 3. Storage plant data pipelines and analytics. This role will work closely with the executive team, the data science and R&D leaders and the business development and analytics leaders to define product roadmaps and take new feature requests and prototyped models from concept to implementation in production software. A successful candidate will help foster a positive, collaborative, blameless, open and generous culture in a critical function at the heart of our company and will mentor younger team members to achieve their full professional potential. A successful candidate will contribute their knowledge and expertise and be curious and excited about learning from other team members. A successful candidate will be experienced with Python, web development, and database management and able and excited to act as an individual contributor in designing and building elements of our software solutions. [' The Senior Software Engineer is responsible for adding improved functionality to the mobile\xa0 screening application.\xa0 Execute the front-end application design and conduct maintenance for the core business products. Develop high-volume, security intensive applications based on documented business and system requirements. Write and test code for\xa0 applications utilizing various software languages, including C, C++, Java and Oracle, to address performance concerns and resolve application issues. Develop advanced software applications and solutions, using TTD approach to enhance products and resolve defects. Evaluate and understand product requirements, effectively translating them into code and build scripts, including Gradle and Ant. Serve as engineering lead for building, deploying, configuring and supporting applications for users, define plans for standardizing, scaling and enhancing products. Design Dataflow architecture and server using single-function modules with well-defined interfaces and operations. Mentor more junior engineers on software engineering techniques, processes, and new technologies. Update development tools, methodologies, and programming techniques, as available and appropriate.   ', 'Diversant   has an immediate need for\xa0 a Software Engineers that can be located anywhere.\xa0\xa0 ', '', 'progressive ', ' ', ' \xa0Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Computer Information Systems, or a related field, plus five (5) years of progressive software engineering, software development or related experience designing, developing and implementing full stack business applications utilizing Java/J2EE and Angular; working with agile/XP software development methodology; using software architecture programs (e.g. microservices, REST, SOAP Architecture); conducting research and development on new technologies; performing debugging and bug fixes; and using git version control systems.   ', 'Java/J2EE and Angular; working with agile/XP software']

Properly escalating unresolved issues to appropriate internal teams while providing clear steps to reproduce and detailed troubleshooting steps May involve handling sensitive personal data ", "You're attentive to the little details and you believe people's experience matters.", 'Properly escalating unresolved issues to appropriate internal teams while providing clear steps to reproduce and detailed troubleshooting steps', 'Asking customers targeted questions to quickly understand the root of the problem', "You're an excellent communicator who is technically curious, enjoys problem solving and translating technical concepts across various customer profiles.(Even if the problems aren't well-defined, even if the usual solutions aren't working, and even if it's the fifth person you've helped solve that problem today.)", "Empathizing with the customer's perspective and providing the best solutions that are aligned with Kustomer's core values.", 'You can be available for a 2nd shift and on-call rotation on the weekends as necessary.', 'Learn More About Kustomer:', ' You have demonstrated understanding of the following languages: JavaScript, JSON, Rest API, HTML, but this does not mean you need to be a software engineer. You have experience using developer tools, APIs and error logs to diagnose and troubleshoot client issues both with their network and software. You have excellent, written and verbal, language skills (English and Spanish). You possess 2-3+ years of experience in a similar role; experience with SaaS companies and startups a plus. You are comfortable working independently and reporting into a remote manager. You can be available for a 2nd shift and on-call rotation on the weekends as necessary. You\'re an excellent communicator who is technically curious, enjoys problem solving and translating technical concepts across various customer profiles.(Even if the problems aren\'t well-defined, even if the usual solutions aren\'t working, and even if it\'s the fifth person you\'ve helped solve that problem today.) You possess a "customer first" attitude and a strong sense of ownership and determination to get things done. You\'re attentive to the little details and you believe people\'s experience matters. You drive towards efficiency, thinking on your feet to find creative solutions to requests and directional changes. You welcome constructive criticism and customer feedback You thrive in a high pressure environment, closing out issues quickly and accurately and are comfortable dealing with customers who are already frustrated that their systems are malfunctioning. You possess strong telephone etiquette skills to ensure constructive, professional relationships with colleagues and customers, very comfortable with Zoom or Video. You demonstrate active listening and written communication follow-up skills to know how to tactfully communicate directions to clients to ensure customers get the information they need without feeling frustrated or talked down to. ', 'You possess 2-3+ years of experience in a similar role; experience with SaaS companies and startups a plus.', 'You have excellent, written and verbal, language skills (English and Spanish).', 'You have experience using developer tools, APIs and error logs to diagnose and troubleshoot client issues both with their network and software.', 'Your qualities:', 'You welcome constructive criticism and customer feedback']

job_title: Senior Frontend Engineer / Tech Lead, Machine Learning Data Infrastructure
job_text: ['', 'In This Role, You Will', 'Work closely with our engineering partner teams, Product and UX to align and plan technical and product roadmap', ' Work with a group of full stack / frontend engineers and take a leading role in designing, architecting, developing and innovating our ML data understanding web applications Work closely with our ML practitioners to understand their needs and address the pain points Work closely with our engineering partner teams, Product and UX to align and plan technical and product roadmap Balance and prioritize various technical focuses, e.g. feature requests, critical milestones, product excellence, build health Grow your leadership, domain knowledge in autonomous driving and ML workflow and get exposure to the cutting-edge technologies Be part of an exciting ride to the future, and bring the self-driving technology to the world together ', 'Visualizing the massive amount of unlabeled and labeled data to unlock new insights into Waymo’s datasets.', 'Strong technical leadership, including experience leading complex cross-functional projects.', 'Building state-of-art data analysis tools to help ML practitioners debug and improve neural models.', 'Building 3d visualizations of sensor data using WebGL.', 'Experience in ML data analysis.', ' Building state-of-art data analysis tools to help ML practitioners debug and improve neural models. Visualizing the massive amount of unlabeled and labeled data to unlock new insights into Waymo’s datasets. Designing and managing data pipelines to ingest the large scale of ML data at various stages Building 3d visualizations of sensor data using WebGL. ', 'Work closely with our ML practitioners to understand their needs and address the pain points', "It's Preferred If You Have", ' Strong technical leadership, including experience leading complex cross-functional projects. Experience in ML data analysis. Experience with handling large scale of data in Frontend and/or browser side performance optimizations using e.g. indexed db, webworker. Experience with C++. Experience with three.js, or building 3D user interfaces using other WebGL frameworks. ', 'A BS or MS in Computer Science, similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience. ', ' A BS or MS in Computer Science, similar technical field of study, or equivalent practical experience.  5+ years of experience with data visualization, analytics or frontend development. Experience building and architecting production quality web applications. Experience with modern web stack (e.g. Angular, Polymer, TypeScript). ', '5+ years of experience with data visualization, analytics or frontend development.', 'Be part of an exciting ride to the future, and bring the self-driving technology to the world together', 'Work with a group of full stack / frontend engineers and take a leading role in designing, architecting, developing and innovating our ML data understanding web applications', 'Experience building and architecting production quality web applications.', 'Balance and prioritize various technical focuses, e.g. feature requests, critical milestones, product excellence, build health', 'Experience with handling large scale of data in Frontend and/or browser side performance optimizations using e.g. indexed db, webworker.', 'Experience with three.js, or building 3D user interfaces using other WebGL frameworks.', 'Grow your leadership, domain knowledge in autonomous driving and ML workflow and get exposure to the cutting-edge technologies', 'Designing and managing data pipelines to ingest the large scale of ML data at various stages', 'Experience with C++.', 'Experience with modern web stack (e.g. Angular, Polymer, TypeScript).', "At a Minimum We'd Like You To Have", 'Some Example Projects Tackled By The Team Include']

['', 'Bonus:', 'We encourage our employees to explore their curiosity by providing them ongoing and lifelong training from their first day in AdaCore with a strong onboarding plan. As we know that juggling work and life is challenging, we offer flexibility to accommodate personal needs and work commitments.\xa0\xa0', 'You thrive in an autonomous environment, balancing long term and short responsibilities with limited oversight', '- Develop best practices based on exchanges and experiences with customer engagements to help the company grow its subscription base and reputation in the industry', 'You have 2 - 4 years experience working with C or C++ and are familiar with cross compilation toolchains', '- Evangelize the Ada and SPARK programming languages with a focus on safety-critical software development as an expert in the languages and their respective tool suites', '- Advocate for customer needs by partnering with Product Managers and Product Engineering to provide product feedback collected from field visits and technical interchanges', 'Beyond the job', 'AdaCore is seeking a talented and highly-motivated Senior Embedded Software Engineer!\xa0', 'AdaCore offers competitive compensation, benefits and thoughtful perks. We go beyond industry standards to help keep our employees comfortable and satisfied both on and off the job, no matter where they are based.', 'You have experience debugging applications on embedded targets', '- Ensure customer success by developing technical rapport with key customer stakeholders and technical leaders in conjunction with Account Managers and other sales team members', 'Previous experience in a customer-facing sales role', 'You are a U.S. citizen with a valid U.S. passport', 'You have 3 - 5 years of embedded software development experience on successfully deployed products or systems', 'Everything we do at AdaCore is centered around helping developers build safe, secure and reliable software.', 'This role at AdaCore is the front-line for technical success in the safety-critical programming language market. You will join a dynamic team of sales professionals and subject matter experts who are focused on ensuring the safety and reliability of the world’s foremost critical software. While engaging with customers, whose domains’ range from civilian and military aerospace to autonomous vehicles and finance, you will use your deep technical experience and expert knowledge of the Ada and SPARK programming language ecosystems to advocate for the usage of AdaCore’s technologies as the premier solution for the development of safety critical systems. As a primarily customer-facing role, this position requires a challenging mix of superb interpersonal skills, as well as a wide set of technical experience to ensure the success and satisfaction of AdaCore’s customers.\xa0', '- Drive product presentations and lead technical discussions in pre-sales and post-sales technical interchanges', '\ufeff', '- Provide technical support to sales and marketing teams as a subject matter expert in all of the company’s product lines and technologies', 'About this Role', 'Our 120 experts worldwide in the US (New York, Lexington), France (Paris, Toulouse, Grenoble and Vannes), the UK and Estonia all play a role in developing bleeding edge technologies to meet the highest grade of software development.', '- Contribute to strategic and community marketing activities by authoring blog posts, white-papers, technical documentation, and presenting webinars and pre-recorded videos', 'You are comfortable with domestic and international travel (~20-30%)', 'We are looking for engineers who want their work to have a direct impact on improving the reliability, safety and security of the software that modern society has grown increasingly dependent on in an international environment. Our sales and marketing team is staffed with multi-talented, tenacious and creative individuals; and our HR team is committed to ensuring your tenure with AdaCore is a positive one. Our cultural diversity is one of our strengths, enabling us to operate successfully on an international scale and we celebrate it during our social events (summer meetings, activity week-ends, Christmas dinner etc).', 'Skills:', "For over 20 years, we've worked with global leaders across avionics, aerospace and defense industries, building tools and providing services that ease the complex and difficult process of developing high-integrity software. As the need for truly secure and reliable applications expands into industries such as automotive, medical, energy, and IOT, we’re advancing our time-tested technologies to bring expertise and services to help a whole new generation of developers.", 'Knowledge of Real Time Operating Systems and Embedded Linux is a plus', 'You are familiar with industry standard tooling such as version control systems, static analysis tools, and testing tools', 'Experience with Ada is a plus', 'Responsibilities:', 'Previous experience in a customer-facing sales roleKnowledge of Real Time Operating Systems and Embedded Linux is a plusExperience with Ada is a plusContributions to open source projects is a plus', '- Leverage your deep technical background and expertise in the company’s technologies to guide customers in the adoption of new and exciting products', 'Joining AdaCore is about joining a culture of innovation, openness, collaboration and dependability, which defines how we work together, with our customers and partners.', '- Assist Account Managers to qualify pre-sales and post-sales technical inquiries and strategic opportunities', '- Partner with potential and current customers to facilitate successful evaluations of new products and services', '- Represent the company at trade-shows, technical conferences, and educational events', '- Collaborate with Account Managers and Product Engineering teams to develop custom proposals to solve complex customer challenges\xa0', 'Contributions to open source projects is a plus', 'You have 3 - 5 years of embedded software development experience on successfully deployed products or systemsYou have 2 - 4 years experience working with C or C++ and are familiar with cross compilation toolchainsYou have experience debugging applications on embedded targetsYou have experience with typical software development practices including test driven development, Q&A procedures, static analysis techniques, and continuous integration methodologiesYou are familiar with industry standard tooling such as version control systems, static analysis tools, and testing toolsYou have strong technical presentation and interpersonal skillsYou are comfortable with domestic and international travel (~20-30%)You thrive in an autonomous environment, balancing long term and short responsibilities with limited oversightYou are a U.S. citizen with a valid U.S. passport', 'You have experience with typical software development practices including test driven development, Q&A procedures, static analysis techniques, and continuous integration methodologies', 'You have strong technical presentation and interpersonal skills']

job_title: Lead Software Engineer - .NET Core/Azure - Fully Remote - 145K
job_text: ['', 'As a professional company we gladly welcome applications from persons of any age and background and do not intend to discriminate with advert text and terminology.', 'Experience using .NET Core', '6+ Years of Professional Software Engineering ExperienceExperience using .NET CoreExperience with Angular2+(they use Angular 9)2+ Years of Experience with AzureExperience with Azure ADContainerization experience is a plus', 'The successful candidate will also have strong communication skills, along with an ability to pick up new skills quickly, and a desire to learn.', 'If you feel that you have a strong mix of the above skills and experiences and wish to be considered, please apply for immediate consideration.', '6+ Years of Professional Software Engineering Experience', 'Containerization experience is a plus', 'Technical requirements:', 'Experience with Angular2+(they use Angular 9)', '2+ Years of Experience with Azure', 'Experience with Azure AD', '\xa0', 'Roc Search is currently looking for a Lead Software Engineer to join a growing FinTech company for a fully remote opportunity. This firm is a small SaaS based platform that operates as a more startup environment, but is owned by a larger firm. They are looking for a Lead level Software Engineer to act as the lead on a team of four engineers. You should have experience developing in .NET Core, Angular, and have a good understanding of Azure. You will be working on the app development team for this organization.']

["We've discovered a way to democratize, and make significantly less expensive, satellite connectivity for IoT (Internet of Things) globally. This company has raised $100.0M+ in early investment from super-star investors such as the VC firm responsible for Slack, Doordash, Cruise Automation (sold to General Motors), and Uber among many others.\xa0 ", 'REQUIRED', 'JOB', 'REQUIRED\xa0EXPERIENCE', 'REQUIRED\xa0EDUCATION', 'JOB\xa0DESCRIPTION', "The Problem: The reality is that the IoT (Internet of Things) revolution hasn’t exploded as much as initially anticipated because of connectivity limitations across traditional network/cellular. Satellite connectivity, hardware, and the placement/maintenance of hardware were either too expensive or complex, until now.The Solution: Our client has created a full end to end IoT solution, mixing three (3) companies into one, thus opening new markets that never existed before:• Telecom: The company has invented a tiny (8” x 8”) line-of-sight satellite device that costs less than $100.00.• Connectivity Subscription: The company has acquired data spectrum from multiple Satellite operators and can provide reliable, from anywhere in the world, connectivity for each connected device for $1.00 monthly.• Data Processing Platform: The platform allows customers to gain new operational insights by accessing real-time data from agriculture (farming), maritime (sea), telematics (vehicle), and disaster management. They’ve created a self-service platform (think control plane) for organizing streaming data, and designing rich analytical visualization, workflow automation, and alerting.• Team: The founding team is comprised of Founder/CTO/Stanford, Founder/CEO/MIT/Stanford, Founder/Architect/Stanford.JOB\xa0DESCRIPTIONWe're hiring a Platform Architect to help fulfill our vision of a highly efficient network that mobilizes data from large volumes of industrial devices and sensors. The engineer will join our platform engineering team to design a modern cloud-native data streaming and analytics platform, capable to support the next generation of machine & sensor data.This individual will leverage their knowledge and expertise to create a managed services API platform based on micro-services and event-driven architecture. This is a terrific opportunity for someone who is interested in stretching themselves into new domain areas with global impact across industries.JOB\xa0RESPONSIBILITIES• Architect, design and lead the implementation of our multi-tenant managed platform.• Design and implement APIs for streaming data from millions of connected sensors.• Implement a highly scalable distributed system using message queues and event-driven architecture.• Implement data persistence and analytics using time-series databases.• Identify areas of challenge and opportunity when designing a platform exclusively for machine data.• Work with network, hardware, and platform engineering teams to quickly iterate on product cycles.• Work with product management to implement customer requirements and contribute to refine the features.• Establish a disciplined development and deployment process so that software ships on time and at a very high level of quality.REQUIRED\xa0EXPERIENCE• Expert in implementing stateless RESTful and streaming APIs.• Expert in reactive programming using Java. Experience with Groovy or Kotlin is a bonus.• Expert in RDMBS, NoSQL , time-series databases, and analytics.• Experience with streaming data ingest and event processing using RabbitMQ and Kafka.• Experience with shared-nothing and micro-services architecture.• Background in multi-tenancy and data partitioning for data isolation and horizontal scaling.• Background in data science and machine learning is a bonus.• Highly collaborative, attentive to detail, with a proven track record of excellent work.• Past experience in a dynamic early-stage startup environment is highly desired.REQUIRED\xa0EDUCATION• Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field with a minimum of 10+ years of experience.", 'JOB\xa0RESPONSIBILITIES']

Senior Software Engineer - Trade and Financial Services
job_text: ['', 'What You’ll Build', 'Build the first modern logistics platform', 'You Will', 'About Flexport', 'The ability to convey technical ideas in common terms to business partners, product managers, designers and engineers alike.', 'Don’t be! We’re building the first Operating System for Global Trade. That’s why it’s incredibly important for us to bring people from diverse backgrounds and experiences together with our industry veterans to help move the freight forwarding industry forward.', ' Figure out the most efficient way for our customers and partners to participate in the process of moving freight across borders. Automate archaic filing processes and save the operations team thousands of phone calls per week. Deliver supply chain insights to logistics teams via a world-class analytics experience. ', 'Mentor and grow junior engineers.', 'Engineering Culture And Values', 'Craft the engineering vision, and own the technical landscape, for a major domain in the world of logistics that powers global trade.', 'You Should Have', ' Be part of the customs engineering team to build products to grow our customs business. Work closely with business partners, product managers and design to distill complex business problems into elegant technical solutions. Craft the engineering vision, and own the technical landscape, for a major domain in the world of logistics that powers global trade. Mentor and grow junior engineers. Build and launch products rapidly and incrementally. We ship to production dozens of times per day. ', 'What’s freight forwarding and why does it matter? Freight forwarding is the coordination and shipment of goods from one place to another and it’s what makes global trade possible. Flexport is on a mission to make global trade easier for everyone because we believe it can help connect the world and break down economic barriers.', 'Be part of the customs engineering team to build products to grow our customs business.', ' 6+ years of experience writing software, and a strong engineering background. Experience as a generalist working on both the frontend and backend to provide the best solutions for our users. A love of simple, well-tested code that is easy to extend and hard to break. The ability to convey technical ideas in common terms to business partners, product managers, designers and engineers alike. A bias for action. When you see a problem, you solve it. An aptitude for learning quickly. Optional: experience in Ruby, Rails, Node.js, React, GraphQL, PostgreSQL ', ' Don’t be! We’re building the first Operating System for Global Trade. That’s why it’s incredibly important for us to bring people from diverse backgrounds and experiences together with our industry veterans to help move the freight forwarding industry forward. What’s freight forwarding and why does it matter? Freight forwarding is the coordination and shipment of goods from one place to another and it’s what makes global trade possible. Flexport is on a mission to make global trade easier for everyone because we believe it can help connect the world and break down economic barriers. We know this industry is complex. That’s why we invest in education starting day one with Flexport Academy, a one week intensive onboarding program designed specifically to set every new Flexport employee up for success. ', 'Worried about not having any freight forwarding experience?', 'Our Stack', 'Experience as a generalist working on both the frontend and backend to provide the best solutions for our users.', 'A love of simple, well-tested code that is easy to extend and hard to break.', 'Figure out the most efficient way for our customers and partners to participate in the process of moving freight across borders.', 'Optional: experience in Ruby, Rails, Node.js, React, GraphQL, PostgreSQL', 'A bias for action. When you see a problem, you solve it.', 'Build and launch products rapidly and incrementally. We ship to production dozens of times per day.', '6+ years of experience writing software, and a strong engineering background.', 'Automate archaic filing processes and save the operations team thousands of phone calls per week.', 'Work closely with business partners, product managers and design to distill complex business problems into elegant technical solutions.', 'Deliver supply chain insights to logistics teams via a world-class analytics experience.', 'The Opportunity', 'An aptitude for learning quickly.', 'We know this industry is complex. That’s why we invest in education starting day one with Flexport Academy, a one week intensive onboarding program designed specifically to set every new Flexport employee up for success.']

['', 'About This Position:', 'Python experience is a plus.', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills.', "What You'll Bring:", 'Headquartered in Boston, Motional has operations in the US and Asia. For more information, visit www.Motional.com and follow us on Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube.', 'Collaborate with perception experts and experienced roboticists on cutting edge algorithms from design, prototyping, testing, deployment, to productization.', 'Develop clean software for the perception modules that sit at the core of autonomous driving systems and interface with all other key modules such localization, control, and planning.', 'Flexible and creative thinking.', 'C++ (i.e. C++11, C++14, C++17) development experience in a Unix/Linux environment.', 'Experience in safety-critical applications and hard real-time constraints.', 'About Us\xa0', 'Show initiative and be a valued team member in our innovative, fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment where cooperative teamwork is the norm.', 'Advanced knowledge of software engineering principles including software design, source control management, build processes, code reviews, testing methods.', 'Motional is an EOE. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. To comply with Federal Law, we participate in E-Verify. All newly-hired employees are queried through this electronic system established by the DHS and the SSA to verify their identity and employment eligibility.', 'Knowledge in perception and other related robotics fields is a plus.', "What You'll Do:", 'Strong problem-solving skills and ability to learn.', 'Experience working on a robotics system and with robotics and researchers is a plus.', 'About Us', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.', 'Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science or relevant field.Experience in multi-threaded programming, GPU programming and FGPA programming is preferred or plus5-8+ years of software development experience.C++ (i.e. C++11, C++14, C++17) development experience in a Unix/Linux environment.Advanced knowledge of software engineering principles including software design, source control management, build processes, code reviews, testing methods.Experience in safety-critical applications and hard real-time constraints.Strong problem-solving skills and ability to learn.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Flexible and creative thinking.Experience working on a robotics system and with robotics and researchers is a plus.Knowledge in perception and other related robotics fields is a plus.Python experience is a plus.', 'As a Senior Software Engineer, you will play a key role in making the vehicle of the future a reality by developing technologies that deliver a turnkey, fully autonomous driving system for our customers. Do you enjoy the challenge of working in a complex and growing system where new features are being added and evaluated rapidly? Do you enjoy mentoring and working closely with research scientists and engineers to bring groundbreaking algorithms from concept to prototype and then from prototype to a product deployed in the real world at scale? If the answers are yes, we’re looking for you.', 'Experience in multi-threaded programming, GPU programming and FGPA programming is preferred or plus', 'Senior Software Engineer, ', 'Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science or relevant field.', 'Use your top-notch software development expertise to inspire others to develop better software practices and principles.Develop clean software for the perception modules that sit at the core of autonomous driving systems and interface with all other key modules such localization, control, and planning.Collaborate with perception experts and experienced roboticists on cutting edge algorithms from design, prototyping, testing, deployment, to productization.Design and build robust and scalable codebase that enables rapid exploration and evaluation of different perception approaches and algorithms.Show initiative and be a valued team member in our innovative, fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment where cooperative teamwork is the norm.', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.\xa0', 'Use your top-notch software development expertise to inspire others to develop better software practices and principles.', '5-8+ years of software development experience.', 'Our team is commercializing a world-class driverless system. The Motional team is behind some of the industry’s largest leaps forward in the last decade, including the first fully-autonomous cross-country drive in the U.S, the launch of the world’s first robotaxi pilot, and operation of the world’s most-established public robotaxi fleet. Strategically formed by Hyundai Motor Group, one of the world’s largest vehicle manufacturers offering smart mobility solutions, and Aptiv, a global technology leader in advanced safety, electrification, and vehicle connectivity, Motional is fundamentally changing how people move through their lives.\xa0', 'Design and build robust and scalable codebase that enables rapid exploration and evaluation of different perception approaches and algorithms.']

as a software engineer', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.', 'Strong Python skills', 'Excellent development skills in modern JavaScript APIs (frontend)', 'Work in close contact with perception team to develop and implement cutting-edge metrics for a constantly evolving perception stack', 'We are seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer, Python to help develop and drive the next generation of our advanced tools to evaluate and improve our perception stack. Developing cutting edge perception software requires constant validation against collected data in order to assess regression and enable developers to target specific areas for improvement. This validation takes place in a real-time environment that replicates the conditions in the car and produces artifacts that can easily be inspected by our perception engineers.', 'Experience working with Docker and virtual machine deployment', 'About this position:', 'Motional is making driverless vehicles a safe, reliable, and accessible reality.\xa0', 'Manage the interaction with the teams in charge of the compute infrastructure and data storage', 'Experience working with Docker and virtual machine deploymentExperience managing AWS and in-house server infrastructureSolid understanding of 3D geometryAutonomous vehicle industry experience', 'Supervise and develop tools for the data acquisition pipeline that fuels our metric evaluation system', 'Our team is commercializing a world-class driverless system. Strategically formed by Hyundai Motor Group, one of the world’s largest vehicle manufacturers offering smart mobility solutions, and Aptiv, a global technology leader in advanced safety, electrification, and vehicle connectivity, Motional is fundamentally changing how people move through their lives.\xa0', 'Strong Linux background', 'Solid understanding of 3D geometry', '3+ years experience building scalable backend infrastructure using Node.js\xa0', 'Design and implement full-stack solutions for computing, storing and presenting evaluation metrics computed using the data acquired from our growing vehicle fleet']

['', 'Shipping features end-to-end, from UI to backend.', 'The desire to work at an early stage startup and have significant product ownership.', 'Actively own major features or applications and define their long-term health.', 'Give feedback and contribute to product and architectural requirements, high-level roadmap, and product strategy, while following agreed acceptance criteria in development work.', '5+ Years of professional experience as a software engineer.', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related major.5+ Years of professional experience as a software engineer.Expertise in one or more core programming languages such as Python, Java, or Ruby.Strong experience with building web or mobile applications in modern web frameworks (React, RoR, Django, etc) and tech stack.Strong experience in one or more Relational or NoSQL databases (MySql, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc).Experience with product, distributed systems, scaling applications, or DevOps is a plus.The desire to work at an early stage startup and have significant product ownership.', 'Responsibilities', 'Qualifications', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related major.', 'Our client\xa0is currently looking for Senior Software Engineers who are passionate about building amazing products and interested in joining a world-class team. You’ll be joining a small but agile team where you can help to drive both the mission and technical direction of the company. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will provide technical leadership, guidance, and mentoring on design, code, and strong engineering practices.', '\ufeff', 'Brainstorm with Product Managers, Designers, and Frontend Engineers to conceptualize and build new features for products.', 'Experience with product, distributed systems, scaling applications, or DevOps is a plus.', 'Strong experience in one or more Relational or NoSQL databases (MySql, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc).', 'Strong experience with building web or mobile applications in modern web frameworks (React, RoR, Django, etc) and tech stack.', 'Our client', "You’ll work closely with the engineering and business teams to define and design new features, improve and scale current systems, and help map out the future of the product. Ultimately, you will build high-quality and innovative software to help achieve the company's mission.", 'Actively own major features or applications and define their long-term health.Shipping features end-to-end, from UI to backend.Brainstorm with Product Managers, Designers, and Frontend Engineers to conceptualize and build new features for products.Give feedback and contribute to product and architectural requirements, high-level roadmap, and product strategy, while following agreed acceptance criteria in development work.Mentor other engineers and deeply review code.Help onboard other engineers, and contribute to tooling and processes that help make the whole team better.', 'Help onboard other engineers, and contribute to tooling and processes that help make the whole team better.', 'Expertise in one or more core programming languages such as Python, Java, or Ruby.', 'Mentor other engineers and deeply review code.']

['', '10+ years of commercial software development experience in a variety of languages and operating systems technologies (Golang, C++, Python, Java, Kernels, OS libraries, etc.). JumpCloud currently uses Go, Node.js, Python, and Vue.js.', 'Experience developing SaaS applications in AWS, GCP or Azure.', 'About JumpCloud', 'Work with and mentor tech leads and other engineers on three teams, helping them review designs, provide architectural guidance, help with key parts of implementation\xa0', 'Our Principals are hands-on, active in the code and think big about Architecture, Design and Distributed Systems Practices.\xa0 Continuous improvement is a core value at JumpCloud.\xa0 We challenge every member of our team to be 1% better everyday.\xa0', 'Principal Software Engineer, Device Management', 'Remote in the U.S. or Denver/Louisville, CO', 'Please submit your résumé and brief explanation about yourself and why you would be a good fit for JumpCloud.\xa0 Please note JumpCloud is not accepting third party resumes at this time.\xa0 ', 'Why JumpCloud? ', 'We have two offices in Colorado, one in Louisville and one in downtown Denver. Once we reopen office options you will have the opportunity to work from one of our office locations, flex your time or remain fully remote (in the U.S.).', "10+ years of commercial software development experience in a variety of languages and operating systems technologies (Golang, C++, Python, Java, Kernels, OS libraries, etc.). JumpCloud currently uses Go, Node.js, Python, and Vue.js.Deep Experience in Windows or Mac OS development, including working with native libraries and frameworks, and delving into undocumented OS APIs and internals when necessary.Strong leadership skills to help technically drive and oversee projects on multiple teams from conception to completionExperience developing SaaS applications in AWS, GCP or Azure.Experience with RESTful API design.Nice to have - Experience with biometric authentication protocols and approaches leveraging WebAuthNBachelor's Degree in Computer Science or a related field.", '\xa0', 'Why JumpCloud? \xa0', 'JumpCloud is an incredible place to share and grow your expertise! You’ll work with amazing talent across each department who are passionate about our mission. We’re out of the box thinkers, so your unique ideas and approaches for conceiving a product and/or feature will be welcome. You’ll have a voice in the organization as you work with a seasoned executive team, a supportive board and in a proven market that our customers are excited about.\xa0', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or a related field.", "With JumpCloud’s Cloud Directory Platform, we've taken Zero Trust and made it actionable - from securing the devices our employees are working from and the networks they are communicating through, to ensuring the resources they are authenticating against are being accessed by the right person with the right permissions from the right location, on the right device.", 'Own the architecture and design of our devices space, for example, Windows, Mac, and Linux features, and technologies like WebAuthn, Apple MDM and Windows MDM', 'Own the architecture and design of our devices space, for example, Windows, Mac, and Linux features, and technologies like WebAuthn, Apple MDM and Windows MDMWork with and mentor tech leads and other engineers on three teams, helping them review designs, provide architectural guidance, help with key parts of implementation\xa0Work across the entire organization, in partnership with the Architects and other Principal Engineers to make key technology decisions, address technical debt and ensure engineering consistency in both technology and processesWork with product managers to vet product ideas for viability and lead prototyping and early coding efforts of up and coming technology on the cutting edge of the devices space.', 'The Problems You’ll be Solving:', 'Deep Experience in Windows or Mac OS development, including working with native libraries and frameworks, and delving into undocumented OS APIs and internals when necessary.', 'Experience with RESTful API design.', 'Do you enjoy solving challenging problems using the latest technologies within a great team? Is knowing your work will be highly visible and mission critical a key component for the next step in your career? At JumpCloud, we’re looking for best-in-class talent to help define the future of modern identity and device management from the ground up.', 'We built a disruptive new technology called Directory-as-a-Service® and it is reinventing a two decade old monopoly, giving thousands of organizations across the globe\xa0 freedom of choice with their IT solutions. We give companies the ability to remotely manage and control all of their organization’s identities, devices, & resources on a single, comprehensive, cloud-based platform. That means doing it better, faster, easier and more securely by staying on the bleeding edge of technology.\xa0', 'If you thrive working in a fast, SaaS-based environment and you are passionate about solving challenging technical problems, we look forward to hearing from you!', 'We’re looking for an experienced Principal Software Engineer', 'We’re looking for an experienced Principal Software Engineer to provide technical leadership for our Device Management services, engaging with several engineering teams. Device Management is a key part of the entire JumpCloud product portfolio and provides the foundation for our identity and security solutions.', 'Work across the entire organization, in partnership with the Architects and other Principal Engineers to make key technology decisions, address technical debt and ensure engineering consistency in both technology and processes', 'We’re looking for…', 'Where you’ll be working\xa0', "We're an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.\xa0", 'Strong leadership skills to help technically drive and oversee projects on multiple teams from conception to completion', 'Nice to have - Experience with biometric authentication protocols and approaches leveraging WebAuthN', 'Work with product managers to vet product ideas for viability and lead prototyping and early coding efforts of up and coming technology on the cutting edge of the devices space.']

With that in mind, tell us briefly how your experiences and perspectives— whether personal, professional, academic, or otherwise— could contribute to the diversity of our team.", " Software Engineers with experience in any and all technologies. ", "Sal's TED talk", " You are currently enrolled in a Bachelor's degree program in computer science or a related field. You have an eagerness to learn, educate, write code, and build products used by millions of learners and teachers. You have strong communication, thoughtfulness, and desire to give and receive regular feedback. You have empathy for learners around the world. You love learning and are excited about helping others learn to love learning. You're motivated to learn new things and share what you learn with the world. job_title: Software Engineer - Up to $105,000 + 10% Bonus + REMOTE! [607]
job_text: ['', '● Effectively use written, verbal and visual communication to facilitate technical discussion and share ideas\xa0', '● Deliver high quality systems in technologies such as Angular, Ruby-on-Rails, some PHP', '● Experience working with databases, including relational or non-relational varieties', '● Exposure to deploying applications in AWS, in services like Lambda, SQS, DynamoDB, S3\xa0', 'What you bring to the table\xa0', "We focus on hiring values aligned people, because we believe the right person can learn all the things to be successful in their role. Self-confidence plays a big part in what you apply for. We encourage all job applicants to apply even if they are nervous to do so. College degrees aren't required for any roles, and career gaps or switches are totally welcome.\xa0", '● Exposure to functional programming theories or concepts\xa0', 'This company is looking for a Software Engineer to join the Product and Engineering team to build out frontend and backend architectures using both current and legacy stacks.The Software Engineer will collaborate with a team of awesome engineers utilizing a variety of technologies while owning their individual projects, mentor others, and build towards this company’s long-term vision. The ideal person loves learning new technologies, writing and reading challenging code, and genuinely contributing to the culture of fun, accessible cloud education.\xa0', '● Develop and support build pipelines and infrastructure and own your systems in production\xa0', 'Founded by engineers ', "Let's get lunch. ", "● 4 weeks PTO, plus 10 sick days, and holidays. Whether it's hiking to a waterfall in Costa Rica or bonding with your couch, we all need downtime. All employees get four weeks paid time off, 10 sick days, and enough holiday to make a banker blush.\xa0", 'Cutting-edge tech ', 'Hungry and humble ', '● We’ve got you covered. We offer insurance plans that pay for 100% of your medical, dental, and vision, and 80% for your family/dependents.\xa0', '● Founded by engineers Having a CEO who’s also an engineer is nice — he knows the effort it takes to make things awesome.\xa0', '● Ability to work in a highly collaborative and dynamic, cross-functional team', '● $1,000 continuing education budget. All employees get $250 a quarter to spend on personal development, and 2 hours each week reserved for learning something new.', '● Hungry and humble We’re dedicated to learning all the things to create the best product possible.\xa0', '$1,000 continuing education budget. ', '● Experience using Angular (NgRx experience a bonus) and Ruby-on-Rails; full stack experience preferred\xa0', 'We’ve got you covered. ', '4 weeks PTO, plus 10 sick days, and holidays. ', 'Parking is on us. ', 'What makes the Product & Technology team awesome...\xa0', 'As a Software Engineer, you’ll get to:\xa0', "● You're confident taking ownership of projects from start to finish and enjoy the process of turning nebulous ideas into reality.\xa0", 'Gender-neutral paid parental leave. ', '● Contribute to the ongoing support of product releases in production\xa0', '● Review pull requests and provide feedback to team members\xa0', "● Let's get lunch. Lunches are catered three times per week, and our kitchen stays stocked with a smorgasbord of the team’s most requested snacks and drinks.", 'Learning to cloud means unlocking a world of possibilities for our students. Using the latest tech, we design the tools to teach people cloud faster and better. The team is talented (and a little quirky), and we’re all in it together.\xa0', 'More than a job\xa0', '● Gender-neutral paid parental leave. Expanding your family? We offer 12 weeks of gender-neutral paid parental leave, and reimburse up to $10,000 for eligible adoption expenses.\xa0', 'This company was built by engineers for everyone, everywhere. Here, you’ll have the freedom to follow your curiosity. We’re not afraid to just try, because when you’re working with cutting edge technologies, experimentation and trying out new ideas have to be encouraged and celebrated. Our engineers are building the world’s largest (and most awesome) cloud learning platform. Why? Our mission is to teach the world to cloud. Our fun, practical courses have helped over 1.5 million people learn to cloud, and we’re just getting started.\xa0', '● 3+ years professional experience in software development\xa0', '● Experience with Node and React a plus\xa0', 'We’re not a training company that just decided to sell training courses. We grew up out of the cloud ecosystem. We were a bunch of cloud engineers who pulled people together to create a training platform. That’s why we’re genuinely passionate about what we create. And we are known for practicing what we preach.\xa0', 'of their lives. Everyone has family, friends and interests outside of their careers, so we offer perks and benefits to make work, work better for you.\xa0', '● Consistently write well tested, readable, secure and accessible code.', 'Where you work isn’t just a career decision -- it’s a life decision. We get it. That’s why we want all of our employees to feel a sense of belonging that comes from feeling supported in all areas', '● Mentor individuals, proactively coach teammates and impart knowledge willingly', 'One of our client is looking to hire a Remote "Software Engineer - Up to $105,000 + 10% Bonus + REMOTE!". Please find the job details below-', '● Work effectively with established Ruby-on-Rails and Angular architectures, following best practices defined by the team\xa0', '● Contribute to agile ceremonies, offering suggestions in daily stand-ups, retrospectives and other team meetings\xa0', '● We don’t bite We’re friendly, down-to-earth, and collaborative. There are no high-performing jerks and no heroes. Just great teams.\xa0', 'to teach the world to cloud. ', '● Parking is on us. We have your Downtown parking covered. We offer paid garage parking nearby the office. We also have perks for going green by walking and taking public transit.\xa0', '● Cutting-edge tech We’ve built a cloud-first Serverless Architecture with tools like Lambda, API Gateway, GraphQL, ReactJS,\xa0', '● Play an active role in building an awesome team culture\xa0', '● Experience pair programming and participating in code reviews\xa0', 'We don’t bite ']
