Comfortable managing 200k records with over 200 columns plus across multiple data sets', 'Job Requirements', "Become the team's technical expert for Data Quality report automation, identification, and data issue visualization.", 'Job Description', 'Prepare Data Quality Training material for data stewards, Data Quality team and general bank training.', 'Responsibilities:', '5+ years of strong working knowledge using SQL and Data Quality tools', 'Python is a plus', 'Drive improvements to maximize value of data quality (e.g. drive changes to have access to required metadata to maximize impact of data quality, quantify the cost/impact of poor data quality).', " Produce Data Quality Assessment reports through interaction with the business consumers. Drive improvements to maximize value of data quality (e.g. drive changes to have access to required metadata to maximize impact of data quality, quantify the cost/impact of poor data quality). Perform data quality activities including data quality rule creation, edit checks, identification of issues, root cause analysis, value case analysis, remediation planning and 2nd line of defense monitoring etc. Perform complex analyses to support business decisions, as well as provide feedback and recommendations to the management regarding results. Maintain and enhance Data Quality Score Dashboard. Prepare Data Quality Training material for data stewards, Data Quality team and general bank training. Coordinate Data Quality activities and data remediation activities with the Data Governance team. Work with CDO management to introduce tools and capabilities to enhance the Data Quality Program. Assist representing CDO on Internal Audit reviews for data quality audits. Provide data analytics expertise, demonstrate strength working with large data sets outside of Excel. Comfortable managing 200k records with over 200 columns plus across multiple data sets Become the team's technical expert for Data Quality report automation, identification, and data issue visualization. Provide guidance to the functional area owners, IT leads and data stewards in resolving conflicts. i.e., choosing authoritative sources, business definitions, roles and responsibilities etc.  "]

job_title: Software Engineer, Infrastructure Performance and Reliability
job_text: ['', '4. Strong background on quick debugging and troubleshooting;', 'We are looking for Linux gurus and systems experts. We require everyone on the team to be a true go-to guru for any urgent and challenging site stability problems in the backend infrastructure systems and maybe also layers above. We need someone who is extremely fluent with Linux system and very experienced and comfortable navigating through different software products and source codes, able to quickly debug and identify key problems causing site-wide issues. By understanding the whole infrastructure very well, we count on these people to come up with a better design and architectural components to constantly improve our entire system to be reliable and efficient.', '5. Design and implement performance-improving infrastructure components.', '4. Develop debugging and performance monitoring tools;', '5. Experienced with different types of programming languages;', '3. Bachelor/Master degrees in computer-related fields', '6. Experienced with different types of distributed systems.', '3. Extremely experienced with Linux;', '1. job_text: ['', 'premium on the future', '  For five straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Solid-State Arrays and in 2019, Gartner named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Primary Storage.   Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a 2019 Medallia Net Promoter Score, certified by Owen CX, in the top 1% of B2B companies.   Pure puts a premium on the future, investing 26% of revenue into R&D.  ', ' BS in Computer Science or equivalent, advanced degree preferred ', ' Proven analytical and creative problem-solving abilities. ', 'What You Bring To The Team', ' Experience managing and partnering with teams using Agile/SCRUM methodologies ', 'in the top 1% of B2B companies', ' TA-Ops@purestorage.com ', ' For five straight years, Gartner has named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Solid-State Arrays and in 2019, Gartner named Pure a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Primary Storage. ', ' Measure and seek improvements in the testing pipeline. ', ' Pure puts a premium on the future, investing 26% of revenue into R&D. ', ' Lead/participate in the design and development of infrastructure, tools & automation for our automated testing environments ', ' In depth knowledge and usage of Python. ', ' Our customer-first culture and unwavering commitment to innovation have earned us a 2019 Medallia Net Promoter Score, certified by Owen CX, in the top 1% of B2B companies. ', 'BE YOU—CORPORATE CLONES NEED NOT APPLY.', '  BS in Computer Science or equivalent, advanced degree preferred   3+ years of hands on test automation development experience with ability and desire to learn new technology   In-depth knowledge of end to end enterprise systems & products. This individual will be working alongside team members who together are revolutionizing the world of transportation.\xa0", 'Knowledge and experience with Linux drivers', 'Write production code in C++ for a variety of platforms, including GPUs and microcontrollers\xa0Develop robust, high-performance drivers and data processing pipelines for sensor subsystems, such as cameras, lidar, IMUs, etcHelp measure, define, and optimize towards target performance metrics for components across the stackDevelop framework APIs for use by other modulesWrite applications and service software components and processes; examples: logging, intra system messaging, user interfaceImplement safety critical designs that detect errors, fail safely and have the necessary redundancy to minimize risksWriting safety-critical software on real-time operating systemCollaborate cross-functionally with other R&D teams', 'Implement safety critical designs that detect errors, fail safely and have the necessary redundancy to minimize risks', 'Write applications and service software components and processes; examples: logging, intra system messaging, user interface', 'Responsibilities:', 'Knowledge and experience with RTOSes (QNX, VxWorks, etc)', 'Required:', 'Develop framework APIs for use by other modules', 'Experience writing multi-process and multi-threaded software with practical knowledge of concurrency', '5+ years of professional software development experience with strong engineering practices', 'Experience with multi-threaded or highly parallel programming frameworks: CUDA/OpenGL/Metal/NEON, etc.Research or professional experience in video encodingResearch or professional experience in computer graphics or game enginesKnowledge and experience with Linux driversKnowledge and experience with RTOSes (QNX, VxWorks, etc)Experience with ROS 2 and/or DDS', 'Writing safety-critical software on real-time operating system', 'Collaborate cross-functionally with other R&D teams', 'Research or professional experience in computer graphics or game engines']

job_title: 2021 University Graduate - Software Engineer, Adobe Document Cloud
job_text: ['', 'Best Companies lists', ' Real passion for new tools and technologies', ' Participate in story mapping, backlog grooming, daily stand-ups, retrospectives, and sprint reviews on a two-week cadence.', 'Adobe is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other characteristics protected by law.', ' Experience with full-stack Web Development', ' JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, ES6, JavaScript frameworks', ' Experience with SEO is a plus', ' Scrum', ' Deliver regular increments of potentially shippable functionality on time with high quality.', ' BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent with strong computer science fundamentals', ' Continuous improvement is the goal!', ' Write readable, performant, bug-free code.', ' Look for ways to continually improve the product and process.', ' Review each other’s work and hold team members accountable for high code quality standards.', ' Have meaningful ownership. You’ll be involved in important decisions about how we build and grow DC Web, and have a strong say in what we build next.', ' Explore new ideas. You’ll be working with the senior engineers on incubating new exciting DC Web capabilities and experiences. Have meaningful ownership. You’ll be involved in important decisions about how we build and grow DC Web, and have a strong say in what we build next. Write readable, performant, bug-free code. Look for ways to continually improve the product and process. Work effectively in a dynamic and ever-evolving environment.', ' Experience with CI/CD', 'The Role', 'What Is Needed To Succeed', ' Work effectively in a dynamic and ever-evolving environment.', ' BS degree in Computer Science or equivalent with strong computer science fundamentals Real passion for new tools and technologies Experience with full-stack Web Development JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, ES6, JavaScript frameworks Experience with SEO is a plus Experience with CI/CD Scrum', 'Team Responsibilities', ' Continuous improvement is the goal! Participate in story mapping, backlog grooming, daily stand-ups, retrospectives, and sprint reviews on a two-week cadence. Review each other’s work and hold team members accountable for high code quality standards. Deliver regular increments of potentially shippable functionality on time with high quality.', ' Explore new ideas. You’ll be working with the senior engineers on incubating new exciting DC Web capabilities and experiences.', 'Check-In']

['', 'Mobile app development, particularly with React Native.Experience in Conversion Optimization and A/B testing, Web Performance Optimization, Relay, and GraphQL.Experience in the healthcare space and startup environments.', 'Build reusable code and libraries for future use.', 'B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent experience.', '7+ years of experience working as a Frontend or Fullstack Engineer.', 'Deep understanding of core modern web concepts such as Single Page Apps and server side vs. client side rendering.', 'Experience with React.js and modern JavaScript libraries and tooling.', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Familiarity with server-side technologies, preferably Node.js.', 'Mobile app development, particularly with React Native.', 'Develop new user-facing features.', 'Deep understanding of the “behind-the-scenes” of HTML rendering, CSS, and Javascript.', 'Demonstrated design and UX sensibilities.', 'About the role', 'Qualifications:', 'We are looking for an ambitious\xa0Senior Software Engineer. As an early employee, you’ll have the chance to define and work on the foundational elements of the company and work closely with the founding team. The ideal candidate is passionate about creating a seamless customer experience and is able to drive and execute end-to-end web-based customer journeys. You will plan, architect, build, and own our main external-facing web app using React.js, JavaScript, CSS, Relay and GraphQL. ', 'Experience in Conversion Optimization and A/B testing, Web Performance Optimization, Relay, and GraphQL.', 'Experience in the healthcare space and startup environments.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Bonus points for:', 'B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent experience.7+ years of experience working as a Frontend or Fullstack Engineer.Experience with React.js and modern JavaScript libraries and tooling.Deep understanding of the “behind-the-scenes” of HTML rendering, CSS, and Javascript.Deep understanding of core modern web concepts such as Single Page Apps and server side vs. client side rendering.Familiarity with server-side technologies, preferably Node.js.Demonstrated design and UX sensibilities.', ':', 'Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.', 'Develop new user-facing features.Build reusable code and libraries for future use.Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.']

['', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with it', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across the frontend.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'About You:', 'About Us:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Strong understanding of React and patterns associated with itStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code basesShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'As part of being a frontend engineer, you will work closely with product designers and implementation teammates to work on intuitive interfaces for our users.\xa0The challenges on the frontend are beyond the basic; we are dealing with rendering thousands of points on maps, organizing data on a network graph, implementing intricate and interactive data visualizations, and more. Our frontend stack leverages React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js.\xa0', 'What We Look For:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'Our Team:', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'The Frontend Software Engineer Role:', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing\xa0people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.']

['Qualifications: ', 'Experience in performing ETL, analyzing and presenting data results to investors, and autonomous research processes. ', '\xa0', 'The successful candidate will be a key member of a small team of investment professionals where you will take full ownership of the data science work involving alternative data in your chosen sector (sector agnostic) and work in tandem with Portfolio Managers to build out full data projects that will provide actionable investment insights. The ideal candidate will be fully involved in every phase of the process including coming up with potential data ideas to explore, building out processes to capture new data, and ultimately providing recommendations/interpretations of the data to the investment teams. This individual will be responsible for integrating both alternative and fundamental data analysis into the team’s investment process. \xa0 ', '\xa0 ', 'BS/MS/PhD in a hard science such as math, statistics, computer science, economics and/or engineering ', 'Understanding and experience with fundamental and alternative data would be preferred, including unstructured data. ', 'Qualifications:', 'Work experience at another hedge fund in the area of quantitative research/analysis or data science. Fundamental investing exposure preferred. ', 'BS/MS/PhD in a hard science such as math, statistics, computer science, economics and/or engineering Work experience at another hedge fund in the area of quantitative research/analysis or data science. Fundamental investing exposure preferred. Strong knowledge of financial, mathematical and statistical theory and practice Experience in Portfolio Analytics, Risk Modeling, and Portfolio Construction a plus Understanding and experience with fundamental and alternative data would be preferred, including unstructured data. Experience in performing ETL, analyzing and presenting data results to investors, and autonomous research processes. Self-starter, entrepreneurial, and self-motivated personality', 'Role Responsibilities: ', 'Experience in Portfolio Analytics, Risk Modeling, and Portfolio Construction a plus ', 'The position requires both a strong quantitative/technical skill set in additional to an understanding/familiarity with the fundamental investment process as well (equities is preferred, but asset class experience is open). The successful candidate will also help build out the required technological infrastructure, including research frameworks and databases, to support their investment-related objectives. \xa0 ', 'Self-starter, entrepreneurial, and self-motivated personality', 'Role Responsibilities:', 'Strong knowledge of financial, mathematical and statistical theory and practice ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer (Backend), Mentoring Products, Education
job_text: ['', ' We aim to be daring, but humble: We look for bold ideas — regardless of structure and stage — and help them scale by pairing engineers with subject matter experts to build tools that accelerate the pace of social progress. We want to learn fast, but build for the long-term: We want to iterate fast and help bring new solutions to the table, but we also realize that important breakthroughs often take decades, or even centuries. Stay close to the real problems: We engage directly in the communities we serve because no one understands our society’s challenges like those who live them every day.  ', 'Support team-wide initiatives such as performance, reliability, and developer efficiency', 'We aim to be daring, but humble: We look for bold ideas — regardless of structure and stage — and help them scale by pairing engineers with subject matter experts to build tools that accelerate the pace of social progress.', 'Strong experience shipping complex cloud-based applications end-to-end with minimal guidance (5+ years)', 'Experience in frontend development or willingness to learn (JavaScript, React a plus)', 'Collaborate with a cross-functional team to develop and quickly iterate on products and features', 'Drive user impact and delight by working across the web stack, with an emphasis on server-side business logic and integrations', 'Ability and desire to mentor others in achieving engineering excellence and to be a catalyst on the team', 'Eagerness to learn and grow as a software engineer', 'Stay close to the real problems: We engage directly in the communities we serve because no one understands our society’s challenges like those who live them every day. ', ' Strong experience shipping complex cloud-based applications end-to-end with minimal guidance (5+ years) Proficiency in server-side web frameworks (Rails a plus) Experience in frontend development or willingness to learn (JavaScript, React a plus) Ability and desire to mentor others in achieving engineering excellence and to be a catalyst on the team Eagerness to learn and grow as a software engineer', ' Drive user impact and delight by working across the web stack, with an emphasis on server-side business logic and integrations Collaborate with a cross-functional team to develop and quickly iterate on products and features Support team-wide initiatives such as performance, reliability, and developer efficiency Provide technical leadership and mentoring to other engineers ', 'We want to learn fast, but build for the long-term: We want to iterate fast and help bring new solutions to the table, but we also realize that important breakthroughs often take decades, or even centuries.', 'Proficiency in server-side web frameworks (Rails a plus)', 'You will', 'Provide technical leadership and mentoring to other engineers']

['', 'Big Data Engineer Key Words: ', 'Job Title:\xa0Big Data Engineer', 'How to Apply:', 'Corp-to-Corp?', 'Frequently Asked Questions:', 'Want the opportunity to work with up to 135 MILLION records of data per DAY? In the Market Regulation Surveillance Patterns technology team, an expert in this role is vested with responsibilities arising from our client’s mission to protect the integrity of US Securities Capital markets. Our client has a portfolio of ‘surveillance patterns’ that look for manipulative and non-compliant behavior in the database of all transactions that occur in the stock market. The database itself consists of tens of billions of records per day. Engineers work with these large volumes of data using state-of-the-art and industry standard technologies, all of which are wholly operated in a cloud computing environment.', 'Please read further to get a better feel for the role and the skills that lead to success in this team. ['', 'BS EE/CS or equivalent experience', 'Data driven and have desire to work in collaborative team environments.Excellent with computer science fundamentals, notably database and distributed system theory.Passionate about learning and solving hard problems.Customer focused and know how to act as an owner.Above all else, people who get stuff done.', 'If you’re still reading this, we want to talk to you!', 'Above all else, people who get stuff done.', 'About the position:', 'Passionate about learning and solving hard problems.', '\xa0', "At Qumulo we’ve built a truly unique distributed scale-out file system from scratch. To deliver this modern data storage system we need to continue growing our engineering team. Joining Qumulo's team of elite engineers means working on an innovative product at its infancy and watching your work take effect. It's an opportunity to work directly with customers and increase the value of our product by solving their most challenging problems.", 'Working in agile development process and test driven development.', "Programmers at Qumulo work alongside people who crave collaborative coding environments. It's a community where individual engineers have a voice, and teams have the autonomy to drive their own progress.", 'Qualifications', 'Qumulo is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, disability, military status, or national origin or any other characteristic protected under federal, state, or applicable local law.', 'dividual engineers have a voice, and teams have the autonomy to drive their own progress.', 'Customer focused and know how to act as an owner.', 'A minimum of 8 years industry experience in a software engineering role', "We hire smart, adaptive engineers with diverse backgrounds and a knack for taking challenges head on. Our programmers not only solve the industry's most difficult problems, but do so in an adaptive, agile environment, shipping code every two weeks and getting feedback on their work in real-time.", 'Comfortable with coding in C/C++ or Rust and also Python.', 'Familiarity in numerous different CS areas: Distributed systems, data structure, algorithms, and database theory.Comfortable with coding in C/C++ or Rust and also Python.Working in agile development process and test driven development.A minimum of 8 years industry experience in a software engineering roleBS EE/CS or equivalent experience', 'We hire individuals who are:', 'Excellent with computer science fundamentals, notably database and distributed system theory.', 'Familiarity in numerous different CS areas: Distributed systems, data structure, algorithms, and database theory.', 'Data driven and have desire to work in collaborative team environments.']

['', 'The Systems Integration & Test (SI&T) organization integrates all aspects of system validation, test, and analysis from initial system architecture, design and development, through system validation. SI&T has overall responsibility for the system integration and test process, test facility management and capital planning, as well as off-site system and flight test conduct, analysis and test problem resolution.', 'Minimum of 6 years of experience in an engineering role conducting analysis and system integration and testing in a lab environment ', 'Experience in performing various engineering activities that include test and validation of Software Builds, systems requirements analysis, data analysis, and overall Hardware-in-the-Loop (HWIL) systems installation, integration', 'Ability to support hardware and software used as critical THAAD components in air and missile defense and situational awareness at the Lockheed-Martin Space Systems in Sunnyvale, CA.', 'The THAAD System Integration Laboratory (SIL), located in the Lockheed-Martin Space Systems facility in Sunnyvale, CA provides the primary venue for testing THAAD software in support of new software releases and key program events such as flight tests. Raytheon has directly supported the SIL for the last 16 years and is in need of an experienced system integration engineer. The SIL is a critical step in getting formal approval to field a weapon system build.', 'Experience with HWIL integration and test ', 'Experience with system V&V activities for medium to large scale systems using state-of-the-art technology', "Experience with software development in C++, Perl, Clearcase/Clearquest/TestRT Familiarity with simulated target construction Familiarity with SIL Radar support including Software Build installation, execution of Digisim, RCS mapping, and general maintenance Radar data analysis, particularly for AN/TPY-2 Experience with THAAD Weapon System analysis, performance and function Experience with HWIL integration and test Experience developing Matlab tools for data analysis Perform analysis of SIL runs and maintain the Radar Computer systems Support system issue resolution of the THAAD components Maintain the SIL infrastructure software Master's degree in Engineering, Science, Mathematics or related technical discipline ", 'Familiarity with SIL Radar support including Software Build installation, execution of Digisim, RCS mapping, and general maintenance ', "The SI&T's Systems Integration, Test and Evaluation Department (SITE) provides system engineering, integration and test expertise to the Radar and missile defense systems programs within IDS. Opportunities currently exist for Systems Engineers to support the Strategic Missile Defense (SMD) Business Area in Woburn, MA. SMD is an integrated business team at Raytheon’s IDS that focuses on Radar technology. SMD supports Missile Defense Agency programs, provides advanced missile defense technologies that enable systems to see farther and guide interceptors to their targets with even greater precision.", 'Required Education (including Major):', 'Will travel as required to support program requirements.', 'How does Silicon Valley with expenses paid for a year or 2 or 3 sound???* (see below)', 'Desired Skills: ', 'Experience with software development in C++, Perl, Clearcase/Clearquest/TestRT ', 'Familiarity with simulated target construction ', 'Support system issue resolution of the THAAD components ', "Master's degree in Engineering, Science, Mathematics or related technical discipline ", 'Experience developing Matlab tools for data analysis ', 'Perform analysis of SIL runs and maintain the Radar Computer systems ', 'Maintain the SIL infrastructure software ', '* TDOA restrictions apply for expense/perks eligibility*', 'Minimum of 6 years of experience in an engineering role conducting analysis and system integration and testing in a lab environment Experience with system V&V activities for medium to large scale systems using state-of-the-art technologyAbility to support hardware and software used as critical THAAD components in air and missile defense and situational awareness at the Lockheed-Martin Space Systems in Sunnyvale, CA.Experience in performing various engineering activities that include test and validation of Software Builds, systems requirements analysis, data analysis, and overall Hardware-in-the-Loop (HWIL) systems installation, integrationWill travel as required to support program requirements.', "Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Science, Mathematics or related technical discipline", 'This engineer will support the advanced Radar technology; including hardware and software, for strategic and tactical Radars used as critical components in air and missile defense and situational awareness. You will support various engineering activities that include test and systems validation, modeling and simulation, requirements analysis, data analysis, flight test analysis and overall systems integration. You will work with team member of the Radar Verification and Validation (V&V) effort in the development and performance of a V&V plan which compares simulation performance against the requirements established by the customer. Expect to plan and perform V&V assignments which include collaborating with others in determining method of verification, generating test plans and verification procedures, developing analysis tools in Matlab to perform the verification, and documenting results in a V&V report. You will work independently with general guidance provided by the task Lead on general objectives and details of unusual situations and /or requirements. You must be able to travel as required to support program requirement', 'Required Skills:', 'Radar data analysis, particularly for AN/TPY-2 ', 'Experience with THAAD Weapon System analysis, performance and function ']

['', 'Professional, enterprise grade, C++ software development experience', '- We offer an attractive compensation package including competitive salaries, bonuses, medical and dental coverage, flexible schedule & PTO, and tuition assistance', 'Modeling & Simulation (M&S)', 'C++ Software Engineer', 'US citizenship required', 'STILMAN Advanced Strategies', 'Docker & Kubernetes', 'Great Experience to Have', '-\xa0US Citizenship\xa0is required.\xa0This position requires the ability to obtain and maintain a security clearance after you start (we will pay for and process)', 'Professional, enterprise grade, C++ software development experienceDevelopment for Windows OSPerformance OptimizationData Structures and Algorithms', 'The Team', 'You will take part in design of new features or redesigning existing ones based on customer needs and feedback, implementation of the software changes using C++ with constant focus on performance and optimization, model military concepts in software, work closely with front end software developers on APIs, data representation and protocols, as well as work with 3rd party software developers to find user centric ways to integrate our systems.', '\xa0', 'Development for Windows OS', 'Linux', 'Benefits &\xa0Other', "Our small, distributed team has been developing and continually improving these software applications since 1999. We pride ourselves on the quality of our software and we are excited as we continue this development with US Navy, US Army, Missile Defense Agency (MDA) and other agencies to further enhance, integrate, and deploy these products. We are a small team that's distributed throughout United States and work 100% remote, with some possible travel to customer sites. The software developers are self-motivated and able to work independently, but collaborate closely with each other to take advantage of each other's strength and help where help is needed. All aspects of our work are collaborative rather than stove piped into narrowly defined roles.", '- Contact rick@stilman-strategies.com to learn more. No CTC or 3rd parties please. Thanks for considering STILMAN Advanced Strategies for your next career move!\xa0', 'Key Experience to Have', '100% work from home company for 20 years', 'GIS & Mapping', 'We are looking to bring on an additional\xa0C++\xa0Software Engineer\xa0to work on our primary back end applications that include custom Artificial Intelligence (AI) engine, military modeling and simulation framework (M&S), and integration capabilities for our own front end and for 3rd party systems. This system leverages a range of communication protocols, complex data structures and algorithms, GIS & geometric concepts, and high performance optimizations to support a growing range of use cases. You will be expanding our core AI and M&S frameworks to support new domains (from ground forces to ballistic missiles), use cases (from analysis to real-time wargaming), fidelity of modeling of real world environments and entities, and AI-enabled tactics generation. You will also be integrating our software with other M&S systems, military C2 and Intelligence systems, and supporting varied computing environments (from containers in the cloud to embedded computer in a combat vehicle).', 'Mercurial, Git, SVN', 'CI/CD, Jenkins', 'Performance Optimization', 'Modeling & Simulation (M&S)GIS & MappingGeometric algorithmsMercurial, Git, SVNCI/CD, JenkinsDocker & KubernetesLinuxMilitary concepts and tacticsJava, JavaScript, TypeScript, and other languages', 'STILMAN Advanced Strategies\xa0develops software based on Linguistic Geometry (LG), a unique Artificial Intelligence (AI) approach. Our core technology generates predictive, tactically correct Courses of Action (COAs) that dynamically adapt in response to changes in missions and actions taken by the intelligent opposition. These tools support mission planning, rehearsal, training and execution use cases for military commanders across echelons and services. Our applications have been shown to deliver unique value to the warfighter due to the quality of generated COAs, UX/UI design that makes it easy to fully comprehend complex COA results and to define mission inputs, as well as ease of deployment and integration with other system with well-defined modern APIs.', 'Military concepts and tactics', 'Data Structures and Algorithms', 'C++\xa0Software Engineer', 'Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, and other languages', 'Geometric algorithms']

job_title: Software Engineer, Native Foundation - China Core
job_text: ['', 'Onsite fitness center and fitness program credit', 'Roblox is ushering in the next generation of entertainment, allowing people to imagine, create, and play together in immersive, user-generated worlds. We’re the one and only fastest-growing entertainment platform that lets anyone teach themselves how to code, publish, and monetize any experience imaginable—across any device—reaching millions of players across the globe.\xa0', 'The China Core team is looking for founding engineers to bring on the next big thing.\xa0This is a unique opportunity to make contributions across our technology stack. We collaborate closely with Luobu, our China Joint Venture company, and other Roblox engineering teams to deliver an amazing user experience that brings the world together through play.', '5+ years of experience working on consumer applications', 'Write and maintain unit and integration test', 'Excellent medical, dental, and vision coverage', 'Work with the most passionate, team-oriented, visionary, and crazy-smart people you’ll ever meet.', 'Excellent medical, dental, and vision coverageA rewarding 401k programFlexible vacation policyFree catered lunches five times a week and several fully stocked kitchens with unlimited snacksOnsite fitness center and fitness program creditAnnual CalTrain Go PassA Roblox Admin badge for your avatar', 'A Roblox Admin badge for your avatar', 'Ability to collaborate with various teams, be a self starter and be adaptable', '#LI-EV2', 'Optimize code to make our applications run lightning fast on any device', 'The impact that you can have at Roblox is powerful. We’re looking for someone who’s eager to take on a meaningful role in the success of Roblox on a massive scale. Someone who takes play seriously, but also isn’t afraid to have some fun either. Someone who’s ready to take Roblox—and their career—to the next level.', 'Built cross-platform application with C++Familiarity with scripting languages like Lua', 'Flexible vacation policy', 'Build performant cross-platform features to support our application', 'Knowledge of multithreaded and asynchronous programming', 'Free catered lunches five times a week and several fully stocked kitchens with unlimited snacks', 'Build performant cross-platform features to support our applicationWork across the various platforms we supportOptimize code to make our applications run lightning fast on any deviceWrite and maintain unit and integration testSelf-organize and take ownership of projects throughout its full lifecycleCollaborate with numerous internal teams to build the world’s best applications', 'WHY ROBLOX?', 'You Will:', 'Annual CalTrain Go Pass', "You'll Have:", 'Collaborate with numerous internal teams to build the world’s best applications', 'Self-organize and take ownership of projects throughout its full lifecycle', 'Experience with at least one of the following; iOS, Android, win32, MacOS, Xbox', 'A rewarding 401k program', '\ufeffAbout the team ', '5+ years of experience working on consumer applicationsExperience with at least one of the following; iOS, Android, win32, MacOS, XboxSome experience with C++Knowledge of multithreaded and asynchronous programmingAbility to collaborate with various teams, be a self starter and be adaptable', 'Familiarity with scripting languages like Lua', 'Roblox - Powering Imagination', 'Work across the various platforms we support', 'You Might Have:', "You'll Love:", 'In 2018, we were honored to be recognized as a Certified\xa0Great Place to Work®. We’ve fostered a company culture that empowers people to do the most defining work of their career in an environment that’s made up of the most passionate, team-oriented, visionary, crazy-smart people you’ll ever meet. Join the Roblox team where play rules and the possibilities are endless.', 'Built cross-platform application with C++', 'Some experience with C++']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Gameplay
job_text: ['', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', ' Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ', '===', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Responsibilities', 'Required Qualifications', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', '.', "It’s our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles’ Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Our Perks', 'Experience with elo rating or similar ranking and match-making systems']

', ' Review and analyze existing applications effectiveness and efficiency, and then develop strategies for improving or leveraging these platforms. ', ' Collaborate with analysts, designers, and system owners in the testing of Financial SaaS software programs and applications. ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent combination of education and recent, relevant work experience ', ' Ensure that Financial SaaS software meets vetted, prioritized business requirements and goals, fulfills user requirements, and identifies and resolves systems issues.  Review and analyze existing applications effectiveness and efficiency, and then develop strategies for improving or leveraging these platforms.  Define effective solution delivery and operational support processes, structures, roles, and responsibilities to successful execution, delivery and support of Financial SaaS solutions.  Understand all aspects of SaaS configuration and technical/functional capabilities, including changes and potential system implications.  Collaborate with GTS Enterprise Architecture team to ensure solution approach supports both the individual business units and the enterprise as a whole.  Cultivate and disseminate knowledge of application-usage best practices. ', ' Strong technical acumen and familiarity with broad range of technology disciplines and processes ', ' Strong technical acumen and familiarity with broad range of technology disciplines and processes  Strong problem solving and analysis skills  Self-motivated and managed, exceptional follow-through  Excellent software troubleshooting experience.  Excellent oral and written communication, training, presentation, and organizational skills  Ability to work in a team-oriented, collaborative environment  Excels in a fast-paced environment with the ability to prioritize and simultaneously work on multiple projects and priorities  Proven analytical and creative problem-solving abilities.  Strong ability to cultivate good working relationships across departments and at all levels  Ability to work and deliver under tight deadlines  5+ years of Agile SW and/or waterfall development experience.  5+ years of experience with technical implementation, day-to-day operations, and long-term maintenance of enterprise technology solutions  Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent combination of education and recent, relevant work experience  Financial systems experience a plus  Experience with vendor managed services and SaaS providers a plus  Knowledge of applicable financial audit and data privacy practices a plus  Experience with JIRA and Confluence a plus ', "Do you dare to reinvent the future of education? At Cengage, we're harnessing the power of tech to build a future where all learners have the tools and confidence to achieve their goals. As a Cengage employee, you'll be helping to transform the way people learn. Collaborating with the best of the best, you'll feel challenged and inspired to do breakthrough work. Together, there's no limit to what we can imagine, create and innovate! Are we right for you? We set the bar higher by bringing our unique talents and points of view to the table every day. We're curious and comfortable with change and are willing to take risks to transform education for the better. Most importantly, we put learning first with everything we do. We also offer a fun, challenging, and rewarding environment with the opportunity to work with some of the most talented people in our industry.What You'll Do HereThe Engineer, Financial SaaS Platforms will be responsible for providing technical leadership in ensuring the maintenance and evolution of Cengage's SaaS platform capabilities supporting Cengage’s Royalties, Revenue Recognition, Tax and Credit financial processes. Specifically, this individual will have responsibility for enabling the capabilities of the Cengage SaaS partners supporting these processes. The key objective is to align action in support of our Global Technology Services strategy and architecture to ensure the stability, integrity, and efficient operation of our SaaS platforms, along with integrations for critical platforms and applications that support the core financial functions. The Engineer engages with the vendors covering day-to-day operations, and monitors performance vs. commitments, deliverables along with overall platform performance, ensuring sound problem determination and root-cause analysis for continuous improvement. Additionally, he or she takes appropriate action to correct failed activities, functions, and processes. Finally, this individual collaborates with other Cengage platform engineers to coordinate deliverables, testing and releases to ensure the overall quality and reliability of the required functions. This individual will demonstrate strong communication and problem-solving skills to ensure effective “fit for purpose” solutions, and the application of active influencing skills to effectively collaborate with dependent teams.Essential Duties & ResponsibilitiesPlan, Define and Design Ensure that Financial SaaS software meets vetted, prioritized business requirements and goals, fulfills user requirements, and identifies and resolves systems issues.  Review and analyze existing applications effectiveness and efficiency, and then develop strategies for improving or leveraging these platforms.  Define effective solution delivery and operational support processes, structures, roles, and responsibilities to successful execution, delivery and support of Financial SaaS solutions.  Understand all aspects of SaaS configuration and technical/functional capabilities, including changes and potential system implications.  Collaborate with GTS Enterprise Architecture team to ensure solution approach supports both the individual business units and the enterprise as a whole.  Cultivate and disseminate knowledge of application-usage best practices. Maintain Operational Excellence Ensure that any Financial SaaS integration into company systems meets functional requirements, system compliance, and interface specifications.  Collaborate with analysts, designers, and system owners in the testing of Financial SaaS software programs and applications.  Liaise with Financial SaaS suppliers for prompt rectification of any problems or incidents.  Perform daily monitoring and troubleshooting of the Financial SaaS platforms; support the installation and configuration of patches and upgrades as required.  Create and maintain documentation as it relates to system configuration, mapping, processes, and service records.  Monitor and test system performance; prepare and deliver system performance statistics and reports. Collaborate and Communicate Maintain high-level familiarity with other IT system/business application capabilities in order to make recommendations about potential upstream/downstream integration or functionality.  Work closely with GTS Technology Solutions Partners to plan delivery of priorities.  Provide regular status updates to management and project stakeholders. Skills You Will Need Here Strong technical acumen and familiarity with broad range of technology disciplines and processes  Strong problem solving and analysis skills  Self-motivated and managed, exceptional follow-through  Excellent software troubleshooting experience.  Excellent oral and written communication, training, presentation, and organizational skills  Ability to work in a team-oriented, collaborative environment  Excels in a fast-paced environment with the ability to prioritize and simultaneously work on multiple projects and priorities  Proven analytical and creative problem-solving abilities.  Strong ability to cultivate good working relationships across departments and at all levels  Ability to work and deliver under tight deadlines  5+ years of Agile SW and/or waterfall development experience.  5+ years of experience with technical implementation, day-to-day operations, and long-term maintenance of enterprise technology solutions  Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent combination of education and recent, relevant work experience  Financial systems experience a plus  Experience with vendor managed services and SaaS providers a plus  Knowledge of applicable financial audit and data privacy practices a plus  Experience with JIRA and Confluence a plus INDEED-TECHOptionsApply for this job online ApplyShareEmail this job to a friend ReferSorry the Share function is not working properly at this moment. Or for any other reason. You may view Cengage’s EEO/Affirmative Action Policy signed by CEO Michael Hansen and Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law notice by clicking on their corresponding links. If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability, you may contact us at accommodations.ta@cengage.com or you may call us at +1 (617) 289-7917.About Cengage Cengage is the education and technology company built for learners. The company serves the higher education, K-12, professional, library and workforce training markets worldwide. Cengage creates learning experiences that build confidence and momentum toward the future students want. The company is headquartered in Boston, MA. ['', 'A proven career developing Web based, Distributed and Multi-Tier architecture using Java/J2EE or other major platforms (.Net, Python, Scala, Clojure, etc.)\xa0', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills, translating complex technical requirements into easy to follow direction and documentation\xa0', 'Vivid Seats is the largest independent online ticket marketplace, sending tens of millions of fans to live events. Experiences Matter\xa0- which is why we continue to grow year over year. Working at Vivid Seats puts you\xa0front\xa0and center at the opportunity to scale our best in class platform that allows\xa0our fans to sit closer and experience more.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Our Engineering department is made up of cross functional Agile development teams that deploy to AWS production environments on demand, multiple times a day. You’ll tackle some of the most difficult challenges scaling an e-commerce marketplace by developing creative algorithms and features that maximize value and efficiency across the organization.\xa0', 'What We Offer:', 'At Vivid Seats, you will have the opportunity to work with the flexibility and speed of a startup; while operating at massive, profitable scale. We keep our teams lean, allowing\xa0each\xa0employee direct accountability\xa0of\xa0creating a positive ticket buying experience. We are relentless and move quickly to release new features and content to our applications. Good ideas are heard and implemented, and hard work rewarded. Being a part of our team means having the ability to drive impact and own the innovation that connects our tens of millions of unique monthly users to the memorable experiences that only live events create.\xa0', 'Chicago,\xa0Toronto, or Remote\xa0\xa0', 'Software Engineer II', 'Ability to translate complex technical concepts into high-level designs and act as a subject\xa0matter expert in software design, architecture, implementation, deployment and support across our full platform.\xa0', 'Proficient in SQL and relational database modeling\xa0', 'You’ll partner with a team of Product Owners, Quality Engineers, and Engineers to deliver exceptional software, showcasing your work at the end each work cycle. Our teams will lean on your expertise for best practices in design patterns, code quality, testing, and innovation to keep our commitment of always putting our customers first.\xa0', 'As a subject\xa0matter expert on your team, you will help set the direction of the design and development of the backend systems powering our B2C Marketplace. You’ll develop innovative solutions that give Vivid Seats a competitive advantage, mentor engineers, encourage team members, and champion technology improvements for your delivery team.\xa0\xa0', 'As\xa0a\xa0Software Engineer II\xa0on our B2C Marketplace Team you’ll make highly visible enhancements to the backend systems powering our Web app, iOS App, and Android App by maintaining and building new features across our Java applications. Our B2C Marketplace Team works with a variety of applications that enable customers to buy and sell tickets on our marketplace.\xa0', 'Location:', 'To be successful, you’ll need:', 'We are passionate about creating memorable experiences for our fans and the best in class experience for our employees. Vivid Seats offers competitive compensation levels, individual and team-based bonus opportunities, 401K matching, a generous benefits package and Flex PTO policy plus a variety of workplace perks.', 'A desire and proven ability to work with cross functional teams to deliver results\xa0', 'A proven career developing Web based, Distributed and Multi-Tier architecture using Java/J2EE or other major platforms (.Net, Python, Scala, Clojure, etc.)\xa0Experience designing, building, and testing web services and APIs.\xa0Strong knowledge of Spring, REST, Service Oriented Architecture, OAuth, Basic Authentication and PCI.\xa0Ability to translate complex technical concepts into high-level designs and act as a subject\xa0matter expert in software design, architecture, implementation, deployment and support across our full platform.\xa0Proficient in SQL and relational database modeling\xa0Familiarity with modern front-end technologies such as JavaScript and Single Page Application Frameworks and their interactions with APIs.\xa0A desire and proven ability to work with cross functional teams to deliver results\xa0Excellent written and verbal communication skills, translating complex technical requirements into easy to follow direction and documentation\xa0', 'Experience designing, building, and testing web services and APIs.\xa0', 'Familiarity with modern front-end technologies such as JavaScript and Single Page Application Frameworks and their interactions with APIs.\xa0', 'The Opportunity:', '\xa0To be successful, you’ll need:\xa0', 'Strong knowledge of Spring, REST, Service Oriented Architecture, OAuth, Basic Authentication and PCI.\xa0']

['', 'At 2U, we are committed to creating and sustaining a culture that embodies diverse walks of life, ideas, genders, ages, races, cultures, sexual orientations, abilities and other unique qualities of our employees. We strive to offer a workplace where every employee feels empowered by the ways in which we are different, as well as the ways in which we are the same.\xa0', 'time off to volunteer for non-profit organizations', 'Things That Should Be In Your Background:', 'Provide technical guidance and feedback to other team-members', 'Write maintainable, performant codeRefactor legacy code to improve maintainabilityConduct exploratory and automated testingEfficiently debug complex problemsLead technical design of applications and participate in larger system design effortsProvide technical guidance and feedback to other team-membersPlan and estimate development tasks and short-term projectsRelate your project deliverables to the products you are building and the strategy behind themAdvocate for end user needs in software you are buildingCollaborate with product team (product managers, business analysts) to define and refine requirementsParticipate in application and system level technical design\xa0Conduct technical interviewsPractice metrics driven software development', 'Efficiently debug complex problems', 'At 2U, we power world-class online education and in-person boot camps. Going beyond traditional learning management systems, we use tech, people, and data to help top universities transform in the digital era—and eliminate the back row in higher ed. We support lifelong learning which means thinking beyond a single degree. It means finding ways for students to gain the skills they need to change careers, evolve their expertise, and meet the challenges of the changing world head-on. We help universities fill those needs—developing new digital education technologies and offerings capable of supporting students at different points in their lives. Whether they need a simple refresher, to learn something new, or to change their career trajectories completely, our university partners are there to help them succeed.Together with our partners, 2U has positively transformed the lives of more than 150,000 students and lifelong learners. 2U, Inc. has acquired and integrated two companies, broadening our portfolio of education offerings into short courses with GetSmarter and boot camps with Trilogy. This role supports our\xa02U\xa0line of business.', 'Advocate for end user needs in software you are building', 'holidays that include a winter break from Christmas through New Years!', 'Above all, you care about delivering quality software in a sustainable and timely manner and about software craftsmanship.\xa0', 'Docker and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes or Mesos', 'Databases and key value stores like MySQL or Redis', 'Note: The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work performed by individuals assigned to this position, and are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills required. All employees may be required to perform duties outside of their normal responsibilities from time to time, as needed.', '2U offers a comprehensive benefits package:', 'Queuing systems like AWS SQS, Celery or RabbitMQ', 'Being interested in mentoring more junior members and willing to advocate for better/smarter processes, system designs, architecture for the team and our services.\xa0', 'What We’re Looking For:', 'Able to provide succinct updates on work progress and raise blockers early.', 'To learn more, visit 2U.com. #NoBackRow', 'Conduct exploratory and automated testing', 'Amazon Web Services (AWS)', 'Engineering at 2U is dynamic, innovative and full of people passionate about delivering on the promise of higher education via technology. We are seeking collaborative and results-driven individuals to join us and in return, we can offer you a fun learning environment where your skills, experience and creativity will make a material impact on the company’s success and its overall mission.', 'Working at 2U means working with individuals that are passionate and mission driven. We collaborate on tough problems to deliver the best outcomes for our partners, students, and each other. You will find team members working together in our open office spaces, gathered in the kitchen grabbing a snack, or taking a break in our game rooms.', "Sitting within the Customer Ops portfolio, the Core Systems team builds and maintains systems that enable 2U staff to effectively support our students, faculty and prospective student applicants. Many of the team's direct customers are product managers and engineers at 2U.", 'Relate your project deliverables to the products you are building and the strategy behind them', 'Additional time off benefits include:', 'parental leave after 9 months of employment', '2U Diversity and Inclusion Statement', 'Web frameworks like Tornado (Python), Phoenix (Elixir), or Absinthe (Elixir)', 'Lead technical design of applications and participate in larger system design efforts', 'Unlimited snacks and drinks', 'Medical, dental, and vision coverageLife insurance, disability and 401(k)Unlimited snacks and drinksTuition reimbursement programGenerous paid leave policies including unlimited PTO\xa0Additional time off benefits include:time off to volunteer for non-profit organizationsparental leave after 9 months of employmentholidays that include a winter break from Christmas through New Years!', 'Strong communication', 'Python and/or Elixir', 'Tuition reimbursement program', 'Write maintainable, performant code', 'Practice metrics driven software development', 'We are looking for a senior software engineer with experience building and maintaining scalable backend systems. You will participate in the discovery, design and engineering of multiple cross-functional projects, and help troubleshoot complex business and production issues as they arise. You will uphold industry best practices and will help encourage our team to continuously improve. You will demonstrate leadership by advocating for improvements to our systems and processes, and by providing mentorship to our more junior engineers.\xa0You will become an expert of the Enrollment Ecosystem, critical for the 2U operation. This will include the data exchanges with the universities, security, registration and provisioning processes, and cross-portfolio operation.', 'Collaborate with product team (product managers, business analysts) to define and refine requirements', 'Detail oriented', 'Monitoring and alerting tools like Grafana, Sensu, Prometheus or Datadog', 'Conduct technical interviews', 'Detail orientedAble to quickly understand business requirements and recognize when they are incomplete or ambiguous.Strong communicationAble to provide succinct updates on work progress and raise blockers early.LeadershipBeing interested in mentoring more junior members and willing to advocate for better/smarter processes, system designs, architecture for the team and our services.\xa0', 'Medical, dental, and vision coverage', 'We strive for our teams to be cross-functional, self-organizing and autonomous. You’ll be working directly with product managers and business analysts in a highly collaborative manner.\xa0', 'Participate in application and system level technical design\xa0', 'Able to quickly understand business requirements and recognize when they are incomplete or ambiguous.', 'Other Attributes That Will Help You In This Role:', 'Distributed streaming platforms like Kafka, AWS SNS or AWS Kinesis', 'Refactor legacy code to improve maintainability', 'Life insurance, disability and 401(k)', 'About 2U Inc. (NASDAQ: TWOU)', 'Leadership', 'Amazon Web Services (AWS)Python and/or ElixirWeb frameworks like Tornado (Python), Phoenix (Elixir), or Absinthe (Elixir)Databases and key value stores like MySQL or RedisQueuing systems like AWS SQS, Celery or RabbitMQDistributed streaming platforms like Kafka, AWS SNS or AWS KinesisDocker and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes or MesosMonitoring and alerting tools like Grafana, Sensu, Prometheus or Datadog', '2U is an equal opportunity employer that does not discriminate against applicants or employees and ensures equal employment opportunity for all persons regardless of their race, creed, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, pregnancy, national origin, age, marital status, disability, citizenship, military or veterans’ status, or any other classifications protected by applicable federal, state or local laws. 2U’s equal opportunity policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including but not limited to recruiting, hiring, training, promotion, job benefits, pay and dismissal.', 'Generous paid leave policies including unlimited PTO\xa0', 'Plan and estimate development tasks and short-term projects', 'Responsibilities Include, But Are Not Limited To:', 'Benefits & Culture']

['', '- Experience with Tactical Radios like SINCGARS, ASIP, TSM, HF; Bridging devices like Ultralink and Taclink; BFT2 control and data stack, and BFT2 transceivers and simulators; NCW, FDMA radios/modems; Tactical systems like AFATDS, MFoCS/JBC-P; ATAK/MTAK architectures; MILSTD-2045-47001C.', 'This is an enviroment that is developing networking software for more efficient and reliable network communications in disconnected, intermittent wireless environments.', 'Will be working in diverse areas related to wireless systems architectures and protocols.', '- 5+ years of experience in designing, implementing, and integrating complex software systems.', '-\xa0Tun/Tap implementations (Android, Linux, Windows)', '- Knowledge of networking technologies such as SD-WAN Cisco/Juniper architectures and implementations, WAN Multi-Topology Routing, Cisco/Juniper configuration via CLI and SNMP, Commercial Solutions for Classified (CSfC).\xa0', 'Desired:', '- Strong software and systems skills and experience in prototype development:', '\xa0\xa0', 'This is a flexible role in which you can go in to the office for meetings and work a majority of the time from home (so not a pure telecommute posiition). Should be commutable to the office.', '- B.S./M.S. in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.', '\xa0-Java (native and Android SDK)', '-\xa0Linux programming (netlink, netfilter, sockets, iptables, iprule, iproutes)', 'The Robinson Group is staffing a newly created position for a Network Tester/Support Specialist', 'This is a year long contract that will likely be extended.', 'Must be able to pass a Federal Background Check and be eligible for a Security Clearance that would be provided.', 'Required:', '-\xa0C/C++ (native and Android NDK)', '-\xa0Windows programming (pipes, WinDivert library)', '.', '- Knowledge of computer networking with emphasis on wireless mobile networks, wireless systems engineering, and Internet technologies (TCP/IP protocol stack; unicast, multicast, and overlay routing protocols).\xa0\xa0']

['', 'We are a highly motivated group of engineers and data scientists, working in an agile group to solve sophisticated and high impact problems. We serve billions of ad requests every month with our high-performance ad servers. We build smart data systems that ingest, model and analyze massive flow of data from online and offline user activity. We use cutting edge machine learning, data mining and optimization algorithms to analyze data. Above all, we are passionate about delivering experiences that our customers and advertisers love. ', 'Advanced knowledge of performance, scalability, and system architecture with an eye toward avoiding and reducing technical debt.', 'Work with the data scientists and product managers to carry out various experiments across different areas of the AdTech platforms to improve customer experience and ad relevance.', 'Develop highly scalable services to process millions of requests per day and solve complex software systems problems by leveraging state-of-the-art technology.', 'What you will do: ', "Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience", 'What you will have : ', 'Hands-on experience developing in a service-oriented architecture for a Linux environment', 'We’re virtual\xa0', '\xa0', 'Previous experience in the advertising domainAdvanced knowledge of performance, scalability, and system architecture with an eye toward avoiding and reducing technical debt.Strong inclination towards exploring and learning new technologies.Understanding of machine learningHands-on experience developing in a service-oriented architecture for a Linux environment', 'Strong background in algorithms and data structures', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code,\xa0but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations.\xa0Being\xa0human-led\xa0is our true disruption.\xa0', 'Drive projects of high visibility across the organization.\xa0', 'Strong inclination towards exploring and learning new technologies.', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'Being\xa0human-led\xa0is our true disruption.', 'Walmart’s Advertising Technology group enables the connection between supplier brands and retail shoppers at an unprecedented scale. As primary stewards of our brand promise, “Save Money. Live Better,” we work alongside some of the most talented people in the world to engage with the more than 150M households who shop with us. This position is part of the Sponsored Products team in the Advertising Technology organization. Walmart is investing in building a world-class advertising platform and the Sponsored Products team is responsible for building performance advertising products that drive discovery, sales, and profit. The team operates an end to end advertising platform that includes the ad server that serves hundreds of millions of impressions each day, sophisticated ad matching algorithms, real-time measurement, self-service buying interface for end to end campaign management. ', 'Develop highly scalable services to process millions of requests per day and solve complex software systems problems by leveraging state-of-the-art technology.Gain exposure to various technologies used in Advertising and E-commerce platforms.Work with the data scientists and product managers to carry out various experiments across different areas of the AdTech platforms to improve customer experience and ad relevance.Drive projects of high visibility across the organization.\xa0', 'Understanding of machine learning', 'Gain exposure to various technologies used in Advertising and E-commerce platforms.', 'Plus if you have: ', "7+ years’ experience in internet-scale distributed technologies (e.g. Solr, Kafka, Mem Cache, and similar technologies ) and/or Big Data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Storm and similar technologies)Relevant experience with relational / non-relational databases (e.g. MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, etc)Strong background in algorithms and data structuresExpertise in one or more programming languages (e.g. Java, Scala, etc).Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience", 'Relevant experience with relational / non-relational databases (e.g. MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, etc)', ' ', '7+ years’ experience in internet-scale distributed technologies (e.g. Solr, Kafka, Mem Cache, and similar technologies ) and/or Big Data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Storm and similar technologies)', 'Previous experience in the advertising domain', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Expertise in one or more programming languages (e.g. Java, Scala, etc).']
