['', ' Experience with distributed storage systems, S3 equivalent or S3-like', ' Experience working in a fast paced environment with tight deadlines while delivering high quality solutions to clients', ' Create innovative solutions to complex system interactions Take full ownership of products and technical solutions Work on multiple initiatives in a fast-paced environment Design, develop, and release high-quality maintainable code Collaborate directly with our product counterparts to capture requirements and iterate on projects Ensure SDLC operating standards such as Continuous Integration & Deployment, Unit/Integration Tests are followed and help the team by bringing in new ideas to improve the SDLC process Be a "big picture" thinker', ' Experience developing and integrating micro-services', ' Practical experience with designing and building systems using object oriented methodologies', ' Create innovative solutions to complex system interactions', ' Work on multiple initiatives in a fast-paced environment', ' Strong understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms, Multi-threading and Design Patterns', ' Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL Databases', ' 3+ years of hands of polyglot programming experience (C++ and Python preferred)', ' Take full ownership of products and technical solutions', ' Be a "big picture" thinker', 'As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to design and develop components within our distributed system, with an eye towards scalability and reliability.  Your work will encompass all phases of Software Development (using Agile methodologies) and will work closely with Product, Global Data and other Engineering teams in the process.   You will help support our existing C++ components while helping us migrate our system to modern technologies including an event-driven asynchronous architecture with Python based micro-services and S3 storage.  ', ' Experience developing and integrating micro-services Experience with distributed storage systems, S3 equivalent or S3-like Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL Databases', ' Practical experience with designing distributed systems that are resistant to outages and failures', 'Data makes the financial world go around.  Much of that data comes from documents released by corporations and other entities with financial interests.  The data in these documents drives numerous client facing terminal functions.  The Company Filings team is responsible for the processing of the documents, from ingestion to storage, from indexing to serving up from other consumers.  We also make it our goal to make these documents discoverable by indexed fields and heuristic analysis.  We take it as our challenge to provide added value to these documents.', ' Collaborate directly with our product counterparts to capture requirements and iterate on projects', ' 3+ years of hands of polyglot programming experience (C++ and Python preferred) Strong understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms, Multi-threading and Design Patterns Practical experience with designing and building systems using object oriented methodologies Practical experience with designing distributed systems that are resistant to outages and failures Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Experience working in a fast paced environment with tight deadlines while delivering high quality solutions to clients', ' Ensure SDLC operating standards such as Continuous Integration & Deployment, Unit/Integration Tests are followed and help the team by bringing in new ideas to improve the SDLC process', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' Excellent communication and interpersonal skills', ' Design, develop, and release high-quality maintainable code']

job_title: Lead Test Automation Engineer (NYC or Remote)
job_text: ['', 'Plan for the future: 401k with up to 4% match', 'Continued Learning: $1,000 yearly continuing education stipend', 'Help us make a great product better.', 'Thorough familiarity with front-end and back-end testing practices (we use React/JavaScript and microservices built in Python and Go)', 'An experienced engineer who is passionate about automated testing and who has learned through several years of experience in the field', 'A desire to constantly improve your skills and the software system', 'Define and set our expectations around good and bad software tests', 'Amazing culture that emphasizes Hard Work, High Standards, Hunger, Helpfulness, and Humility. Learn more here', 'Proven ability to guide and influence the testing practices of an organization', 'Lead the engineering testing practice to', 'What’s CB Insights All About', 'An analytical and detail-oriented mindset with strong communication skills', 'All of the work for this position will be performed in the U.S. As such, in compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.', 'Your Main Tasks', 'Equal', 'Guide and evangelize our overall software testing process', ' Guide and evangelize our overall software testing process Coordinate the implementation of our testing infrastructure across various languages and software disciplines Define and set our expectations around good and bad software tests ', 'Strong programming skills obtained through any means (self-thought, code academy, university degree or any other way)', 'Experience with, and a desire to, follow an Agile and Lean approach to software development (we follow a variant of Scrum and use Jira)', 'Rest and Relax: Competitive vacation and holiday plans ', 'We know that diversity makes for the best problem-solving and creative thinking. We are dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team and encourage everyone to apply if your experience is close to what we are looking for. ', 'Comfortable working with engineers that are remote as well as from the local office', 'What You Bring To The Table', 'Provide technical guidance to our Test Engineers on the various software teams', 'Refuel: In office daily lunch stipend, unlimited snacks/coffee', 'Be Healthy: Health with HSA and FSA options, dental, and vision insurance along with unlimited/take what you need sick day policy', 'Employer:', ' An experienced engineer who is passionate about automated testing and who has learned through several years of experience in the field Strong programming skills obtained through any means (self-thought, code academy, university degree or any other way) Thorough familiarity with front-end and back-end testing practices (we use React/JavaScript and microservices built in Python and Go) Proven ability to guide and influence the testing practices of an organization A desire to constantly improve your skills and the software system An analytical and detail-oriented mindset with strong communication skills Comfortable working with engineers that are remote as well as from the local office Experience with, and a desire to, follow an Agile and Lean approach to software development (we follow a variant of Scrum and use Jira) ', ' Lead the engineering testing practice to', 'Work with test engineers and product managers to create detailed testing plans for projects', 'The Perks', 'A newsletter that 650k+ people follow: Sign up here.', ' Amazing culture that emphasizes Hard Work, High Standards, Hunger, Helpfulness, and Humility. Learn more here A newsletter that 650k+ people follow: Sign up here. Be Healthy: Health with HSA and FSA options, dental, and vision insurance along with unlimited/take what you need sick day policy Plan for the future: 401k with up to 4% match Continued Learning: $1,000 yearly continuing education stipend Rest and Relax: Competitive vacation and holiday plans  Refuel: In office daily lunch stipend, unlimited snacks/coffee ', 'Coordinate the implementation of our testing infrastructure across various languages and software disciplines', 'Opportunity']

We want to be surrounded by people who are always finding opportunities to try something new and grow. You can collaborate with product managers, UX designers, other engineers, and maybe even business folk. ', 'Who you are:', 'You have experience running Machine Learning systems in production ', 'Commuter Program and 401k savings plan ', 'Bonus points:', 'Who we are: ', 'We are an equal opportunity employer — we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and make our hiring decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'You are passionate about iterating team workflows to improve productivity and mentoring junior team members to enable them to learn and thrive ', ' You have experience running Machine Learning systems in production  You’ve worked with ETL/big data technologies (hdfs, Hive, etc.)  You have experience leading a small team  ', 'Experience. You’ve faced some problems and either solved them or learned an important lesson. Either way, your bag of tricks has some depth and you have strong opinions about what works and what doesn’t (that you’re willing to reconsider in the face of new evidence). ', 'Technologies. Our stack is mainly written in Python and consists of a set of interacting microservices. We use AWS heavily for our data processing requirements and to power training of our machine learning models. ', 'Flex Vacation – personal time to refresh your mind/body/soul, spend time with loved ones and celebrate life events. There is no accrual or specific limit to the amount of time an employee may use ', 'Friendly', 'More about us: ', 'Experience', 'Chartboost is the leading in-app monetization and programmatic advertising platform. We reach an audience of over 900M unique users every month across more than 300,000 mobile games and work with 90% of the top grossing iOS and Android game developers, globally. The Chartboost SDK is the highest-integrated independent mobile ad SDK and through Chartboost Exchange, Ad Network, and other services, we empower developers to build businesses, while connecting advertisers to highly engaged audiences. ', ' The opportunity to help build a company with the founding team  Stock Options - you will have a stake in the future success of Chartboost  Comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance options  Catered lunches and fully stocked kitchens  Commuter Program and 401k savings plan  Flex Vacation – personal time to refresh your mind/body/soul, spend time with loved ones and celebrate life events. There is no accrual or specific limit to the amount of time an employee may use  ', 'Technologies', ' You are a professional software developer, experience in mobile is a plus  You are passionate about iterating team workflows to improve productivity and mentoring junior team members to enable them to learn and thrive  You have experience designing scalable/low latency systems  You have experience using monitoring tools in production  You are comfortable with the core parts of AWS stack (ec2, s3, etc.)  You are comfortable with DevOps/CI tools (travis, jenkins, etc.)  ', 'You are comfortable with the core parts of AWS stack (ec2, s3, etc.) ', 'Comprehensive medical, dental and vision insurance options ', 'You are comfortable with DevOps/CI tools (travis, jenkins, etc.) ', 'You are a professional software developer, experience in mobile is a plus ', 'You’ve worked with ETL/big data technologies (hdfs, Hive, etc.) ', ' ', 'Catered lunches and fully stocked kitchens ', 'You have experience designing scalable/low latency systems ', 'Now we’re looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our team focused on the development of our real-time bidder, one of the most exciting and important products within Chartboost. The system powering this product must deal with 100,000’s of requests per second and presents unique engineering challenges. In addition, the bidder requires use of machine learning models that are trained in batch and then used to power decision making in real-time. ', 'Stock Options - you will have a stake in the future success of Chartboost ']

['', 'Results-driven.', 'The OneStream Platform contains complex OLAP, multi-dimensional, multi-server, multi-threading, web, and SQL technologies and is specifically designed to solve problems for the Office of the CFO at large corporations.\xa0Your primary responsibilities will be to design, develop & maintain our OneStream platform and to coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure.', 'Excellent Medical Plan.Dental & Vision Insurance.Life Insurance.Short- & Long-Term Disability.Vacation Time.Paid Holidays.Professional Development.Retirement Plan.', 'Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.', 'Ethical.Credible.Professional.\xa0Results-driven.Detail-oriented.Able to multi-task.Flexible and adaptable.Team player.Legally authorized to work for any company in the United States without sponsorship.', 'OneStream employees are passionate, hardworking individuals who go above and beyond to keep our customers happy and follow through on our mission statement. They consistently deliver the best and in turn, we make every effort to keep them cared for and happy. A sample of the benefits we provide are:', '10+ years programming experience.Recent Microsoft technology focus.Experience with the following technologies:VB .Net, C#, Visual Basic and SQL Server.Visual Studio, TFS, and GIT.Strong understanding of object-oriented programming.Data Modelling Skills.Skill for writing reusable libraries.Familiar with various design and architectural patterns.Experience with Agile/Scrum Development Methodologies.Ability to analyze and communicate technical issues, lead discussions, and influence decisions.Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal skills.', 'Excellent Medical Plan.', 'Professional Development.', 'Paid Holidays.', 'Ability to analyze and communicate technical issues, lead discussions, and influence decisions.', 'Personal Attributes', 'Able to multi-task.', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'odern office spaces.', 'Transparency around corporate structure, salary, and benefits.Core value of customer success.Variety of project work (not industry specific).\xa0Strong culture and\xa0camaraderie.Multiple training opportunities.', 'Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.', 'Data Modelling Skills.', 'Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal skills.', 'Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.', 'QUALITIES OF A SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE', 'The successful candidate will have a Bachelor of Science degree plus 10+ years programming experience using Microsoft Visual Studio and the .NET Framework. Specific technologies include C#, Visual Basic, SQL Server, Web Services, WCF, WPF, Silverlight, XAML, XML, MVC, HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS. The candidate will be expected to work well in a focused group of engineers. He or she will report to the Director of Software Engineering and interact with the CTO and other senior team members to design and implement new features and maintain existing software.', 'Skill for writing reusable libraries.', 'Core value of customer success.', 'Knowledge and Experience', 'Multiple training opportunities.', 'Fort Lauderdale, Florida - OneStream Software LLC', 'Retirement Plan.', 'Experience with Agile/Scrum Development Methodologies.', 'We are equally fanatical about our OneStream family members (formally known as employees).\xa0We are a team in every sense of the word.\xa0Everyone here is approachable and excited to pitch in and help.\xa0We work hard and play hard.\xa0The right candidate is easy to get along with, always willing to lend a hand, excited about coming to work, and happy to contribute to the team.\xa0We also offer a casual dress environment and m', 'Detail-oriented.', 'DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', "College diploma or bachelor's degree in a technology-related field.", 'Team player.', 'Full-Time', 'Transparency around corporate structure, salary, and benefits.', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Strong culture and\xa0camaraderie.', 'Visual Studio, TFS, and GIT.', 'Professional.\xa0', 'Benefits at OneStream Software', '10+ years programming experience.', 'Employment Type -\xa0Full-Time', 'Recent Microsoft technology focus.', 'Legally authorized to work for any company in the United States without sponsorship.', 'VB .Net, C#, Visual Basic and SQL Server.', 'Familiar with various design and architectural patterns.', 'Experience with the following technologies:', 'Flexible and adaptable.', 'Formal Education and Certification', 'WHO WE ARE', 'Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to mitigate and address these issues.', 'WHY JOIN THE ONESTREAM TEAM', 'Variety of project work (not industry specific).\xa0', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our OneStream XF Platform Development team. Our company provides Corporate Performance Management (CPM) software for large corporations. Our product is designed for high-end deployments at customer facilities or in the Microsoft Azure cloud. The core engine contains complex OLAP, multi-dimensional, multi-server, multi-threading, web, and SQL technologies and is specifically designed to solve problems for the Office of Finance at extremely large corporations.', 'Strong understanding of object-oriented programming.', 'Life Insurance.', 'Short- & Long-Term Disability.', 'OneStream Software is a privately held software company created by the same team that invented the leading financial solutions of the last decade. We provide a unified Corporate Performance Management (CPM) platform which enables the enterprise to simplify financial consolidation, reporting, budgeting and forecasting for complex organizations. Our powerful extensibility enables the enterprise to deliver additional analytic solutions without adding any technical complexity. By delivering multiple solutions in one application, we offer increased capabilities for financial reporting and analysis while reducing the risk, complexity and total cost of ownership for our customers. We are driven by our mission statement that every customer must be a reference and success.', 'Vacation Time.', 'Integrate data storage solutions.', 'Credible.', 'Design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code.Integrate data storage solutions.Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to mitigate and address these issues.Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.', 'ABOUT THE JOB', 'OneStream Software is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\xa0', 'Ethical.', 'Dental & Vision Insurance.']

Working knowledge of relevant national healthcare systems, specifically with large observational and insurance claims databases, experienced with diagnostic, procedure, and pharmaceutical coding systems ', 'I build our reputation.', ' Demonstrated ability to learn and embrace new technologies, applications and solutions ', 'I am accountable.', 'I am obsessed with meeting customer needs.', 'I act on behalf of the whole company, not just my team.', ' Contribute to program library and web-based tool development and maintenance. ', ' SAS Base, SAS/STAT, SAS/GRAPH, SQL and macro programming experience ', 'Programming Experience In R Is a Plus', 'I build a culture of trust.', 'Key Responsibilities Include', ' Ability to work collaboratively in a dynamic, team-based environment ', ' For candidate with a master’s degree, a minimal of two years of prior work experience in academic/research institute, consulting, managed care, government, and/or pharmaceutical industry. ', 'I radically simplify and prioritize for impact.', ' With guidance from senior TI members, analyze secondary data, including insurance claims, electronic medical record, patient survey, and disease registry. ', ' Master’s Degree (health policy and management, economics, epidemiology, public policy, or health services research); Doctoral Degree in above or other related disciplines is preferred. ', 'Requirements', 'Operating Principles ', 'I am inclusive.', 'I act with urgency.', ' Participate in all required Genentech and E4A training and development programs. Comply with all internal policies and external regulations. ', ' Roche is an equal opportunity employer. ', ' Design, develop, test, implement, validate, document, and maintain effective and efficient SAS or R programs for conducting, analyzing and reporting observational database studies. ', 'Experience In Publication In Peer-reviewed Journal Is Preferred', ' Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities. Advanced statistics and health economics concepts are a plus. ', ' Strong oral and writing communication skills to summarize and explain the findings to audiences who may not have technical background. ', ' Support senior TI members to design and execute retrospective observational studies for Health Economics and Outcomes Research (HEOR) and Health Policy and System Research (HPSR) using in-house RWD ', 'The Data Scientist of Technical Institute (TI) is a member of the US Medical Affairs Evidence for Access (E4A) Medical Unit. He/she assists senior TI team members to design and execute retrospective observational research using in-house real-world data (RWD). ', ' Support the development of research protocol and statistical analysis plan. Recommend and implement appropriate analytical methodology (e.g., propensity score matching, regression analysis…etc) for RWD studies. ', 'I put the patient first, always.', 'I have a growth mindset.']

job_text: ['', ' Continuous Integration and DevOps: Jenkins, Puppet, Chef, and Ansible What makes DataSync Technologies different? Leadership Training: We provide employees with a variety of learning opportunities, including access to exclusive classes, professional growth training and more. Feedback & Mentoring: We believe in talking-often. So we have one-on-one feedback sessions for every employee. Community Service: We believe in helping the community where we work. DataSync and its employees donate time and services on a regular basis to local military charities. We believe in helping, both inside and outside of the office. Social Events: We plan social events on a regular basis to help our employees relax and socialize so we get to know one another outside of our job titles. Equal Employment Opportunity', ' #datasynctech on Instagram', ' MapReduce, Pig, XML, SQL, JAQL, HTML, CSS, XML, BASH, ANT, and Perl', ' Preferred Qualifications (All not required):', ' The successful candidate is highly motivated, exhibit strong communication; inter-personal, and problem solving skills, as well as the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced team oriented environment. Our Recruiting team consists of highly skilled Talent Specialists who excel at evaluating, advising, and connecting IT professionals with new career opportunities that facilitate career growth.', 'Experience working in an agile development environment.', 'Must Have:', '2 years of experience developing node.js applications/services.Experience building, deploying and consuming RESTful APIsFamiliarity with API Management concepts.Solid understanding of the modern software development lifecycle processes including Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery.Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work collaboratively with a team and with other teams to deliver project goals.Experience to work collaboratively with your team to design and implement software changes in response to business need, security or regulatory requirements and new platform capabilities.', 'Expertise in analyzing and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems using performance and availability metrics', 'Nice to Have:\xa0', 'Help replace legacy systems with modern, Internet-scale design patterns', '2 years of experience developing node.js applications/services.', 'Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work collaboratively with a team and with other teams to deliver project goals.', 'Implement industry wide best practices around both on-premise and public cloud infrastructure', 'Familiarity with API Management concepts.', 'Seeking a talented node.js developer to build critical IT-Engineering middleware components to rapidly improve the development speed, quality and delivery of web-based applications hosted on-premise and on public cloud platforms via API Management. To be considered, candidates must demonstrate strong development skills in context of enterprise middleware infrastructure.', 'Solid understanding of the modern software development lifecycle ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     BS degree in     Computer Science, or equivalent experience. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     A solid     computer science foundation including data structures, algorithms, and     design patterns, with a proven track record of writing high concurrency,     multi-threaded, secure, scalable code. ', 'Since   being founded in 2001, BlackLine has become a leading provider of cloud   software that automates and controls the entire financial close process. Our   vision is to modernize the finance and accounting function to enable greater   operational effectiveness and agility, and we are committed to delivering   innovative solutions and services to empower accounting and finance leaders   around the world to achieve Modern Finance. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Lead technical     design and architecture discussions and help drive technical decisions while     making appropriate trade-offs on technology, functionality, robustness,     performance and extensibility. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0   Experience with   data integration and ETL ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Hands-on     experience in Big Data processing using Apache Hadoop and its ecosystem     such as Spark, Hive, YARN and Zookeeper. ', '\xa0', 'If   you have a passion for delivering products that make a difference, are driven   to make things better in all that you do and are eager to work in a   collaborative agile environment where developers are dedicated to solving customer   problems and innovating, we would love to talk to you. ', 'Staff Software Engineer, Back-End — 12037 ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0   Experience with   continuous delivery and infrastructure as code. ', 'CORE QUALIFICATIONS', "We are a technology-based company with   a sense of adventure and a vision for the future. Every door at BlackLine is   open. Just bring your brains, your problem-solving skills, and be part of a   winning team at the world's most trusted name in Finance Automation. Work,   Play and Grow at BlackLine! ", 'RESPONSIBILITIES ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Fluent in SQL,     data modeling and transactional flows. ', 'Job Summary:', '\xa0 ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Passion for     engineering excellence through automation, unit testing, and process improvements. ', 'SUMMARY', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     6+ years of     professional experience in building Web scale highly available multi-tenant SaaS with focus on backend     platform, frameworks, RESTful APIs and microservices. ', 'Job Summary: ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Experience as     a technical lead for design, architecture and     code review of highly scalable     distributed systems and event driven architecture. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Provide     technical expertise and leadership in requirements analysis, design, effort     estimation, development, testing and delivery of highly scalable and secure     distributed backend services. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Excellent     written and verbal communication skills. ', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Experience     working in an Agile development environment. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Expert in one     or more object-oriented programming languages - C#, Python or Java. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Implement,     refine, and enforce software development techniques to ensure that the     delivered features meet software integration, performance, security, and     maintainability expectations. ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Perform     critical maintenance, deployment, and release support activities, including     occasional off-hours support. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Adaptable     team player with strong collaboration skills and a focus on results and     value delivery. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Maintain a     strong sense of business value and return on investment in planning,     design, and communication. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     3+ years of experience with a public cloud     (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and solid understanding of cloud-native services. ', 'Our Company: ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     2+ years of experience in working with NoSQL datastores     such as Elasticsearch or Apache Solr. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Inspire a     forward-thinking team of developers, acting as an agent of change and     evangelist for a quality-first culture within the organization. ', 'SUMMARY ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Mentor and     coach team members, guide them to solutions on complex design issues and do     peer code reviews. ', 'Woodland Hills, CA ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Estimate the     project scope and timelines, and consistently deliver on those commitments.     ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0   Open source   contributor. ', ' ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0   Good knowledge   of internet security issues in software design and code. ', 'As a Staff Software   Engineer, you will play a crucial role in building the next generation of   BlackLine application and data platform. You will be driving innovation into   our product suite by designing, developing, troubleshooting, maintaining,   optimizing and scaling cloud-based backend platform components, services and   frameworks, including but not limited to Event Bus, API Gateway, Developer   Portal, Job Scheduler, Identity Management, Search, Workflow Orchestration   and Data Integration. In addition to being a hands-on engineer, you will also   lead and mentor other engineers in the team. ', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'Our Company:', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0     Proven experience in delivering one or more core     platform services, such as API gateway, identity management,     authentication, messaging (Kafka or RabbitMQ), workflow orchestration, job     scheduling and search. ['', ' You will become one of the first Data Scientists on the contract in order to define new data CONOPS, develop/automate optimized data flows, and utilize Data Science practices in order to revolutionize how the contract operates.', ' Leverage automation and machine learning to manage data, predict scenarios and make recommendations.', ' You will apply complex analysis of data in support of mission problems, with expertise in problem solving, scripting in multiple languages, as well as the creation and/or implementation of tools and processes that aid in advanced analytics, testing and quality assurance, and DevOps.', ' You will support a satellite operations contract where the field of data science is being developed from the ground up.', ' Paid time off', ' Work/life balance', ' Mentorship opportunities', ' You may perform outreach to potential new customers to educate them on our available products and how we can leverage our offerings to increase efficiency within their teams.', ' Contribute to building new analytical tools and packages across the enterprise and will be expected to collaborate with team members in a highly technical environment.', ' You can expect to be involved in Enterprise outreach and defining requirements to use and analyze data for multiple mission partners and contract leadership. Candidate will be highly involved with product development.', ' We are looking for a data scientist to grow our existing automation efforts by enhancing our data analysis and data architecture practices.', ' Medical Dental 401k Paid time off Work/life balance Career development Mentorship opportunities Rewards & recognition', ' You will establish working data sets, configurations, and profiles in support of metric analysis.', ' The Double Eagle II contract recently increased its scope to begin defining and utilizing Data Science and Data Visualization practices to optimize and reinvigorate how multiple data sets are analyzed. We are looking for a data scientist to grow our existing automation efforts by enhancing our data analysis and data architecture practices. You will support a satellite operations contract where the field of data science is being developed from the ground up. You will become one of the first Data Scientists on the contract in order to define new data CONOPS, develop/automate optimized data flows, and utilize Data Science practices in order to revolutionize how the contract operates. You can expect to be involved in Enterprise outreach and defining requirements to use and analyze data for multiple mission partners and contract leadership. Candidate will be highly involved with product development. You will establish working data sets, configurations, and profiles in support of metric analysis. You will apply complex analysis of data in support of mission problems, with expertise in problem solving, scripting in multiple languages, as well as the creation and/or implementation of tools and processes that aid in advanced analytics, testing and quality assurance, and DevOps. Leverage automation and machine learning to manage data, predict scenarios and make recommendations. Contribute to building new analytical tools and packages across the enterprise and will be expected to collaborate with team members in a highly technical environment. You may perform outreach to potential new customers to educate them on our available products and how we can leverage our offerings to increase efficiency within their teams.', ' Career development', ' Medical', 'Here Are Some Of The Benefits You Can Enjoy', ' Dental', ' The Double Eagle II contract recently increased its scope to begin defining and utilizing Data Science and Data Visualization practices to optimize and reinvigorate how multiple data sets are analyzed.', ' 401k', ' Rewards & recognition']

job_text: ['', "Experience working with tracking systemsExperience handling complex problems at scaleAbility to learn quickly on the go. We're looking for software engineers who thrive while learning new technologies and don't believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. You should be able to easily adapt to meet the needs of our massive growth and rapidly-evolving business environment.Bias toward action. You believe that speed and quality aren't mutually exclusive. You've shown good judgment about shipping as fast as possible while ensuring your products and platforms are built in a sustainable, responsible way--and you're comfortable making mistakes, provided you learn from them.Passion and energy. Because you love what you do, you bring infectious enthusiasm to all your endeavors. You always perform at your absolute best and see new challenges as an opportunity to contribute, make an impact, and grow.Unquenchable thirst for growth. You're not just looking for the next interesting challenge, but looking to push yourself to keep pace in our hyper-growth environment.", '5+ years of experience with systems software engineering. They will have experience architecting and building scalable back-end systems and implementing web UI for those systems.', '• Challenges excite you and you have a track record of breaking through walls on your way to success']

['', 'Background in software development in both modern C++ and PythonExperience building simulation tools for autonomous vehicles or other AI/ML applicationsFull stack development skills are a plusGame engine experience (e.g., UE4) is a plusGraphics/rendering/GPU expertise are a plusPrior experience in the autonomous space is a plus', 'Game engine experience (e.g., UE4) is a plus', 'Voyage is delivering on the promise of self-driving cars.', 'Build and expand methods to automatically generate 3D worlds based on mapping data', 'Build a reliable and scalable simulation data platform for metrics and analysisBuild effective systems for managing and monitoring execution of a large scenario libraryAutomatically generate and discover scenarios that help improve our autonomous technologyHelp develop effective testing frameworks for assessing vehicle behaviorBuild and expand methods to automatically generate 3D worlds based on mapping dataMake agents such as cars, pedestrians, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and golf carts behave realisticallySimulate lidar and radar sensors realistically and render high-fidelity images of 3D worlds', 'Automatically generate and discover scenarios that help improve our autonomous technology', 'Requirements:', 'Build effective systems for managing and monitoring execution of a large scenario library', 'Simulate lidar and radar sensors realistically and render high-fidelity images of 3D worlds', 'Background in software development in both modern C++ and Python', 'Build a reliable and scalable simulation data platform for metrics and analysis', "Voyage has built the technology and services to bring autonomous transportation to those who need it most, beginning in retirement communities. Whether residents face mobility restrictions or just want to take a ride, Voyage takes pride in getting all our passengers to their destination safely, efficiently, and affordably. Our journey begins in calmer communities, but we won't stop until anyone, anywhere can summon a Voyage.", 'Graphics/rendering/GPU expertise are a plus', 'Make agents such as cars, pedestrians, motorcyclists, bicyclists, and golf carts behave realistically', 'Responsibilities:', 'Help develop effective testing frameworks for assessing vehicle behavior', 'As a Simulation Engineer at Voyage, you will use state-of-the-art simulation software to enable development, testing, and validation of our fleet of Level 4 autonomous vehicles. You will design and implement new tooling, functionality, and define procedures and best practices to build our simulation infrastructure. You will interact with the Tools, Platform, Perception, and Autonomy teams to drive a simulation-first culture. Your work will directly impact the productivity of our engineers and the quality of their work and will ensure our Voyage transportation service is safe and comfortable for communities around the world.\xa0', 'Prior experience in the autonomous space is a plus', 'Full stack development skills are a plus', 'Experience building simulation tools for autonomous vehicles or other AI/ML applications']

['Our client is a large multi-strategy hedge fund client in Manhattan that is seeking a mid-level Java full-stack software developer to help build and develop applications, infrastructure, and connectivity for the front office. This is a great opportunity for an individual to develop new tools from scratch and to help automate processes and improve internal workflows and work directly with the portfolio managers and traders. ', 'Advanced degree (preferred) in Computer Science or a related field ~2-7 years of commercial core java experience Comfortable working with all levels of the technology stack, including the frontend, middleware, servers, and databases. ['', '• Assist the with the Radar Verification and Validation (V&V) activities with the development and performance of a V&V plan which compares simulation performance against the requirements established by the customer. ', '• Communicates technical issues and provides status briefings to managers and key program stakeholders. ', '• Experience in applying engineering design process to implement innovative methods to solve technical problems and analyze large sets of system performance data ', 'Required Education (including Major): ', 'The System Integration and Test (SI&T) organization integrates all aspects of system validation, test, and analysis from initial system architecture, design and development, through system validation. The SI&T organization has overall responsibility for the system integration and test process, test facility management and capital planning, as well as off-site system and flight test conduct, analysis and test problem resolution.', '• Support various engineering activities that include test and systems validation, modeling and simulation, requirements analysis, data analysis, flight test analysis and overall systems integration.', '• Support the advanced X-Band Radar technology; including hardware and software, for strategic and tactical Radars used as critical components in air and missile defense and situational awareness. ', "The SI&T's Systems Integration, Test and Evaluation Department (SITE) provides system engineering, integration and test expertise to the Radar and missile defense systems programs within Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD). Opportunities currently exist for Systems Engineers to support the Strategic Missile Defense (SMD) Business Area in Huntsville, AL. SMD is an integrated business team at Raytheon’s RMD that focuses on Radar technology. SMD develops Radars, land and sea based, with systems that are able to detect, identify and track targets and objects at greater ranges, over-the-horizon and in space with greater sensitivity.", '• Knowledge in Microsoft Excel tool development ', '• Minimum of 2+ years of engineering experience working with programming languages such as MATLAB, C/ C++, or other higher level. ', '• Experience with some form of the Systems Engineering Product Development Cycle', "• Master's Degree in Engineering ", '• Travel to support program requirements as required.', '• Experience working with EO/IR sensors, RF/Radar sensors, missiles/interceptors, ICBM / hypersonic / MRM / SRM threats, discrimination analysis, detection/tracking, or Command and Control (e.g., C3I, C4I, etc.), and in development of test scripts ', '• This position requires the eligibility to obtain a security clearance. Except in rare circumstances, only U.S. citizens are eligible for a security clearance.', 'This position requires the eligibility to obtain a security clearance. Except in rare circumstances, only U.S. citizens are eligible for a security clearance.', '. ', '• Excellent multi-tasking, problem resolving, and analytical skills, and able to meet challenging schedules in a research and development program environment ', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or other STEM related field', 'Desired Skills:', '• Work independently with general guidance provided by the task Lead on general objectives and details of unusual situations and /or requirements. ', '• Working knowledge of Six Sigma and IPDS ', 'Required Skills:', '• Plan and complete V&V assignments which include collaborating with others in determining method of verification, generating verification procedures, developing analysis tools in Matlab to perform the verification, and documenting results in a V&V report. ']

['Ability & desire to interface with business stakeholders and users to define and refine requirements when appropriate ', 'Our managers really value collaboration between team members and encourage developers to bring forth creative problem-solving ideas from both a technical and functional aspect ', 'Our development teams work on projects adding directly to the O’Reilly Auto Parts bottom line and we are looking for exceptional developers to help us succeed! Some of the tools we use to implement our projects are Java, JavaScript & CSS, PostgreSQL, Eclipse, IntelliJ, SublimeText, Axure, & Balsamiq for development. We also utilize MatterMost and Atlassian tools such as Jira, Confluence, Fisheye, & Crucible for developer productivity. ', 'Experience with Grunt, Gulp, & GIT is a plus ', 'Senior level experience with Java 8, Spring, Bootstrap, CSS/preprocessers, and JavaScript/JS Frameworks ', 'Love solving complex problems related to serving our customers better – both internal & external customers ', 'We want to grow our people – we help to make you better by providing training for both technical and professional development ', 'We have several career paths, whether you want to be a manager, project manager, or stay technical – there’s a documented growth plan to help you follow the path you choose ', 'Love solving complex problems related to serving our customers better – both internal & external customers Enjoy working with teams Senior level experience with Java 8, Spring, Bootstrap, CSS/preprocessers, and JavaScript/JS Frameworks Experience with Grunt, Gulp, & GIT is a plus Ability & desire to interface with business stakeholders and users to define and refine requirements when appropriate ', 'We look to promote from within – O’Reilly is diligent to promote from within our organization with qualified team members', 'Enjoy working with teams ', 'What we look for in our developers: ', 'We are a “work family”! We have fun together and support each other ', 'Growth within our teams at O’Reilly Auto Parts: ', 'About our team:', 'What we look for in our developers:', 'We create and customize 90% of our applications in house ', 'Growth within our teams at O’Reilly Auto Parts:', 'About our team: ', ' ', "Have you ever heard of O, O, O, O'Reilly Auto Parts...Ow?! This is not your standard Engineer position and we are not your standard brand! We are the dominant auto parts retailer in all our market areas. ", '***THIS IS A REMOTE/WFH POSITION***', 'We have several career paths, whether you want to be a manager, project manager, or stay technical – there’s a documented growth plan to help you follow the path you choose We want to grow our people – we help to make you better by providing training for both technical and professional development We look to promote from within – O’Reilly is diligent to promote from within our organization with qualified team members', 'We respect a healthy work-life balance ', 'We create and customize 90% of our applications in house We are a “work family”! We have fun together and support each other We respect a healthy work-life balance The team keeps open communication through different outlets – video conferencing, team messaging applications, and daily scrums/stand-up meetings Our managers really value collaboration between team members and encourage developers to bring forth creative problem-solving ideas from both a technical and functional aspect ', 'The team keeps open communication through different outlets – video conferencing, team messaging applications, and daily scrums/stand-up meetings ']

['', 'Your focus will be to help our team and our systems scale effectively. Upcoming initiatives include: observability and monitoring, build / deploy pipeline optimization, shifting workloads into separate services and deploying some of them to AWS.', 'Required Skills: AWS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, GraphQL, Apollo, and Node, Express, PostgreSQL, Heroku, Python, CDK, CloudFormation, Batch, CircleCi, Github', 'Write clean code in JavaScript / TypeScript or Python', 'Job Description:\xa0', 'Communicate clearly\xa0', 'General Requirements:\xa0', 'Our mission is to inspire kids to love learning. We believe the best way to do that is by linking learning to kids’ interests and giving them the autonomy to pick their own path. We provide small group classes that meet over live video chat where learners are connected with teachers and classmates who share their interests. These classes are offered through our marketplace and conducted on our remote learning platform.', 'Company Description:', 'Prefer simple solutions\xa0', 'Care about learning and education\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Have something to teach us', 'Balance big-picture perspective with attention to detail\xa0', 'Have been working professionally in DevOps, Infrastructure, or Systems Engineering for at least 5 years.\xa0Have relevant experience, e.g.: iterating on data pipelines in AWS, tuning and maintaining PostgreSQL, monitoring and observability, build/deploy systems (node, React, webpack, CIrcleCI)\xa0Write clean code in JavaScript / TypeScript or PythonPrefer simple solutions\xa0Communicate clearly\xa0Balance big-picture perspective with attention to detail\xa0Take responsibility for their work\xa0Care about learning and education\xa0Have something to teach us', "We're looking for our first infrastructure engineer to help scale our systems and team.", 'Have been working professionally in DevOps, Infrastructure, or Systems Engineering for at least 5 years.\xa0', 'Have relevant experience, e.g.: iterating on data pipelines in AWS, tuning and maintaining PostgreSQL, monitoring and observability, build/deploy systems (node, React, webpack, CIrcleCI)\xa0', 'Take responsibility for their work\xa0']

It would be awesome if you have a robust portfolio on Github and / or open source contributions you are proud to share', '2+ years of development experience in Graph Databases like AWS Neptune, Neo4J, JanusGraph etc.', 'Build cool things – Build scalable analytics solution, including data processing, storage, and serving large-scale data through batch and stream, analytics for both behavioral & ad revenue through digital & non-digital channels.', '4+ years of experience developing data driven application using mix of languages (Java, Scala, Python, SQL etc.) and open source frameworks to implement data ingest, processing, and analytics technologies.', 'Build and Support – Embrace the DevOps mentality to build, deploy and support applications in cloud with minimal help from other teams', " Build cool things – Build scalable analytics solution, including data processing, storage, and serving large-scale data through batch and stream, analytics for both behavioral & ad revenue through digital & non-digital channels. Innovate and inspire – Think of new ways to help make our data platform more scalable, resilient and reliable and then work across our team to put your ideas into action. Think at scale - Lead the transformation of a peta-byte scale batch-based processing platform to a near real-time streaming platform using technologies such as Apache Kafka, Cassandra, Spark and other open source frameworks Have pride – Ensure performance isn't our weakness by implementing and refining robust data processing using Python, Java, Scala and other database technologies such as RedShift or Snowflake.  ", 'Lead and coach – Mentor other software engineers by developing re-usable frameworks. ", 'Grow with us – Help us stay ahead of the curve by working closely with data architects, stream processing specialists, API developers, our DevOps team, and analysts to design systems which can scale elastically in ways which make other groups jealous. Hands-on experience with newer technologies relevant to the data space such as Spark, Airflow, Apache Druid, Snowflake (or any other OLAP databases). ['', 'The Associate Data Scientist employs big data technologies and analytics techniques to process and analyze large amounts of data to derive insights and predictions that help improve business decisions.  In order to do this, the Associate Data Scientist must be able to organize data, cleanse and normalize raw data, process data for statistical modeling using computers, and identify relationships and trends in data. The Associate Data Scientist must demonstrate strong programming skills and be able to develop, test, and deploy solutions that address different business problems. The Associate Data Scientist must have a strong educational foundation in data analytics, statistical modeling, advanced machine learning, artificial intelligence, database technology, computer programming, and software engineering. TheAssociate Data Scientist must be able to think analytically, and must be detail-oriented.  Also, the Associate Data Scientistshould be able to effectively communicate with supervisors and business leaders who may not have strong data analytics or statistical background.  \xa0The Associate Data Scientist will usually work independently with guidance provided by the senior team members. ', '3-5 years Data Cleaning, Manipulation, Analysis, and Reporting ', 'Work Experience', 'Duties and Responsibilities', 'Software Application Development: Use computer programming languages to implement and build statistical modeling or machine learning algorithms. Must be able to program, test, execute, debug, and deploy solutions. ', 'Articulate discoveries and insights and challenges with management. Troubleshoot medium complexity problems. Mentoring Junior Employees: Be actively involved with the training, assistance, and development of less experienced Big Data Analysts and Associate Data Scientists. ', 'Data Analysis and Problem Solving: Use advanced analytics techniques to process and analyze large amounts of data to identify trends and relationships within the data and draw actionable insights. This requires being able to prepare data by organizing, adjusting and weighting the raw data, applying advanced analytics approaches, and processing large amounts of data using computers. Support and Testing: Use skills to validate the functionality of software solutions and provide the necessary support to end-users to resolve different operational issues.Communication: Work with different teams (IT managers, Executives, Business Partners) to better understand the business and the challenges. Articulate discoveries and insights and challenges with management. Troubleshoot medium complexity problems. Mentoring Junior Employees: Be actively involved with the training, assistance, and development of less experienced Big Data Analysts and Associate Data Scientists. Software Application Development: Use computer programming languages to implement and build statistical modeling or machine learning algorithms. Must be able to program, test, execute, debug, and deploy solutions. ', 'Support and Testing: Use skills to validate the functionality of software solutions and provide the necessary support to end-users to resolve different operational issues.Communication: Work with different teams (IT managers, Executives, Business Partners) to better understand the business and the challenges. ', 'Minimum: Graduate degree, Masters in \xa0Statistics, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Data Science, MIS, Management, Operations Research, Industrial Engineering or equivalent (PhD degree preferred). ', 'At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants.  If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please just let us know.', 'Education Requirements:', 'Work Experience ', '3-5 years Database technology  (Oracle, DB2, Bigquery, Hadoop, Impala, SQL, etc.) 3-5 years Data Cleaning, Manipulation, Analysis, and Reporting 3-5 years Data visualization (javascript, tableau, gnuplot, matplotlib, etc) 1-3 Programming Language (Python,  Javascript, Java, C, etc.) 1-3 Machine Learning/Applied Statistics/Artificial Intelligence ', 'Must have legal authority to work in the U.S. EEOE.', 'Data Analysis and Problem Solving: Use advanced analytics techniques to process and analyze large amounts of data to identify trends and relationships within the data and draw actionable insights. ['', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teamsComfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systemsShipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projectsWrite robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'We believe careful deployment of modern technology to solve hard problems in government will create extraordinary positive change for our society, and we seek teammates who want to be part of our mission.', 'Significant experience working with cross functional software development teams', 'Our plaftorm has been used to protect children and victims of human trafficking, diffuse organized crime networks, de-escalate hostage scenarios, solve homicide cases, identify serial burglary suspects, and more. Customers use the same platform to facilitate Freedom of Information responses, provide targeted social services for homeless populations, and share data with their community.', 'Write robust, well tested, and well designed code that frequently gets deployed to users', 'About You:', 'About Us:', 'Passion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight users', 'Excellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software components', 'Comfortable navigating large code bases and building distributed systems', 'Shipped and iterated on major software components in your professional career, the open source community, and/or side projects', 'Strong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systems', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systemsStrong best practices in modern software development such as deployments, CI/CD, data management, and distributed systemsExcellent technical vision with the ability to synthesize product requests into strong and reliable software componentsPassion for crafting and shipping software solutions that delight usersDriven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'What We Look For:', 'We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We celebrate diversity and are a proud equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status.', 'Our team is advised by leading experts and industry practitioners in the law enforcement, intelligence, and civil liberties sectors who help us develop technology that is both operationally effective and trust-enhancing. We believe data can be used to empower all members of society, whether they are officers, detectives, agents, attorneys, or citizens.\xa0', 'We create technology to help governments transform the way they fight crime while building trust with their communities. We do this through openness, accountability, careful policy enforcement, and respect for people’s personal freedoms.', 'Our Team:', 'Strong understanding of architecture and scaling large software systems', 'We are a team of principled and curious entrepreneurs who are motivated by solving hard problems. We trust each other, help each other, and love diving into challenges together. We believe perseverance, curiosity, creativity, humble ethos, and world-class execution are key ingredients to building impactful software.', 'Driven and self-disciplined with the ability to own projects from start to finish', 'We are inspired to work hand-in-hand with public servants. Our customers are our partners; we listen to their needs, learn from their experiences, and develop effective software experiences to help them do their best work.', 'As an engineering team, we believe strongly that empathy improves our solutions. Seeing people use the product is a priority and the way we get to the right answer. Engineers will have the opportunity to work closely with our team onsite to understand the variety of use-cases that we serve. We value strong ownership on our team, while also being highly collaborative and always seeking input and feedback.', 'We are looking for strong developers to join our small but growing team. As one of the earliest engineering hires, you’ll take on a lead role with vast ownership across one of our stacks.\xa0We are tackling challenging and important problems, and need engineers who can operate well in ambiguity and come to a great solution.', 'As a full stack engineer you’ll use a variety of programming languages and technologies to scale our platform to handle terabytes of data being ingested across a variety of data sources.\xa0You will own projects from pixels to database queries. Our stack is constantly evolving but based on a backend foundation of Python, Django, Celery, and Airflow, a frontend built in React, Redux, D3, Mapbox, and Blueprint.js, data stores including PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, and Neo4J, with AWS, Terraform, and Ansible underlying our infrastructure.', 'The Full Stack Software Engineer Role:', 'Our platform fuses disconnected, unstructured data across secure networks and empowers users with highly intuitive interfaces to search, analyze, and collaborate. Customers tell us we help them solve cases that they thought were unsolvable, and allow them to communicate in ways they have never seen before. We are particularly proud to help government agencies solve more crimes while averting wrongful arrests.']

", ' BS in Computer Science or related fields ', ' 5+ years of object oriented programming experience in a JVM language. ', ' Collaborate with architects, principal engineers and technical product managers to analyze functional requirements, devise architecture designs   that provide real scalability, low latency, and high availability. Since its founding, Workday has become the leading provider of Enterprise Cloud Applications across a wide range of business. The Data Privacy team owns several key frameworks at the core of the Workday stack. If after learning about the “  Power of One  ”, you appreciate the complexity behind the scenes in storing all the data, and start wondering about all the things needed to enable data privacy from the ever growing number of enterprise customers, give us a shout! ', ' 5+ years of relevant experience with operations, development, and testing of large scale distributed systems. ', ' Experience in Agile development methodologies: eXtreme Programming, Crystal Methods, Scrum', ' Open source project contributions ', ' The Object Management Service (OMS) team has an immediate opening for an experienced and strong Java engineer on the Data Privacy team to work at the very heart of Workday’s cloud-based software platform.\xa0 ', 'About the job:', ' Experience in database implementation, especially graph database ', ' Proficient in major development tools and processes, such as source control (e.g. SVN, Git), IDE (e.g., Eclipse, IntelliJ), JUnit test, debugging, profiling, Jira, Continuous Delivery. ', ' DSL (Domain Specific Language) development knowledge or interest ', 'The Extra Skills', ' Proven ability to take a leadership role in projects that span multiple teams with the ability to deliver in an agile environment. ', 'Job Description', 'About the Team:', ' Design, build and deploy data privacy frameworks that support Workday growth. ', ' As a member of this team you’ll work with exceptionally innovative and experienced engineers that have built highly robust, performing, and scalable representation of tenanted data and its changes in memory and at rest. This position requires passion, courage, tenacity, imagination and a willingness to see beyond what is ordinarily possible. You will tackle the unique challenges including building tools to control access to Personally Identifiable Information (PII) and know how it is being used. Joining this team will allow you to develop deep technical strength in building the foundation of a cloud platform and hone your engineering skills to take on the most difficult of software engineering problems. ', 'Join our team and experience Workday!', ' Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers. ', ' Experience using or building distributed systems with an understanding of scalability, lock free algorithms, high availability, CAP theorem, etc ', ' 5+ years of object oriented programming experience in a JVM language. Proficient in applying common design patterns. ', ' Experience with Java build tools such as Ant, Maven, Gerrit, Gradle, etc ', 'About you:']

['', 'Our Engineering department is made up of cross functional Agile development teams that deploy to AWS production environments on demand, multiple times a day. You’ll tackle some of the most difficult challenges scaling an ecommerce marketplace by developing creative algorithms and features that maximize value and efficiency across the organization.', 'Creativity, fearlessness and an unwavering commitment to putting the customer first', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills, translating complex technical requirements into easy to follow direction and documentation', 'Vivid Seats is the largest independent online ticket marketplace, sending tens of millions of fans to live events. Experiences Matter\xa0- which is why we continue to grow year over year. Working at Vivid Seats puts you\xa0front\xa0and center at the opportunity to scale our best in class platform that allows\xa0our fans to sit closer and experience more.\xa0', 'Ability to translate complex technical concepts into high-level designs and act as a subject\xa0matter expert in software design, architecture, implementation, deployment and support across our full platform.', 'Proficient in SQL and relational database modeling', '\xa0', 'You’ll partner with a team of Marketing experts, Product Owners, Quality Engineers, and Developers to deliver exceptional software, showcasing your work at the end each 2-week sprint cycle. Our teams will lean on your expertise for best practices in design patterns, code quality, testing, and innovation to keep our commitment of always putting our customers first.', '111 N Canal Suite #800\xa0', 'What We Offer:', 'At Vivid Seats, you will have the opportunity to work with the flexibility and speed of a startup; while operating at massive, profitable scale. We keep our teams lean, allowing\xa0each\xa0employee direct accountability\xa0of\xa0creating a positive ticket buying experience. We are relentless and move quickly to release new features and content to our applications. Good ideas are heard and implemented, and hard work rewarded. Being a part of our team means having the ability to drive impact and own the innovation that connects our tens of millions of unique monthly users to the memorable experiences that only live events create.\xa0', 'Familiarity with modern front-end technologies such as JavaScript and Single Page Application Frameworks and their interactions with APIs.', 'Software Engineer II', 'As a subject\xa0matter expert on your team, you will help set the direction of the design and development of our evolving paid search bidding system. You’ll develop innovative solutions that give Vivid Seats a competitive advantage, mentor engineers, encourage team members, and champion technology improvements for your delivery team.\xa0', 'A proven career developing Web based, Distributed and Multi-Tier architecture using Java/J2EE or other major platforms (.Net, Python, Scala, Clojure, etc.)Experience designing, building, and testing web services and APIs.Strong knowledge of Spring, REST, Service Oriented Architecture, OAuth, Basic Authentication and PCI.Ability to translate complex technical concepts into high-level designs and act as a subject\xa0matter expert in software design, architecture, implementation, deployment and support across our full platform.Proficient in SQL and relational database modelingFamiliarity with modern front-end technologies such as JavaScript and Single Page Application Frameworks and their interactions with APIs.Excellent written and verbal communication skills, translating complex technical requirements into easy to follow direction and documentationCreativity, fearlessness and an unwavering commitment to putting the customer first', 'Strong knowledge of Spring, REST, Service Oriented Architecture, OAuth, Basic Authentication and PCI.', 'Location:', 'To be successful, you’ll need:', 'As\xa0a\xa0Software Engineer II\xa0you’ll make highly visible enhancements to our platform by maintaining and building new features across our Core Java applications. Our teams work with a variety of applications that enable our ability to sell tickets, manage inventory, support our internal users, and provide a great customer experience from the website to the box office.', 'We are passionate about creating memorable experiences for our fans and the best in class experience for our employees. Vivid Seats offers competitive compensation levels, individual and team-based bonus opportunities, 401K matching, a generous benefits package and Flex PTO policy plus a variety of workplace perks.', 'Experience designing, building, and testing web services and APIs.', 'The Opportunity:', 'Chicago, IL 60606\xa0', 'This position will start remotely.\xa0', 'A proven career developing Web based, Distributed and Multi-Tier architecture using Java/J2EE or other major platforms (.Net, Python, Scala, Clojure, etc.)']

['This role is designed for you if you understand software development and prefer to work with customers and on projects, to make our system hum for other engineers, partners and clients. If you love documentation to make lives easier for everyone else. If any of these apply, please apply or reachout to me, we look forward to connecting with you.', '', 'Software Development Project Manager', '- We offer an attractive compensation package including competitive salaries, bonuses, medical and dental coverage, flexible schedule & PTO, and tuition assistance', 'Planning the work of software developers', 'STILMAN Advanced Strategies', 'US citizenship required', 'Key Skills to Have for this Technical role', 'Representing technical team in meetings', 'Excellent communicator', 'We are looking to bring on a dedicated and diverse\xa0Software Project Manager\xa0to work closely with our software developers on our primary software applications that include web app that leverages modern UI technologies, UX concepts, GIS/mapping, communications protocols, data formats, and military concepts, as well as backend components with custom Artificial Intelligence (AI) engine, military modeling and simulation framework (M&S), and integration capabilities for our own front end and for 3rd party systems. This web-based system encompasses a large feature set for map-centric scenario construction and editing, 2D and 3D animated visualization, real time collaboration, COA analytics, wargaming, and integration with other military and simulation systems. As the feature set grows, we need to ensure that user experience for both basic and advanced users is as smooth as possible, little training is needed, and the military users can intuitively use the tool to help them think about tactics rather than spending their time thinking about how to use the tool.', 'Modeling and SimulationRepresenting technical team in meetingsCapturing user needsManaging the development backlogPlanning the work of software developersSoftware development experienceTechnical writingUI/UX design', 'Software development experience', '-\xa0US Citizenship\xa0is required.\xa0This position requires the ability to obtain and maintain a security clearance after you start (we will pay for and process)', 'The Team', 'Benefits &\xa0Other', 'Modeling and Simulation', "Our small, distributed team has been developing and continually improving these software applications since 1999. We pride ourselves on the quality of our software and we are excited as we continue this development with US Navy, US Army, Missile Defense Agency (MDA) and other agencies to further enhance, integrate, and deploy these products. We are a small team that's distributed throughout United States and work 100% remote, with some possible travel to customer sites. The software developers are self-motivated and able to work independently, but collaborate closely with each other to take advantage of each other's strength and help where help is needed. All aspects of our work are collaborative rather than stove piped into narrowly defined roles.", 'UI/UX design', "If you've been in software engineering and want to move up but do not want to manage employees, please read on!\xa0", 'Technical writing', '- Contact rick@stilman-strategies.com to learn more. No CTC or 3rd parties please. Thanks for considering STILMAN Advanced Strategies for your next career move!\xa0', '\xa0Software Project Manager', '100% work from home company for 20 years', 'You will communicate with the clients to assist with gathering feedback and new requirements and decomposing them into actionable, well-defined user stories and tasks. You will work with the development team to design solutions to customer needs, help document the system and feature design, and communicate it with key stakeholders outside of the company.\xa0You will take part in design of UI/UX and military modeling for new features or redesigning existing ones based on customer needs, feedback, and your own recommendations for usability improvements.\xa0You will work directly with the development team to manage and prioritize backlog, track developer progress and guide them in making decisions to ensure end software closely matches user needs. As a superuser of our software you will use the software, communicate insights for the development team, and demonstrate the functionality to the current or prospective customers. You will support our integration efforts through close communication with the product owners and software engineers of the other companies to make sure that the end product fits customer needs, and to represent and advocate for the technical approach designed by our development team.', 'Military experience; Officer level, tactical/combat background, simulation training combo strongly preferredTechnically savvy in systems (broader) and software development (coding)Excellent communicatorDependable, creative, and detail oriented', 'Technically savvy in systems (broader) and software development (coding)', 'In this role, you will become the Subject Matter Expert (SME) of military Courses of Action analysis, wargaming and simulation software systems. Prior military tactical experience and/or understanding of the military operations and capabilities would be a strong asset, although not required.', 'STILMAN Advanced Strategies\xa0develops software based on Linguistic Geometry (LG), a unique Artificial Intelligence (AI) approach. Our core technology generates predictive, tactically correct Courses of Action (COAs) that dynamically adapt in response to changes in missions and actions taken by the intelligent opposition. These tools support mission planning, rehearsal, training and execution use cases for military commanders across echelons and services. Our applications have been shown to deliver unique value to the warfighter due to the quality of generated COAs, UX/UI design that makes it easy to fully comprehend complex COA results and to define mission inputs, as well as ease of deployment and integration with other system with well-defined modern APIs.', 'Great Experience to Have, Some Combination needed', 'Military experience; Officer level, tactical/combat background, simulation training combo strongly preferred', 'Dependable, creative, and detail oriented', 'Capturing user needs', 'Managing the development backlog']

job_text: ['', ' Interest in developments in the global financial regulatory environment. ', ' First and foremost a passion for technology and a drive to deliver. This is a hands-on developer role. ', ' Ability to prioritize and meet simultaneous competing demands.
